div.head: prathamāśvāsaṁ

lg.l: peṇedeṇṭuṁ kilbiṣaṅgaḷkiḍe kiḍada guṇaṁ porde band’ eṇṭum ādaṁ
gire baṇṇaṁ ponna baṇṇakkeṇey ene garuḍaṁ vāhamāgirpa cakrē
bive valamindrapūje bhuvanastutam appa negaḻte mukti saṁ
rave peṟarīvudēṁ peṟara māḍuvudēṁ peṟarindam appudēṁ
tisidoṅgaṁ pavaṇilla puṇyam ene pūṇdoḷpindamōrante bhā
visi tāṁ tanmayan āgi taccaritamaṁ kāvyaṅgaḷoḷkūḍe ba

div.p:
ā purāṇakkaṁ lōkākārakathanamuṁ dēśanivēśōpadēśamuṁ
nagarasampatparivarṇanamuṁ rājyaramaṇīyatākhyānamuṁ tīrthamahima
samarthanamuṁ caturgatisvarūpanirūpaṇamuṁ tapōdānavidhānavarṇanamuṁ
tatphaḷaprāptiprakaṭanamum end’ int’ avayavaṅgaḷ’ eṇṭ’ akkuṁ
ā lōkatrayamadhyadoḷ madhyamalōkam emba pesaraṁ paḍedu

ā tiryaglōkada naṭṭanaḍuve lavaṇajaladhiparivr̥tam āgi bharata haimavata
harivarṣa vidēha ramyaka hairaṇyavatairāvataṅgaḷembēḻu janapadaṅgaḷindaṁ pūrvā
parāyataṅgaḷuṁ hēmārjunatapanīyavaiḍūr‍yavajra rajatahēmamayaṅgaḷuṁ,
maṇivicitrapārśvaṅgaḷumadhassthaḷōparimataḷasamānavistāraṅgaḷum appa hima
vanmahāhimavanniṣadhanīḷarugmiśikharigaḷ emba varṣadharamahīdharaṅgaḷindaṁ innūṟu
kanakagirigaḷindaṁ nālku nābhinagaṅgaḷindaṁ mūvattanālku vijayārdhaparva
taṅgaḷindamanite vr̥ṣabhādrigaḷindaṁ caturdaśamahāvāhinigaḷindamesedu,

ā jambūdvīpada naṭṭanaḍuve navanavatiyōjanasahasrōtsēdhamuṁ
yōjanasahasrāvagāhamuṁ sarvaratnajāmbūnadavaiḍūr‍yamayamuṁ antarāntara
nirantarakānta sōma yama varuṇa kubērapramukhalōkapālābhiyōgya diggajēndra
dēvavihāraprāsādābhirāmamuṁ anēkanākanāyakalōkapāḷalīlābhavanā
dhyāsitamuṁ padmavēdikāparivr̥taratnatōraṇāñcitajinabhavanaparivr̥tamuṁ pañca
ratnamayasuśliṣṭāṣṭādaśasahasralakṣaṇavyañjanāṅkitāṣṭaśatakaḷaśabhr̥ṅgārādyupa
karaṇōpaśōbhitamuṁ vaiḍūryadaṇḍamuktāmaṇijāḷāḷaṅkr̥taratnaśalākāśata
kāñcanakumbhabimbarajatacchadacchatravicitrajinēndrapratikr̥tiprakīrṇamuṁ bhadraśālānandana
saumanasapāṇḍukavanavirājitamuṁ pāṇḍukapāṇḍukambaḷaraktakambaḷātirakta
kambaḷaviśālaratnaśilātaḷapratiṣṭhitabhagavajjanmābhiṣēkasiṁhāsanāḷaṅkr̥tamumāgi
ā mandārada pūrvāparadigvibhāgaṅgaḷoḷ vidēhaṅgaḷirduvalli,

lg.l: padanaṁ kāṇasi koḷvuvalli maḻegaḷ ṣaḍbhāgamaṁ koṇḍu ta
ppade bhūpar pratipāḷipar prajegaḷaṁ śrījainadharmaṁ poda
yilamaṟeyēṟu māri pasaviḻdi baṟaṁ peṟavuṁ bhayaṅgaḷā

div.p:
alli paścimavidēhamadhyabhūbhāgakkaḷaṅkāram āgi pañcaśatayōjana
pramāṇavistīrṇamumappa

lg.l: tidu dal nērgiṟidendoḍāva toṟeyuṁ sītōdeyaṁ pōlgumē

div.p:
ā sītōdānadiya teṅkaṇa baḍagaṇa taḍiviḍidirdumeṇṭu nāḻkaḷ
alli -
mattamalli -

lg.l: koṅkida koṅku tadviṣayakānteya purvina koṅkinante ce
ttaṁ kavidalli mellanuge tēṅkuva pūvina saṅkaraṅgaḷaṁ
ldinisaṁ tūḷdi teraḷdesaḷnayanamaṁ kampaṁ koḷalbarpa bhr̥ṁ
llane nōṭakke sadēham āgi suḻiyuttirkuṁ vidēhāniḷaṁ

div.p:
ant’ anēkanadyudyānanānājanapadajanānurāgarasaramaṇīyam appa gandhiḷa
viṣayada naḍuve tanmahīviḷāsiniya mēlkoṇḍa dukūlamumaṁ arhatparamēśvarana
viśadayaśaḥpuñjamumaṁ anukarisi vividhavidagdhavidyādharajanakrīḍānīḍaṅgaḷāgi
dakṣiṇōttaraśrēḍhigaḷge rājadhānigaḷāgirda rathanūpuracakravāḷagaganavallabhādigaḷappa
nūṟapattuṁ poḻalgaḷanoḷakoṇḍu sapādaṣaḍyōjanāvagāhadoḷaṁ pañca
ṣaḍyōjanādhōvistāradoḷaṁ tadardhayōjanōtsēdhadoḷaṁ daśayōjanōpari
mataḷasamānavistāradoḷaṁ vidyādharābhiyōgyadiggajēndravijayārdhakumāra
nivāsādimēkhaḷātrayadoḷaṁ siddhāyatanaprabhr̥ti navakūṭaṅgaḷoḷaṁ neṟedu

lg.l: neneyane pēṟi kendaḷiroḷeyde baḻaldeḷamāvu banda mā
basadiya bāgilaṁ teṟeda māḻkeyoḷirduvu banda māvugaḷ
ṇgoleyiṁ baḷkuva kauṅgu kāyduṟugalaṁ pēṟirda cendeṅgu ka

div.p:
avaṟoḷuttaraśrēḍhiyoḷudagrahimaśikhariśikharaśāradanīradākāra
sudhādhavaḷitōttuṅgaprāsādakūṭakōṭisaṅkīrṇamuṁ ātmīyajātyanu
rūpācaraṇapariṇatacaturajanaparipūrṇamuṁ anēkavidyādhararājarājadrājavīdhī
vistīrṇamumāgi

lg.l: baḷasida ponna kōṇṭe puralakṣmiya kaigeyalirda tāṇadoḷ

div.p:
adanāḷvanakhiḷakhacarapatimakuṭamaṇigaṇakiraṇarāgarañjitacaraṇanaḷina
yugaḷaṁ uditōditanijakulamandarācaḷamandārapādapaṁ anēka samara
sammardananirjitōrjitārātibaḷaṁ atibaḷanembaṁ; ātana mahādēvi nayana
manōhari manōhariyembaḷ,

lg.l: ggalada pogaḻte tannad ene pempu manōharigalladakkumē

div.p:
ā mahābaḷaṁ bālakāladiṁ taguḷdabhyastasamastavidyādharavidyāpāraganuṁ
parisamāptasakaḷakaḷāvijñānanuṁ adhigatāśēṣaśāstranuṁ pariṇatasakaḷaśastranumāgi
yauvanaṁ neṟeye neṟeye

antu mahābaḷakumāraṁ kumārakēḷīviḷāsaviśrāntasvāntaṁ
yuvarājapadavige yōgyanāge,
antu kaṭṭidāgaḷ,

lg.l: nna samastaṁ parivāram emba guṇasaṅghātaṅgaḷaṁ tāḷdi peṁ

div.p:
antu mēle banda kr̥tāntarājavāhiniya sitapatākegaḷananukarisuva
paḷitaṅgaḷaṁ darpaṇadoḷnōḍi kaṇḍu parapatākinīpatākeyaṁ kaṇḍu seragillada
gaṇḍanantinisappoḍaṁ māṇadaduve saṁsāranirvēgakāraṇamāge

lg.l: khyaranā vr̥ttakamellamaṁ tiḷiye pēḻdāśāntamaṁ tāgi tū

div.p:
antu mahābaḷaṅge mahāvibhūtiyindamambaracaraśrīyanittu
bhavyasārthaprārthanīyamuktiśrīyanāsevaṭṭu sakaḷamaḷanirjaraṇakaraṇakāraṇamaṁ
tapaśśrīyaṁ kaikoḷalbagedu sāsirvararasumakkaḷumaynūrvararasiyaruṁ berasu
guṇadhara kēvaḷigaḷa pādapadmamūladoḷ

lg.l: atitr̥ṣṇāparan āgi munne toḍardirdā gāmpe sālguṁ madā
kr̥tiyaṁ māsisi muppu cappariseyuṁ ciḥ kemminoḷkummi saṁ
sr̥tiyoḷmatte gaḍaṁ kaḍaṅgi toḍardāṁ māṇdirpenendaṇmi ghō

div.p:
mattitta mahābaḷakhacarapatiyumātmīyagurunirūpitagaganacara
rājyabhāramanāśaiśavaprabhr̥tiprarūḍhanirbharaprēmarasarumanēkārthaśāstraprayōga
kuśalaruṁ sakaḷakaḷāvagāhanasamāhitamatigaḷum āgi nālkumupadhegaḷoḷaṁ śuddharāgi
nālkumupāyaṅgaḷirpantirda jagatprasiddha svayambuddha mahāmati sambhinnamati
śatamatigaḷ emba nālvarumamātyara meyyoḷniṟisi nirākuḷasvāntanapagatarājya
cintanamarasaundarīviḷāsōpahāsi gaganacarasaundarīmanōnayanasaundaranāgi
vidyādharaśrīyananubhavisi,

div.head: dvitīyāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
āsthānamaṇḍapadoḷ atipracaṇḍamaṇḍaḷikamahāsāmantamantri
pradhānapurōhitāntarvaṁśikādiparivāraparivr̥taṁ uttuṅgasiṁhāsanāsīnaṁ
adhassthitamaṇimayapīṭhavēdikāvinyastavāmapādaṁ ambaracarāṅganā karataḷa
pallavōllasita hēmacāmarapavanavilōladukūlavasanaparivr̥taṁ pañcaratnaprabhā
bhāsuravividhabhūṣaṇaviracitasuraśarāsanaṁ oḍḍōlagaṅgoṭṭire,

lg.l: dire gītārāvadindaṁ neṟeye neṟagoḷal raktakaṇṭhījanaṁ baṁ
nuḍi mogarāgamaṁ paḍeye nōṭamanaṅgana billa balmeyaṁ
bharaṇada miñcu kappurada pāṟuva suṭṭure pūvinurbu ka
tturiya taguḷdu poyva sovaḍā sovaḍoḷ kaḍusorkusorki gā

div.p:
ant’ oḍḍōlagaṅgoṭṭirda vidyādhararājanaṁ svayambuddhaṁ abhyu
dayaparamparānimittaṁ saddharmōpadēśalabdhāvasaranāgi,

lg.l: bhavavārāśinimagnaraṁ daye damaṁ dānaṁ tapaṁ śīlameṁ
bive meyyāgire sanda dharmame valaṁ pottettuguṁ muktipa

div.p:
endu dharmaprabhāvamumaṁ tatphalasvabhāvamumaṁ tiḷipuvavasara
doḷuḻida mahāmati sambhinnamati śatamatigaḷ lōkāyatika yōgācāra
mādhyamikamatavitathābhidhāyigaḷ jīvābhāvamane piḍiyaccuviḍidu,

lg.l: gaḍa baḻikatta bēṟe peṟatondoḍaloḷgaḍa tāne nindoḍaṁ
baḍuvudu dharmakarmaphalamaṁ gaḍa sattane matte puṭṭuvaṁ
gaḍa pusi kāṇa ḍambamidu khēcara nīnidanentu nambidō

div.p:
adalladeyuṁ snāyvalābūdaṇḍāṅguṣṭhāṅguḷiprayatnadiṁ śravaṇa
ramaṇīyakvaṇitamentu negaḻdappudu ante kāyākārapariṇata pr̥thvyaptējō
vāyugaḷattaṇiṁ bandu garbhādimaraṇaparyantaṁ tadātmakaṁ caitanyaṁ puṭṭuguṁ;
adaṟiṁ paralōkamilla; paralōkamilladandu tallōkasukhānubhavāpēkṣeyinaihika
sukhavimukhan āgi śarīrārthavyayammāḍuvātaṁ kayyadaṁ biṭṭu kāladarke
ṟaguvātanaṁ pōlguṁ endu br̥haspatimatānusāriy appa mahāmati nuḍidu māṇda
tadanantaradoḷ vijñānavādamanāśrayisi, pūrvapūrvacittaviśēṣaprabhavaṅga
ḷuttarōttaracittakṣaṇaṅgaḷupādānōpādēyakṣaṇasampr̥ktaṅgaḷ niranvaya
pratikṣaṇaviśarārugaḷ niraṁśaṅgaḷāgiyuṁ bhrāntivaśadiṁ grāhyagrāhakasaṁvēdanākāra
trayākrāntaṅgaḷvijātīyāvyavadhānalaghūtpatti sadr̥śāparāparōtpattiyembivaṟiṁ
vipralabdhabuddhige santānarūpadiṁ puṭṭuttirda vijñānalakṣaṇaṅgaḷātmābhidhānamaṁ
puṭṭisuguṁ. tadēkatvagrāhakapratyabhijñānamuṁ lūnapunarjātanakhakēśādigaḷoḷ
pūrvāparaikatvamilladalliyuṁ kāṇalakkuṁ; appudaṟindaduvuṁ trikālānuyāyi
jīvāstitvamanaṟipalāṟadu; adaṟiṁ paralōkasukhārthamātmāstitvābhinivēśadiṁ
tanudhananidhanammāḍi sēdegiḍalvēḍendu sambhinnamati nijavijñānavādapurassaramātma
nirākaraṇamane nuḍidu māṇe; śūnyavādaprakāśanaparaṁ, āvudantarbahīrūpadiṁ
viśadadarśanāvagamyaṁ adellamasatyāvabhāsi; entu marumarīcikāsvapnēndrajālādi
gaḷoḷ viśadadarśanāvagamyajalakarituraganarādigaḷ ante jāgraddaśāvabhā
samānāntaraṅgabahiraṅgavastugaḷuṁ. adaṟiṁ jīvamembudellittu, paralōka
membudāveḍeyadu, adarke kāraṇam appa pāpapuṇyaṅgaḷettaṇiṁ banduvu? ivellaṁ
gandharvanagaraviḷāsaviḷasitaṅgaḷ. adanaṟiyadabōdhabōdhitatapōdāna vidhānadiṁ
mudhāklēśāyāsaniratar āgi namevarendu śatamatiyumī māḻkeyoḷe
jīvābhāvamane samarthise; tadupanyasta kuhētu kudr̥ṣṭāntānarthakavacanaracanā
pralāpamanavyagrakuśāgrīyabuddhisamr̥ddhaṁ svayambuddhanavadhārisi,

lg.l: danituman ene todaḷa todaḷa deseyill ene mā

div.p:
nimma munne nuḍida kāyākārapariṇatabhūtasvabhāvame caitanya
marthāntarabhūtamall emba nuḍi kāyākārapariṇatabhūtacaitanyaṅgaḷ bahi
rantarmukhāvabhāsigaḷ bālyādirāgādiviruddhadharmādhyāsitaṅgaḷumo
rbanindonde samayadoḷ niyamadiṁ dravyāntarabhāvadiṁ bhinnapramāṇa
grāhyaṅgaḷappudaṟiṁ kūḍibāradu. dēśabhēdadiṁ bēṟevēṟe kāṇalāgadadaṟindadarke
bhēdamembeyappoḍe śarīrarūpapariṇatāvanipavanasakhapavanaṅgaḷge dēśabhēdamilla.
avarkamēkatvam āgi 'catvāryēva tatvāni'y emba ninna mātu vighaṭisuguṁ.
piṣṭōdakādi dravyānvayavyatirēkānuvidhāyiy appa madaśakti entu tatkāryamante
taccaitanyamuṁ bhūtānvayavyatirēkānukāriyappudaṟiṁ bhūtōpādānakāraṇakārya
membī vacanamupādānavikāramallade vikāramaṁ kaikoḷḷadu. upādēya dharmamuṁ
tanna vikāramanupādēyakoppisuva pūrvākāramaṁ bisuṭṭuttarākāramaṁ
kaikoḷvupādānadharmamuṁ bhūtacaitanyaṅgaḷoḷ kāṇalāgadudaṟiṁ kūḍibāradu;
bālyādivayōviśēṣaṅgaḷoḷ śarīraṁ baḷeye caitanyaṁ baḷevudaṟiṁ bhūtōpā
dānakāraṇakāryaṁ caitanyamembeyappoḍeyaduvuṁ hitāhitavivēkavikaḷateyiṁ
ta[mmiṁ] tāme kaṭṭisuva mahākāyaṅgaḷ appa karipatigaḷandaṁ; anaikāntikarkelarta
nutaratanugaḷoḷamativiśadaprajñātiśayamaṁ kāṇalādappudu, śarīravr̥ddhiyoḷ
yuktōktigaḷiṁ bhūtavādiy appa mahāmatiyaṁ nirākarisi, viśvavijñānavāda
membidaṁ vijñānadinde nīṁ sādhisuveyappoḍe sādhyasādhanaṅgaḷavyaktamappadaṟiṁ
sādhyaṁ niścayamāgadu, vijñānavyatiriktasādhana vākyōpanyāsadiṁ sādhisuvoḍā
vākyamuṁ bahirartham appudaṟiṁ bāhyārthasiddhiyakkuṁ; ā vākyamuṁ vijñāna
membeyappoḍe pūrvōkta dōṣapāṣāṇasañcūrṇitamatiyye ēnanētaṟo
ḷniścayisuvai mattaṁ vijñānaṁ vijñānāntaragrāhakamakkumappoḍāva māḻkeyoḷ
vijñānāntaram appudā māḻkeyoḷe bahirarthasiddhiy āgi sarvapratyayanirālambana
vādaṁ kiḍuguṁ aduvuṁ vijñānāntaragrāhiyāgadappoḍe santānāntaranirasanamakkuṁ
anumānadiṁ santānāntaramaṁ sādhisuvenembeyappoḍe bahirarthasiddhiyakku; mattaṁ
vijñānamātramallade peṟatillakkumappoḍe vijñānamātrame tatvamembī vacana
vijñānaṅgaḷ, bāhyārthaśūnyaṅgaḷappudaṟinanantyaṅgaḷakkumādandasatyētaravibhāgaṅgaḷaṁ
paḍeyalāgadu, adu sādhanadūṣaṇavrayōgānyathānupapattiyiṁ bahirartha
siddhiyakkumadaṟiṁ vijñānamātrame tatvamātmādi tatvamill emba ninna mātu
bhinnabhājanasamānam endu sambhinnamatigaṁ pratibhābhaṅgamaṁ māḍi sakaḷabahiraṅgānta
raṅgatatvaṅgaḷ śūnyaṅgaḷembidanaṟipuva bhavatpratyayābhidhānaṅgaḷ śūnyaṅgaḷe
akkumappoḍe sarvaśūnyamembī ninna mātu keṭṭupōkuṁ tatpratyayābhidhānaṅgaḷuḷḷoḍe
aventoḷavante vastugaḷellamoḷavappudaṟinanādyanidhanasvabhāvanuṁ sukr̥taduṣkr̥ta
karmōpārjananuṁ tatphalabhājananuṁ sūkṣmarūpanumanantajñānādi guṇarūpanuṁ
saṁharaṇavisarpaṇāsvarūpanumātmōpāttaśarīrapramāṇanumutpādavyaya
dravyātmakanuṁ sakaḷakarmanirmūlanakaranuṁ trilōkaśikhariśēkharanumappa
jīvanuṇṭendu śatamativerasu mūvaruṁ prativādigaḷanapratihatapratibheyina
pagatapratibharmāḍi sabhāpatiyāgirda mahābaḷanumaṁ prāśnikarāgirda vidvajjana
mumaṁ sabhājanamumaṁ tiḷipi,

lg.l: pusiya parāṅganāratada madyada māṁsada meygoṟalda du

div.p:
endu mattamavarane tiḷipuva bageyiṁ dr̥ṣṭaśrutānubhūtakathegaḷaṁ tadanvaya
sambandhigaḷanint’ endu pēḻaltaguḷdaṁ, ītana santatiyoḷaravindanembanambaracaraṁ
nijamanōvijayi vijayiyembaḷge puṭṭida hariścandra kuruvindaremba
nijatanūjaroḍane khēcaragōcaravibhavamananubhavisi bahvārambhasaṁrambharaudradhyāna
pariṇatanupārjitanarakāyuṣyaṁ pratyāsannamr̥tyuv āgi,

ant’ anēkaprakāraśītaḷakriyegaḷiṁ śarīrasantāpamanentuṁ māṇisalāṟade
puṇyakṣayadoḷtanna vidyegaḷuṁ tanage besakeyyadire hariścandran emba tanna piriya maganaṁ
karedu tanna dussahāvasthāntaramanaṟipi nīnennaṁ ninna gaganagāminīvidyeyinuttara
kuruvaneydisu; alliya suratarugaḷa taṇṇeḻalgaḷoḷaṁ kalpalateya jompaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
sītānadītaraṅgāliṅgitasantānalatālatāntasurabhitaramandāravanavīdhīvihāra
pariśrāntapavamānasparśanadiṁ madīyāṅgasaṅgataparitāpavanāṟisuvenendu
nijanandanaṅge pēḻdoḍātanuṁ tanna payōdharapathagāminīvidyeyaṁ besasidoḍe
narakagamanābhimukhanāgirdaravindaṅgupakāraṅgeyvudenagaśakyam ene vidyāvacanadināta
nāsannamr̥tyuvanaṟidu viṣaṇṇamananudāsīnanāgirdaṁ; annegaṁ parasparakalaha
kaluṣitagr̥hakōkiḷaṅgaḷondondaṁ tine panita śōṇitabindugaḷ tanna meyge
pāpaparipākadiṁ taṇpaṁ paḍeye paramauṣadhamaṁ paḍedenendu karamosedaravindaṁ
kuruvindanaṁ karedutpannavibhaṅgajñānadiṁ mr̥gaṅgaḷirdeḍeyanaṟidu niṣkaruṇa
navaṟaruṇajaḷadoḷenage līlāsarōvaramaṁ nīḍillade māḍendu pēḻdoḍavanā
nistriṁśakarmakke kokkarisi pāpabhīruvappudaṟiṁ tandeya taduparōdhadiṁ manamallada
manadoḷ taduddiṣṭamr̥gāvāsamaneydi divyajñānigaḷanallirdaraṁ kaṇḍu nivēdita
nijajanakavr̥ttāntanavara vacanadinātmīyapitr̥maraṇamumanātana narakagatigamana
mumanaṟidu karuṇārasārdrahr̥dayanadaṁ māḍalāṟade lākṣādravādikārita
māyāruṇajalaparipūrṇavāpiyaṁ sameyisidoḍadaṁ kaṇḍu rāgisi pokku
nīḍumōlāḍi mukkuḷisi nōḍi kr̥takarudhiram appudanaṟidī būtennaṁ bañcisidanendu
neṟeyada narakāyuṣyamaṁ neṟapuvanembante muḷidu ghūrṇamānalōhita
lōcanaṁ daśananipīḍitadaśanavasananasidhēnuvaṁ kiḻtu naḍanaḍanaḍugi taḍadaḍisuttu
miṟiyal parivātaṁ vāpīsōpānamanaḍaruttuṁ jāṟevaridu keḍeduradoḷ
naṭṭa surige bennoḷmūḍe gatajīvitan āgi narakakkiḻidanidanīgaḷumī purajanaṅgaḷpēḻe
kēḷalakkuṁ. mattamītana vaṁśadoḷī poḻaloḷ negaḻtevettaṁ daṇḍitārātimaṇḍaḷaṁ
daṇḍakanembanātana manōnayanasaundari saundariyembaḷavarge puṭṭida
maganugrapratāpavijitāṁśumāḷi maṇimāḷiyembonāge palakālamarasugeydu,

lg.l: iḷeyaṁ ghātisi takkaraṁ kavardukoṇḍādarthamaṁ pūḻdu mi
daḷavaṁ māṇisi sattu daṇḍakanr̥paṁ lōbhābhibhūtaṁ viṣā
viḷadaṁṣṭraṁ śvayuv āgi puṭṭi suḻiguṁ muṁ bayta bhaṇḍāradoḷ

div.p:
ant’ ārtadhyānadoḷajagaran āgi tanna munnina sañcitavastugaḷaṁ kāvandu
magaṁ maṇimāḷiyaṁ kaṇḍu jātismaran āgi maṇimāḷiyalladuḻidarārumaṁ
sāralīyade bhaṇḍāramaṁ kādukoṇḍirpudumondu divasaṁ maṇimāḷi
raticāraṇar emba cāraṇaranavadhijñānigaḷaṁ kaṇḍajagaravr̥ttāntamaṁ besagoṇḍu
viṣamaviṣadharanātmīyajanakanendaṟidu tatsamīpakke vandu,

endu tannaṁ pratibōdhisida nijatanūjana vacanatigmarōciruci
nicayadinātmīyacētōnicitamōhāndhatamastōmamaṁ kaḷedu kr̥tānu
śayananaśanavidhānadinasuvaṁ visarjisi saudharmakalpadoḷ dēvanāgi,

lg.l: vanikāyaṁ berasappikoṇḍu divadoḷ mēl appa ratnaṅgaḷeṁ
tanumīgaḷ neṟe toṭṭu bandanidanēṁ nīmellaruṁ kāṇirē

div.p:
idannegamanubhūtamidalladeyuṁ vayōdhikavyōmacarapratyakṣamī
mahābaḷana pitr̥pitāmahaṁ sahasrabaḷanembanambaracaranātmīyaśrīyananubhavisi
viṣayaviraktan āgi nijarājyapadaviyoḷ tanna piriya magan appa

lg.l: śatabaḷanātmajaṅge negaḻdī khacarēndrana tandey appa saṁ

div.p:
gr̥hītōpāsakavratananaśanāvamōdaryādyācaraṇapariṇataṁ
yathōcitavidhiyindāyuravasānadoḷe saṁsārakṣapakan āgi samādhānapurassaraṁ
sanyasanavidhānadiṁ parityaktajīvitaṁ māhēndrakalpadoḷaṇimādyaṣṭaguṇaiśvaryō
pētanuṁ saptasāgarapramitajīvitanuṁ labdhātmalābhanum āgi namma kumārakāladandu
nīmumāmuṁ mahābaḷanuṁ krīḍānimittaṁ pōgi mandaramahīdharada nandana
vanadoḷ vanakrīḍeyanāḍuttumirpinamalliyakr̥trimacaityālayamaṁ bandisalā
mahēndrakalpajanuṁ mahāvibhūtiyiṁ bandu,

lg.l: k ene kaṇḍaḻkartu nōṭaṁ berasu parasi taḻkaisikoṇḍamma nīṁ ma
janamellaṁ tiḷidattu nimma manadiṁ mithyākaḷaṅkaṁ tera

div.p:
endu parapakṣadūṣaṇapurassaramanēkōpapattigaḷiṁ svapakṣasthāpanaṁ geydu
sanmārgaprakāśanadiṁ mārgaprabhāvaneyaṁ māḍi sabhāsadariṁ labdhapraśaṁsanāgi,

antu mahābaḷakhacarēndraṁ svayambuddhane tanage paramaviśvāsa
bhūmiyāge tatparyāḷōcitakāryaparyavasānanuṁ manōbhilaṣita
viṣayasukhānubhavaniratanumāgimūvattāṟulakke purbaṁ rājyaṅgeyye,

lg.l: paḍedabaḷājanaṁ nereda makkaḷa makkaḷa nīḷdadondu dāṁ

div.p:
mattondu puṇyadinadoḷ svayambuddhaṁ agaṇyapuṇyōpārjanakara
saparyāsamētaṁ aparimitabhaktiyiṁ parimitaparijanaparivr̥tan āgi pōgi,
antu nōḍi

endu nijaparijanakellaṁ pogaḻuttuṁ bhadraśāladiṁ taguḷdu pāṇḍuka
vanambaramadaṟa neleyoḷirda kr̥trimacaityālayaṅgaḷanakhiḷajagatpāvanakarasarassarasī
sarinnāthatīrthajalaṅgaḷindamatimasr̥ṇaghasr̥ṇa gōśīrṣa candanāgurukarpūra
sammiśrita surabhigandhaṅgaḷindamagaṇyapuṇyapuñjāṅkurānukāri kaḷamākṣataṅgaḷindamā
mōdamōditōddāmavācālaṣaṭcaraṇakuḷākuḷa kusumadāmaṅgaḷindaṁ anēka
bhakṣyōpadaṁśarasapracuracārucarukaṅgaḷindaṁ ākāśasphaṭikakaḷaśasthūlakarpūrapāḷī
pradīpaṅgaḷindaṁ atibahaḷadahyamāna kāḷāgurudhūpadhūmayaṣṭighaṭitaghana
śyāmaḷitavyōmataḷadhūpaṅgaḷindaṁ atisurabhisurasasuruciphalanicayaṅgaḷindaṁ matta
muttaptajāmbūnada kusumadāmaṅgaḷinduddīpitaratnapradīpaṅgaḷindaṁ atitaraḷa
muktāmaṇipralambagaḷindaṁ anēkaprakāradēvāṅgavastravistāritaratnasañcitamaṇi
vitānaṅgaḷindaṁ anukramandappadarcisi nirvartitadēvatārcanan āgi saumanasavanada
paulastyajinabhavanaṅgaḷoḷinisānuṁ bēgamirpannegaṁ;

antu pūrvavidēhada sītānadiya baḍagaṇa taḍiya mahākaccha viṣayada
ariṣṭapuradindaṁ yugandharatīr‍thasarasīhaṁsanāyakarenisida gaganacāraṇarādityagatigaḷu
mariñjayarumembar avadhijñānigaḷ pavanamārgadindiḻivudaṁ kaṇḍu pāda
mārgadoḷ kiṟidantaradoḷ avanatipurassaramidirgoṇḍu tatkriyāparisamāpti
pratīkṣaṇaparanavaraṁ gurubhaktipūrvakaṁ bandisi sakaḷaśrāvakavratārōpaṇapavitranāgi
dharmakathāprasaṅgadoḷaṁ labdhaprastāvaṁ avaroḷādityagatigaḷaṁ

lg.l: nmādadoḷī vimōhadoḷadēke gaḍaṁ bageyaṁ taguḷci be

div.p:
endu besagoṇḍoḍe ātanabhavyanallaṁ bhavyanē. bhavyanāgiyumāsanna
bhavyaṁ; entendoḍe jambūdvīpadaparavidēhadoḷ gandhiḷamembudu viṣayaṁ,
ā viṣayaviḷāsinige tiḷakamirpantirdudu vijitasurapuraṁ siṁhapuramembudu
puraṁ. adanāḷvanatuḷabhujabaḷasañcūrṇitārātipāṣāṇaṁ śrīṣēṇanembarasaṁ;
ātaṅge,

lg.l: gondondane nerapi māḍidaṁ bidiy ene hr̥

div.p:
avaroḷ kiṟiyātane nr̥patigaṁ parivārakkamaṇugan āgi baḷeye palakālaṁ
śrīṣēṇanarasugeydu;

lg.l: ḻpaḍadārtaṇmi tapakke pōpa padadoḷ tannagraputraṁ kramaṁ

div.p: ā jayavarmanumavamānapavamānāvadhūtan āgi pōgi,

antu jātarūpadharan āgi tanna paṟidu bisuṭa sahasrakuntaḷaṅgaḷaṁ tanna
taḷadoḷ temaḷdikoṇḍu tumbiya bambalgaḷaṁ kendāvareyaralgaḷoḷ
pudiduyvantuydu,

lg.l: gaḍe pasivaḻve nīḷda pogeyuṁ kiḍiyuṁ bisusuyya gāḷiyoḷ

div.p: ā prastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: posayise sōṅkinoḷ naliva nallaḷalampanoḍarce līle ka

div.p:
bhōṅk ene kaṇḍu viṣamaviṣadharaviṣapūritaśarīramanoyyanoyyane āṟisi
bandu kiviyoḷ paḷañcalerdeyaṁ piḍidaluguva sīyan appa gītātōdya
nādakkamidiroḷe kaṇge vandu bageyanuṟe seṟeviḍida vidyādharaviḷāsakkaṁ bekkasaṁ
baṭṭīgaḷenna tapambaṭṭa phaḷamuṇṭakkumappoḍe vidyādharanappenakkendā vidyādhara
vimānamaṁ nōḍi,

lg.l: alliye kaṇ paḷañce manamalliye kīlise neccu meccu ta

div.p:
antu munnina bhavadoḷādalampu pompuḻivōge bayasi paḍeda
vidyādharaśrīyaninnegaṁ bisuḍalāṟadirdoḍamēnādudu -

lg.l: rvina koḻenārpa kōḻkesaṟa bāviyoḷarde kaḍaṅgi bandu nī
nanibarumaṁ karaṁ kaḻale baggisi tannanugram appa kāṁ

div.p:
kaṇḍu tadaśubhasvapnadarśanakke kokkarisi bhavadāgamanapratīkṣaṇaparanāgirdaṁ.
ātaṅge tadutthita śikhiśikhākaḷāpapraśamanadarśanadindondu tiṅgaḷāyuṣyaṁ. ātaniṁ
munnaṁ ninnī kanasugaḷaṁ pēḻa; pēḻaloḍamātaṁ ninna mātane pavaṇmāḍi pēḻdudaṁ
kaikoḷguṁ antu kaikoṇḍu,

lg.l: īgaḷ nīnirdu nōnise nōntu mahābaḷaṁ lalitāṅgaṁ vajrajaṅghaṁ
musu muttante teraḷda tanna mogamaṁ kaṇḍaḷkanō kūḍe jō
bisuḍaṁ munnina tanna lampaḷikeyaṁ mattaṁ jarājarjaraṁ

div.p:
ant’ ātmagatadoḷe bageyuttuṁ bandu khacarapatiyaneydi tatprapañcamaṁ
saprapañcamaṟipi,

lg.l: nnina caritaṅgaḷaṁ neneyadir n ene jainapadāmbujaṅgaḷaṁ

div.p: antum allade,

lg.l: posatondāytu mamatvamaṁ bisuṭu nīnēkatvamaṁ bhavya bhā

div.p: antum alladeyuṁ,

endu parimitahitavacanaṅgaḷiṁ muṭṭi nuḍidu tanna kaṇḍu kanasugaḷa
nanukramandappadaṟipida mantrimukhyana nuḍiyoḷapagatakaluṣahr̥dayanāgi,

lg.l: jare bandoṭṭaise māṇdirdaḷipenagide muṁ sāladē kāḷarājaṁ
karaṇīyaṁ ninna vākyaṁ nijamatame mataṁ meccidantennanī saṁ

div.p:
endu paricchēdisi manamaṟiye nuḍidu nijagr̥hōdyānada
jinabhavanadoḷeṇṭudivasambaraṁ mahāmaham emba jinamahimeyaṁ mahā
vibhūtiyiṁ mahābaḷaṁ māḍidimbaḻiyaṁ nijāptavargamumaṁ sāmanta
vargamumaṁ barisi kavacaharanāda nijasutanatibaḷakumāranaṁ rājyabhāradoḷ
niṟisi,

lg.l: piḍidirimenna pambalanidaṁ bisuḍiṁ biḍim endu khēcaraṁ

div.p:
antu nijāptavargamumaṁ bandhuvargamumaṁ vidyegaḷumaṁ biḍisi
vidyādharaprasādhanamenagindinoḷinitembante neṟeye kaigeydu maṇimayaśibikā
rūḍhan āgi poḻalaṁ poṟamaṭṭanēkahāṭakūṭakōṭighaṭitasiddhakūṭamaṁ
tripradakṣiṇaṅgeydu jinēndrārcanāpurassaraṁ vācanāgrahaṇasamētamārādhaneyi
narcisi vīrasaṁsthānārūḍhanādāgaḷ,

lg.l: arasara maccu tamma manadoḷ nile sairisadantanityamī
narara vibhūtiy emba bage bandire māṇade tammatamma pu

div.p:
āgaḷā svayambuddhaṁ niryāpakācāryan āgi pañcagurusamakṣadoḷ
bāhyābhyantaraparigrahaparityāgapurassaraṁ vīrasaṁsthānārūḍhanaṁ mahābaḷanaṁ
cātarūpadharanaṁ māḍi caturvidhāhāraśarīrapratyākhyānamaṁ koṭṭu,
antu toreyisi,

endā mahānubhāvana pēḻda māḻkeyoḷirpatteraḍu divasambaraṁ
vīraśayyātaḷagatanāgire,
antu nōntu,

lg.l: sogayipa munninirda parijiṁ kaḍucelvu gaḍaṁ jinēndranaṁ
bageva manaṁ gaḍaṁ muguḷdu jānipa kaṇgaḍamātmatattvadoḷ
lage gaḍamēṁ samādhividhiyaṁ neṟe tāḷdidanō mahābaḷaṁ
intanavadyam appa padadoḷ patiyaṁ naḍeyalke pēḻdu tā

div.p:
antu mahābaḷakhacarēndraṁ prāyōpagamanavidhiyindamātmīya
śarīrabhāramaniḻipi tatsamayadoḷanalpasukhanivāsamenisidīśānakalpadoḷapratihata
cañcatpañcaratnaprabhāprasaraprakaṭita sandhyābhravibhramabhrājiy appa divyataḷpataḷada
poreyoḷage [negeda kemmugila tegaḷigeya poreyoḷ porevoreyallade]
toḷatoḷatoḷagi poṟamaḍuveḷanēsaṟa baḷagada beḷaganoḷakoṇḍu,
antu puṭṭidāgaḷ,

lg.l: teṟeya[ve] munna ketta paḍigaḷ navasaurabhamuṇme mokkaḷaṁ

div.p: adaṟa tadanantaradoḷ,

lg.l: logedudu jaya jīya nanda vardhasva ravaṁ

div.p:
mattamamaralōkānēkavādyaṅgaḷa layaṅgaḷoḷaṁ pūtajaṅgamalate
gaḷanteṟagi tanna munde bandāḍuvaccarasiyarumaṁ anēkabhaṅgibhr̥ṅgāramaṇidarpaṇa
kanakakaḷaśacārucāmarātapatrapavitritakarapallaveyar āgi sēsikkalendu bandamara
purandhriyarumaṁ āḷōkanamātradoḷe manamanugibagimāḍi maseda madananalagi
nalargaḷante kaṇṇoḷeḷasi baḷasi bandirda pāṭadāṭada muddina bardina parivāra
dēviyarumaṁ atilalitabhūṣābhyasanacaturabhāṣāviśēṣakuśaleyar appa dēvaviḷāsini
yarumaṁ bhōṅk ene kaṇḍu,
neṟeyaṟidu,

lg.l: idu dēvēndranivāsamenna neleyuṁ śrī śrīprabhaṁ munde niṁ
ppudu muṁ khēcararājanāda bhavadoḷ saypiṁ svayambuddhaneṁ

div.p:
endu bagevannegamettida namērumandārapārijātada baṇṇavāsigaṅgaḷuṁ
muttina māṇikada paḍaligegaḷoḷ pasarisida vicitra vastrābharaṇaṅgaḷuṁ cembonna
taḷigegaḷoḷ tekkane tīvida biḍumuttina sēsegaḷuṁ berasu mahattaradēviyar
bandu poḍevaṭṭu,

lg.l: idu sukhadondu tuttatudi rāgada mottamodal nirantarā
dudu ninag appa kāraṇadinīgaḷe pūjisu caityarājiyaṁ

div.p:
embudumamaralōkadarśanānantarōtpannarāgasāgarōdārapūra
pariplāvitāntaraṅgananusaṅgatātyaṅganuttuṅgamaṇibhūṣaṇamarīcimēcakitadēvāṅga
nānikāyasamētanīśānakalpadakr̥trimacaityālayaṅgaḷaṁ arcisi taptatapanīyacchāyanuṁ
saptahastōcchrayanuṁ nidrālasyākṣinimēṣajarāśōkaviṣādavirahitanuṁ sahaja
surabhigandhabandhuranuṁ ēkapārāvārōpamāyuṣyanuṁ varṣasahasrasaṅkalpa
kalpitāmr̥tāhāranuṁ ardhamāsaniryatsurabhiniśvāsanuṁ kāyapravīcāranuṁ
aparimlānasurataruprasūnaśēkharanum āgi nālsāsirvar manōnayanavallabheya
roḷaṁ svayamprabhe kanakalate kanakamāḷe vidyullatey emba nālvar mahādēviya
roḷaṁ,

lg.l: peṇedu viḷāsadoḷ toḍardu keytamalampane māḍe nōḍi kaṇ
ṇgoḷe saviyaṁ puduṅgoḷipa citrarataṅgaḷa bhaṅgigaḷ manaṁ
goḷe nage sabbavaṁ binadamembivaṟiṁ lalitāṅganaṁ manaṁ
kaḻiye viḷāsamaṁ paḍeda rāgada bhōgadalampinimpu poṁ
puḻiy ene tadvimānadoḷe puṭṭida tannaya dēviyar palar

div.p:
annegaṁ svayamprabhābhidhāneyar palambarumatikrānteyarāge tatsantāna
doḷ śrīprabhavimānadoḷupapādataḷpataḷada poreyoḷaṁ porevoreyillada
madanarāgarasadoḷ poredu,

lg.l: prabhe lalitāṅganaḷḷerdege toṭṭane bēṇṭame puṭṭe puṭṭidaḷ
adu sukhadondu piṇḍamadu puṇyada puñjamadaṅgajaṅge bā

div.p:
mattamākeverasūrme nandīśvaramahāmahimegaṁ pañcakalyāṇō
tsavakkamacyutēndranoḍane nijapūjāviḷāsamaṁ meṟeyalendu pōgi vividha
divyadravyārcanegaḷiṁ trailōkyapūjyanaṁ pūjisiyumōrorme,

div.head: tr̥tīyāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
ant’ ātmapuṇyōpārjitāmaralōkabhōgamēkasāgarapramitajīvi
tamaṟudiṅgaḷuḻidudembandiṅge,

mattaṁ tanna pōgiṅge naḍanaḍanaḍuguvante naḍuguvupavanada kalpavr̥kṣaṁ
gaḷumaṁ tannagalkege binnanirpante binnanāgirpa vimānada maṇikuṭṭimabhūmigaḷumaṁ
āgaḷāgaḷe tannaṁ peṟar piḍidu tegevante tanage tāne poṇmuva bhayamumaṁ
bhōṅk ene kaṇḍu nākalōkacyutiyanāgaḷaṟidu manadoḷaḷki beḷkanevōgi,

endu sairisade kāmasāmrājyasar‍vasvabhūtey appa tanna nallaḷa mogamaṁ
nōḍi,

lg.l: yvantakan emba būtanele māṇisalāgade pēḻ svayamprabhē

div.p:
endu dhair‍yamaṁ pattaviṭṭu atipralāpaṅgeyva lalitāṅgadēvanaṁ
sāmānikadēvaraidevandu,

lg.l: vaneyaṁ tāḷdaḻtiyindaṁ jinamahimegaḷaṁ māḍu nīṁ bhavyanai ma

div.p:
antu nōḍe nōḍe śaratsamayasamuditajaḷadhararūpadindadr̥śya
rūpan āgi jambūdvīpada mēruvina mūḍaṇa vidēhada sītānadiya baḍagaṇa
taḍiyoḷaśēṣajanapadajanānurāgajananasamastasasyasampatprada puṣkaḷāvatīviṣaya
doḷanēkajaḷacarakuḷakaḷaravaparasparōccālita vīcīcayajaḷadhinibha vibhavaparikhā
parivr̥tamuṁ udagracañcatkāñcanamayaviśālabhittiparītamuṁ antargata
dhavaḷavipuḷaprāsādanirantaraniruddhabhūmibhāgamuṁ upavanalatākusumaparimaḷa
samīraṇāndōḷitaprāsādapatākāvaruddhāmbaramuṁ nīlōtpalavanaṣaṇḍa
sañchannamum appudu

lg.l: patpati vajrajaṅghan ene tallalitāṅgane bandu puṭṭidaṁ

div.p:
ā rājakumārananēkakalākalāpapravīṇanāgi, yuvarājalakṣmiyoḍane
vistāramaṁ kaikoṇḍa vakṣassthaḷamuṁ bandhujanamanōrathaṅgaḷoḍane podaḷkevaḍeda
vr̥ttōrustambhaṅgaḷuṁ poḍarva pagevaroḍane karamasidāda madhyapradēśamuṁ pagevara
peṇḍira suyyoḍane niḍiyavāda tōḷgaḷuṁ yaśaḥprasaradoḍane nīḷpaṁ
beḷpumanoḷakoṇḍu kisuserevarida kaṇgaḷuṁ ājñeyoḍane kulaśikhariśikharōttuṅgaṁ
gaḷāda bhujaśikharaṅgaḷuṁ saradoḍane gambhīramāda dakṣiṇāvartanābhiyuṁ adhara
pallavadoḍane aśōkapallavānuraktaṅgaḷāda pāṇipādataḷaṅgaḷuṁ lalāṭapaṭṭadoḍane
lalitōnnataṅgaḷāda poṟaaḍigaḷuṁ ugurgaḷoḍane dīptiyoḷ pudidu
madhuravarṇamāda dantapaṅktigaḷuṁ ātmīyayauvanaprādurbhāvamaṁ prakaṭammāḍe,

lg.l: ā divijēndralōkadiravuṁ pesaruṁ tanagilli bandu bē
ṟādude bhēdamaṅgaruci rūpina pompuḻi gāḍiyēḻge mē

div.p:
antu gaganataḷakusumamane bayasi maruḷgoṇḍa maruḷante dēva
lōkadoḷinitānuṁ kālamanubhavisidanubhavakke modaligeyenisidā svayamprabheyaṁ
nenenenedu,

lg.l: kuḍumiñcaṁ masedannar appa palaroḷveṇḍir manaṅgoṇḍu baṁ
kaḍugampaṁ savidondu tumbi pasiviṁ meḻpaṭṭu baṇḍuṇṇadi

div.p: annegamīśānakalpadoḷā śrīprabhavimānadoḷ,
ant’ ā svayamprabhāmahādēvi nijaprāṇavallabhaviyōgavidhurey āgi,

lg.l: murideḻeduyye ninnaniradantakanāṁ naḍe nōḍe nōḍe nīṁ

div.p:
endu nijaprāṇavallabhaviyōgaśōkōdrēkavyākuḷeyāgirda
tatsvayamprabhādēviya samīpakke mahattaradēviyar bandu,
embudumadane manadēgoṇḍu,

lg.l: tsannaśarīrey āgi divadindiḻidaḷ gaḍam appudantu beṁ

div.p:
antu niśāntatārakākāradindadr̥śyarūpiy āgi jambūdvīpada
pūrvavidēhada puṇḍarīkiṇiy emba poḻalanāḷva vajradantabhūpatigamātana
manōrathajanmabhūmiyenisida lakṣmīmatimahādēvigaṁ,

lg.l: kāmana mantradēvateyo kāmana vidyeyo baddharaṁ gelal
alarva padakke bandaleva tembelarillade māṇda mallikō

div.p:
ondu divasamā kanne tanna cembonna kannemāḍadōvariyoḷage
gaṅgātaraṅgadhavaḷadukūlapracchadācchāditamr̥dutaḷpataḷadoḷ pavaḍisire
niśāvasānasamayadoḷ tatpurabahirbhāgasthitamanōharōdyānāsīna
yaśōdharagurugaḷa kēvaḷajñānōtpattiyosagege,

lg.l: taradoḷe pottu pūmaḻeya kampanitimpu podaḷdu bandu baṁ

div.p:
antu navajaḷadaninadamaṁ kēḷda haṁsavaniteyantā vanite śaṅkeverasu
bhōṅkeneḻcattu saudhōparimataḷadoḷ nindu dēvāgamanamaṁ nōḍaloḍaṁ
pūrvabhavasmaraṇam āgi dēvalōkada lalitāṅgadēvanaṁ nenedu,

cāmaradaḍapada ḍavakeya kannaḍiya paricārikeyarumoḍanāḍi baḷeda
mēḷada keḷadiyarumativikaḷamatigaḷ āgi paritandu malayajarasaluḷitakadaḷī
daḷavyajanamandamārutāndōḷanadinentānuṁ mūrcheyindeḻcaṟisi besagoḷe
maṟumātuguḍadeyuṁ manaṅguḍadeyumire naḍugi paridu kanyāntaḥpuramahattara
dēviyar bandu vajradantaṅgaṁ lakṣmīmatimahādēvigamaṟipidoḍavarirvaruṁ
sasambhramaṁ bandu,

lg.l: initēkādudo nōvidemma deseyiṁ mēṇādudō mēṇ sakhī
janadiṁ bandudo ninna bandhujanadiṁ mēṇ puṭṭitō matsuhr̥
jjanadiṁ mēṇ toḍardatto vismayamidēṁ pēḻembuduṁ kūḍe ka

div.p: ant’ adaṁ kaṇḍu mattaṁ,

lg.l: dodaviṁ tambulamaṁ koḷal maṟedu nīnirdandamēṁ kandi kuṁ

div.p:
endu tannagramahiṣiya manamanāṟe nuḍidu paṇḍiteyaṁ nīnīke
[yamā] ninna balla māḻkeyoḷellamellandadoḷamoḍambaḍisi manaṅgalvudendu
niyōjisi pōdaṁ. annegamā mahīpatiya pūrvajanmada puṇyōdayadiṁ,

antu vajradantacakravarti labdhāvadhilōcanaṁ trailōkyalōcanaṅge
sāṣṭāṅgapraṇatan āgi maguḻdu bandu cakrapūjeyaṁ nirvartisi parākramākrāntārāti
cakranuṁ sādhitadikcakranumāgalbagedu gajaturagarathapadātidivijavidyādharabalaṁ berasu
digjayōdyōgadiṁ pōdaṁ. annegamitta paṇḍiteyumatiśōkākrāntamatiyaṁ
śrīmatiyanorbaḷane kannemāḍada peṟagaṇa nandanavanakkuydadaṟoḷage,

lg.l: nuḍidaḷ nīnenagintu ninna bageyaṁ kādakka pēḻāroḷiṁ

div.p:
embuduṁ svabhāvamugdhe mugdhavadanavanajamaneṟagi tanna munnina
janmaṅgaḷanint’ endu baredu tōrpante nelanaṁ bareyuttumapagatamukhamudreyāgi,

lg.l: bageya baykeyanoppisuvāgaḷ nīne valaṁ dore pēḻdapeṁ
bagedu kēḷ naḍe nōḍaloḍaṁ dēvāgamamaṁ piridondu daṁ

div.p:
adentendoḍe ānī bhavakke mūṟaneya bhavadoḷ ī dhātakīṣaṇḍada
mūḍaṇa mandaradaparavidēhada sītānadiya baḍagaṇa taḍiya gandhiḷaviṣayada
pāṭaḷigrāmadoḷ nāgadattan emba paradaṅgamātana paraditi vasudattegaṁ puṭṭida
nanda nandimitra nandiṣēṇa varaṣēṇa jayasēnarembarayvar tanayarindaṁ
madanakānteyuṁ śrīkāntemembir‍var tanūjeyarindaṁ ā kaḍeya garbhadoḷ
nelasaloḍaṁ asmadanyajanmōpārjita dāruṇakarmaprēraṇeyindaṁ,

antu madīyajananiyuṁ jananiya jananiyumuḻiyalumuḻidarumella
morvaruḻiyadante pōpudumarasara deseyiṁ maneyuṁ kavartevōpuduṁ peṟara
kīḻiloḷemmabbeyuṁ muttabbeyuṁ sārdu badagugeyduṇe navamāsaṁ neṟedāṁ
puṭṭuvuduṁ enna meyya durgandhakke pēsi kaṇḍavarellameḻedu kaḷeye parētavana
bhūmiyoḷ jīrṇaśīrṇacīraṅgaḷindaṁ pudidirisi pōgi tāvirbaruṁ tiridu
tandikkideñjalevuḻumaṁ tindu pesarumillade nirnāmikeyendu pesar āgi baḷeye,
antu pokkadarke tiḷakamirpantirdambaratiḷakam emba girivarada mēge,

kaṇḍu poḍevaḍuvanituvaramenna manadoḷ aṟivilladeyuṁ asavasadoḷ āda
manadeṟakadineṟagi poḍevaṭṭu,

adentendoḍī viṣayada paḷāḷakūṭagrāmadoḷ dēvilanemba
grāmakūṭaṅgamātana kuṭumbini vasumatigaṁ dhanaśrīy emba magaḷ āgi puṭṭi nīṁ
mattondu divasamātmīyavihārabhūmisamīpasthita triguptiguptasamādhiguptar emba
yatipatigaḷadhyayanaṁ ninaganiṣṭam appudaṟinadhyayanāntarāyamaṁ māḍal endavarōdu
vāvāsadoḷ saṅklēśamāge sāramēyapūtikaḷēvaramanikkidoḍavar ninna
pāpōpacayakāraṇadurācaritamaṁ nōḍi,
embudumā nuḍige nīṁ berci bēgamadaneḻedu kaḷedu,

lg.l: aṟiyade geydudarke munipuṅgava nīṁ kṣamiyippudendu kā
maṟugisi ninnanī padake tandudu munnina geyda dōṣami

div.p:
embudumā mumukṣugaḷa samakṣadoḷavara pēḻda māḻkeyoḷe
paramajinapatiparibhāṣitam appa sakaḷaśrāvakavrataṅgaḷaṁ ṣōḍaśatīrthakarabhāvanegaḷaṁ
catustriṁśadatiśayaṅgaḷumanaṣṭamahāprātihār‍yaṅgaḷumaṁ pañcamahākalyāṇaṁ
gaḷumaṁ nāmōddēśaṅgeydu pāraṇeya divasamalladaṟuvattumūṟudivasa
dindupavāsadiṁ sameye jinaguṇasampattiyumanirpattondu matijñānabhēdamumaṁ
pannondaṅgamumaṁ eraḍu parikarmamumaṁ embatteṇṭu sūtraṅgaḷumaṁ prathamānu
yōgaṅgaḷumaṁ padinālku pūrvaṅgaḷumaṁ aydu cūḷikeyumaṁ āṟavadhiyumaṁ
pesargoṇḍu pāraṇeya divasamallade nūṟayvatteṇṭu divasadiṁ saveva nōmpiya
viśrutaśrutajñānamumaṁ yathōcitavidhiyiṁ nōntu madīyāyuṣyāvasāna
doḷīśānakalpadoḷ śrīprabhavimānadoḷ lalitāṅga dēvaṅge vallabheyeṁ
svayamprabheyenemben āgi pūrvōpakāramaṁ nenedu bagedu pihitāsravabhaṭṭārakara
nānumātanuṁ bandisi nānāvidhārcanegaḷindarcisi pūjisi divyavinōdaṅgaḷaṁ
meṟedu pōgi suralōkasukhaṅgaḷanenitānuṁ kālamanubhavisi nijapūrvō
pārjitapuṇyāvasānadoḷ nākalōkamadānēkapaṁ naṭṭu nindu bīsidoḍe
bisuḍuvuduṁ madīyajīvitēśanādhōraṇaṁ keḍevante dharātaḷakke keḍevudu
mānumātana viyōgadoḷaṟudiṅgaḷvaraṁ jinēndramahimeyaṁ māḍi bandilli
puṭṭidenidu madīya vr̥ttāntaṁ,

adaṟindamenna bayasida bayakeyappudu vandhyāstanandhaya
samāgamasamānaṁ; mānasara deseyoḷ tīrvudaltidaṁ madīya mānasadoḷe
tāḷdu suralōkasukhānubhavaratarahasyaṅgaḷoḷennātanaṟivatirahasyaṅgaḷ appa kelakelavu
avināṇaṅgaḷaṁ nāṇci bañcisi piridumanurāgadindamenna bareda paṭamanidanarcisi
kanyābratadoḷe kālamaṁ kaḻipuvenidalladillige peṟatondu pratīkāramillendu nuḍidu
māṇda kanneya nuḍiyaṁ paṇḍite manadegoṇḍu,

lg.l: usirdau nīṁ ninna nirbēgamanaṟidenidaṁ śaktiyoḷ muktiyaṁ sā
tisadir tā tōṟu ninnī bareda paṭamanutphullapaṅkējanētrē
jaṭamaṭikarkaḷaṁ toḍare suttulum appudaṟiṁ samasta bhū

div.p:
endu munnamā paṭadoḷāke bareyade bañcisida avināṇaṅgaḷanaṟiye
besagoṇḍu paṭamaṁ kaikoṇḍu paṇḍite pōgi vandāru munīndra vr̥ndāraka
vr̥ndasaundaramumāsannabhavya vyōmacarabhūcaranicayanicitamum āgi jagatpūta
menisida mahāpūtajinālayakke bandu anēkadhūrtajanamanassammōhanatamaḥ
paṭamaṁ vicitracitrapaṭamanā caityālayada kelada paṭṭasāleya munte nēṟi
nijābhilaṣitakāryasiddhiyane pāruttumirdaḷ. annegamitta ṣaṭkhaṇḍamaṇḍitavasudhā
maṇḍaḷamaṁ bāykēḷisi,

lg.l: sphuritōdyatkānti niccaṁ mugiyise jitadiṅmaṇḍalaṁ bandu pokkaṁ

div.p:
antu nijānvayarājadhāniyaṁ pokku mūvatteṇchāsiramakuṭabaddhariṁ
mūrdhābhiṣiktan āgi sakaḷacakravartipadadoḷ nindu siṁhāsanārūḍhanārūḍha
yauvaneyumantarnigūḍhaśōkōdrēkamūkeyum āgirda nijatanūjege
baḻiyanaṭṭidāgaḷ,

antu poḍevaṭṭa nijatanūjeyaṁ kalyāṇabhōgabhāgiyāgendu parasi
tarkkaisikoṇḍu,

endu tanna manadoḷe bagedu magaḷa mogamaṁ muguḷnageverasu
nōḍidāgaḷ,

antu vajradantana vajradante poḷeva dantapaṅktigaḷa kāntiyā kānteyaṁ
pudidu puduṅgoḷise vajradantan emba pesaraṁ nannimāḍi,

adentendoḍe madīyagurugaḷuṁ trailōkyagurugaḷum appa yaśōdhara
gurugaḷa kēvaḷajñānōtpattiyosageyoḷavicaḷabhaktiyoḷenage puṭṭidavadhijñānadoḷenna
ninna ninna kāntana janmāntaraṅgaḷananantaritamanaṟidenā kathāntaramanādyanta
manavadhārisendu[yi]nt’ endu pēḻaltaguḷdaṁ ānī bhavakkaidaneya bhavadoḷī
puṇḍarīkiṇiyoḷ kēśavamahīśaṅge candrakīrtiy emba maga[ne]n āgi jayakīrti
y emba keḷeyanumānumoḍavaḷedu gr̥hītāṇuvrataneṁ gr̥hasthadharmakramadoḷ
madīya vayaskanumānuṁ negaḻdu jīvitāntyadoḷ prītivardhanōdyānadoḷ
candrasēnācāryara śrīpādapadmapārśvadoḷ sanyasanavidhiyoḷ parityaktāhāra
śarīraneṁ samādhivaḍedu mahēndrakalpadoḷ saptasāgarōpama pramitajīvitaneṁ
sāmānika dēvan āgi puṭṭideṁ; jayakīrtiyumātmīyavibhavasadr̥śan āgi tatkalpadoḷ
puṭṭidaṁ. antirvarumamarāṅganāpāṅgaviḷōkanasukhamananubhavisi bandu
puṣkaravaradvīpada mūḍaṇa mandarada pūrvavidēhada maṅgaḷāvatīviṣayada
ratnasañcayapurādhipaṁ śrīdharaṅgamātana manōhari manōharigaṁ śrīvarmanuṁ
vibhīṣaṇanum emba pesaroḷ baladēvavāsudēvar āgi baḷeye madīyajanaka
nemmirvarumanadhirājayuvarājapadaviyoḷ niṟisi,

emma tāy manōhariyumemmoḷ appa mōhaṁ kāraṇamāge tapamaṁ
kaikoḷḷade sakaḷaśrāvakavrataṅgaḷaṁ kaikoṇḍu palavuṁ teṟada nōmpigaḷaṁ nōntu
jīvitāntyadoḷīśānakalpadoḷ śrīprabhavimānadoḷ lalitāṅgadēvanādaḷ.
annegamitta nidhānamaṁ tōṟi kaṇṇaṁ kaḷevante,

antu vibhīṣaṇavipattiyoḷatipraḷāpaṅgeyvannegaṁ śōkāvēgamanaṟidu
munnina bhavada jananīsambandhamōhaṁ kāraṇamāge lalitāṅgadēvaṁ bandu,

lg.l: nenevō nīnārge ninnaṁ paḷayisuvavarārgēke śōkippe māṇmāṇ

div.p:
embuduṁ munnāda śōkarasamellaṁ pōgi nirvēgarasaṁ puṭṭi siddharasamaṁ
muṭṭida lōhadante śuddhāntaraṅganāgi,

antu daśasahasradharaṇīśvararoḍane jinēśvararūpamaṁ tāḷdi sarva
tōbhadrasiṁhavikrīḍitaṅgaḷ emba tapadoḷ negaḻdu jīvitāntyadoḷacyutakalpadoḷ
dvāviṁśatipārāvāraparamāyuṣyanenacyutēndranenāgi,

ant’ ā dēvananīśānakalpadindatiprītivardhanakaram emba madvimānamaṁ
prītivardhanakaramāgēṟisikoṇḍuydu madīyakalpadoḷagaggaḷam appa divyā
bharaṇāmbarānulēpakusumadāmādigaḷinennalampumaḻkaṟuṁ negaḻe pūjisideṁ. ā
divijanumēkaratnākarōpamāyuravasānadoḷ jambūdrumōpalakṣita
jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada maṅgaḷāvatī viṣayada vijayārdhaparvataduttara
śrēḍhiya gandharvapuramanāḷva vidyādhararājaṁ vāsavaṅgaṁ ātanantaḥpurapradhāne
prabhāvatigaṁ mahīdharan emba tanūjanāge, vāsavanuṁ mahīdharaṅge vidyādhara
vibhūtiyaṁ koṭṭu vijayākhyamunimukhyanikaṭadoḷ muktāvaḷitapamaṁ kaikoṇḍu
gellaṅgoṇḍaṁ. prabhāvatiyuṁ padmāvatyāryikāpādamūladoḷupārjitaratnā
vaḷitapadoḷacyutakalpadoḷ pratīndrapadaviyaṁ paḍedaḷ. itta mahīdharanumorme
puṣkarārdhada paḍuvaṇa mandarada pūrvavidēhada vatsakāvatīviṣayada pratibaddha
prabhākarīpuriyoḷ vinayandhara yōgigaḷa parinirvāṇapūjeyaṁ māḍi
mērugiriya nandanavanada pūrvadigbhāgadakr̥trimacaityālayaṅgaḷoḷ vandanā
bhaktinimittaṁ bandire mahīdharananānalli kāṇaloḍamaṟidu,

lg.l: pesar ninage kēḷ mosar peṟarge ninna mey [domba]da
tāgiyum emba ninna molagaḻtalegāṁ beṟagādenindu pē
ḻīgaḷo baygeyō pogaso nāḷeyo nāḍido ninna jīvitaṁ

div.p:
inisappoḍaṁ taḍeyadenna nuḍida nuḍiyē tanage manaḥkampamaṁ paḍeye
mahīkalpan emba nijatanūjaṅge rājyabhāramaṁ koṭṭu jagannandana gurugaḷalli śiṣyatvamaṁ
pūṇdu kanakāvaḷi tapaḥprabhāvadoḷ prāṇaparityāgadiṁ prāṇatēndranāgi,

antu bandu dhātakīṣaṇḍada mūḍaṇa mandaradaparavidēhada
gandhiḷaviṣayadayōdhyeyanāḷva jayavarmaṅgamātanarasi suprabhegamajitañjayanemba
magan āgi puṭṭuvuduṁ jayavarmaṁ varmaharanāda nijatanūjanajitañjayaṅge
jayajayaninādapūrvakamurvībhāramaṁ koṭṭu bhavyajanamanōnandanarenisidabhi
nandana gurugaḷaṁ sārdu śāśvatasaukhyavardhanakaramappācāmlavardhanatapadoḷ
negaḻdu paramapadamaneydidaṁ. suprabheyuṁ sudarśananāmagaṇinīsamakṣadoḷ
ratnāvaḷiyaṁ nōntacyutakalpadoḷ dēvan āgi puṭṭidaḷ. ittajitañjayanuṁ
cakravartipadamaneydidimbaḻiyamabhinandanajinamahimeyaṁ māḍi pihitapāpā
sravadhāranādudaṟiṁ pihitāsravanemberaḍaneya pesaraṁ paḍedu sāmrājyasukha
mananubhavisuttire,

nimmaḍiya mātr̥caranappudaṟindamā mōhakāraṇam āgi ninnaṁ
pratibōdhisalbandeṁ,

lg.l: taḍev ene kaṭṭidude surige meṭṭidude kaḷaṁ

div.p:
endenna mātinoḷajitañjayan appa pihitāsravaṁ jātavairāgyan āgi
viṁśatisahasrarājasamājamberasu mandarasthavirar emba mumukṣugaḷa samakṣadoḷ
mōkṣamārgamaṁ kaikoṇḍu gaganacāraṇar̥ddhiprāptar emba aynūrvarambaracāraṇa
roḍane vihārisuttuṁ bandu cāraṇacaritam emba puṇyāraṇyadoḷambaratiḷakamemba
girivarada naḍuve yōgayōgyamendadanaḷaṅkarisi nelasidandu ninna nirnāmikeyāda
bhavadoḷ madīyajananīcaragurugaḷ ninagaṁ gurugaḷādoḍavar pēḻdupa
dēśadoḷ nōntu mahābaḷakhēcaranāda bhavadoḷ svayambuddhōpadēśa
doḷīśānakalpada śrīprabhavimānadoḷ puṭṭida lalitāṅgadēvaṅge nīṁ svayaṁ
prabhey emba dēviy āgi puṭṭire ānumasmajjananīcaran appa lalitāṅgadēvanoḷanu
bandhasida mōhasambandhadoḷ ninna dēvan appa lalitāṅgaṁ berasirpattirvarlali
tāṅgaraṁ koṇḍāḍideṁ. andu ninna dēvanoḷāda koṇḍāṭamaṁ nīnumaṟivau.

adentendoḍī jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada sītānadiya teṅkaṇa
taḍiya vatsakāvatīviṣayada susīmānagaramanāḷva ajitañjayamahīpāḷana rājya
prāsādamūlastambhasacivanamitamatigamātana kulalalane satyabhāvegaṁ prahasitanemba
maganādaṁ; ātana sahacaraṁ vikasitanemboṁ.

antu nijavidyājñānamadāvaliptarirvarumondudivasamajitañjaya
noḍane pōgi tatpurōpavanadoḷirda matisāgaramunipatiyoḷ bādugeydu
ātmīyavidyāgarvaparvatamavara vacōvajranirghātadiṁ nuccunuṟiy āgi pōdoḍe
hatapratijñaruṁ gaḷitagarvarum āgi tacchiṣyatvamaṁ pūṇdu,

lg.l: rdhanamaṁ nōntu samādhi kaikoḷe mahāśakrakke sandītaniṁ
dranivaṁ tatpratimaṁ pratīndran ene sandintirvaruṁ pūṇdalaṁ

div.p:
antu paricyutanākalōkar āgi dhātakīṣaṇḍada paḍuvaṇa mandarada
pūrvavidēhada puṣkaḷāvatīviṣayada puṇḍarīkiṇiyanāḷva dhanañjayanarasiyarappa
jayamatigaṁ jayasēnegaṁ mahābaḷanumatibaḷanum emba pesaroḷ baladēva
vāsudēvar āgi puṭṭi nijaguruparōkṣadoḷ dharābhāradhurandhararāgire,

ā kalpadoḷ puṣpacūḷan emba pesareseye viṁśatisamudrōpamāyuṣya
virāmadoḷ dhātakīṣaṇḍada paḍuvaṇa mandarada pūrvavidēhada sītānadiya
teṅkaṇa taḍiya vatsakāvatīviṣayadoḷ prabhākarīpurīnāthaṁ mahāsēnaṅgaṁ
tadvanite vasundharegaṁ jayasēnan emba tanūjanāgi,

lg.l: guru puruṣārthamaṁ neṟeye sādhisi pōge nijānvavāyabhū

div.p:
antu parityaktasakaḷasāmrājyanuṁ dr̥ṣṭānubhūtaśrāvakaviṣayavitr̥ṣṇanum āgi
sīmandharajinēśapadakuśēśayābhyasanadoḷ digvāsan āgi ṣōḍaśabhāvanegaḷaṁ bhāvisi
nijajīvitāvasānadoḷ saumanasamembūrdhvamadhyamada navagraivēyakadoḷ
ahamindranāgi,

antu puṇyabhājanaṅge nū[ke] pāsembante puṣkarārdhada mūḍaṇa
mandarada pūrvavidēhada sītānadiya teṅkaṇa taḍiya maṅgaḷāvatī viṣayada
ratnasañcayapuramanāḷvajitañjayabhūpāḷaṅgamātanarasi vasumatigaṁ yugandhara
nembapūrvapuṇyanāmamaṁ tāḷdi,

munna pēḻda nammirvara gurugaḷ appa pihitāsravabhaṭṭārakara kēvala
jñānōtpattiyosageyaṁ māḍi bandevalladeyuṁ,

lg.l: pārayisirdudaṁ nenevo nīn ene tappadu pūrvajanmasaṁ

div.p:
innonde madīya prāṇavallabhan appa lalitāṅgadēvanelli puṭṭida
nembudenagide sandeyamenagamadaṁ besasimembuduṁ āṁ nimmiṁ munnamacyutakalpadiṁ
paricyutanen āgi bandilli yaśōdharamahībhujaṅgaṁ tadvanite vasumatigaṁ vajradanta
nādeṁ; ninna dēvanum appa lalitāṅgadēvanumīśānakalpadiṁ bandutpaḷakhēṭamanāḷva
enna meydunan appa vajrabāhugamenna taṅgey appa vasundharegaṁ vajrajaṅghanemba
tanujanādaṁ; ā svayamprabheye nīnumenagīgaḷ śrīmatiy āgi puṭṭidau.

lg.l: llivaraṁ banduvu ninna nallane gaḍaṁ madbhāginēyaṁ mahō

div.p:
endu kanyāratnamaṁ kanyāntaḥpurakke pōgalvēḻdu vajradantanāsthānadinderdu
pōdaṁ annegamittalumakhaṇḍitamati paṇḍiteyuṁ tanna pūṇdu pōda kajjamaṁ
sādhyaṁ māḍi bandu sasambhramadiṁ vibhramaviḷāsavatiyaṁ śrīmatiyaṁ kaṇḍu,

embuduṁ ā prastāvadoḷ śrīmati taruṇadinakarakaradaḷitasarasīruha
vadaneyuṁ atiprītivistāritavilōcaneyum āgi manaṅgoṇḍu kēḷal taguḷdaḷ

lg.l: biriyise bēṭadoḷ biriva nallaragaldu kanaldonaldu na
tare tare banda sabbavada mātugaḷaṁ guḍigaṭṭi kēḷarē

div.p:
āgaḷ paṇḍiteyumint’ endu pēḻal taguḷdaḷ; antu ninna bareda
paṭamaṁ koṇḍupōgi mahāpūtajinālayada munde nēṟidāgaḷenna pasarisida
citrapaṭam emba dīhakke khēcarabhūcarayuvamr̥gaṅgaḷeḷasi bandu,

lg.l: tidaṟoḷ taḷtesedirda peṇ suravadhūbimbaṁ dalī celvana
ppide dal dēvavimānadandamidu pēḻ tānāra vr̥ttāntamā
ridanintillige tandarendu piriduṁ bhrāntiṁ janaṁ nōḻpuduṁ

div.p:
vāsavadurdantarembaranēkakṣudravidyāgarvadurvidagdharumaḷīkavicakṣaṇa
rum appudaṟindamadananumānadindamaṟidu mellane sārdu nōḍuvalli vāsavanadaṁ
nīḍuṁ bhāvisi nōḍi,

āgaḷ paripītāsavanantirda vāsavanaṁ durdantanaḷīkōdantaṁ
gaḷināṟisuttirpudumāṁ mellanallige pōgi,

emma pāsida citrapaṭam emba baleyoḷ nimmant appa beḷmigaṅgaḷāgaḷe
toḍargumusirade bijayaṅgeyyimendavandiraṁ nakku kaḷeye,

lg.l: paṭateyinante diṭṭi manamembivu toṭṭane naṭṭu naṭṭavol

div.p:
annegaṁ gambhīrataraturagahēṣāravabadhiritasakaḷabhuvanavivaranuṁ katipaya
padātiparijanaparivr̥tanuṁ nirantarōcchritavicitracandrakacchatracchāyānirākr̥tātapanuṁ
śaranniśāsamayasamuditatārātaraḷamuktābharaṇakiraṇacandrikācandra
kabaḷaviḷasita digaṅganāmukhanum āgi abhinavōdbhidyamāna mr̥dukuṭiḷaśmaśrumadhukara
paṭaḷaparivr̥tamugdhamukhasarasijanuṁ mr̥gamadavilikhita vicitracitra patrabhaṅga
bhāsurabhujaśikharanuṁ atisurabhisahakārakastūrikarpūrapāḷi sammiśra tāmbūḷa
rāgaraktādharapravāḷaprabhāprakaṭitapūrvasandhyārāganuṁ abhinava yauvanā
vaṣṭambhaprāgalbhya dr̥ṣṭipātatr̥ṇīkr̥tatribhuvananumappanorvaṁ rājakumāraṁ
dūrōtsāritavāhanaṁ sasambhramōpagataparicārakaskandhavinyastavāmahastanāgi,

lg.l: ṇano dhātraṁ rūpaniṣpādanavidhiyoḷivaṁ munnamēṁ nōmpiyaṁ nōṁ

div.p: antu bandu,

div.head: caturthāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
kaṇḍī nereda neravi vismayambaṭṭidēnaṁ nōḍidappudēnānumondu
kautukamāgale vēḻkumendeydevandu nōḻpannegamalli pasarisida citrapaṭamaṁ bhōṅkene
kaṇḍu,

lg.l: jisi celvaṁ geḍegoṇḍuvintu bareyal brahmaṅgamēṁ barkumē

div.p:
endu munnaṁ vicitracitravidyākauśalamanatikutūhaḷōttārita
lōcanan āgi nīḍuṁ bhāvisi nōḍi,

lg.l: tidu dēvāṅganeyar palar baḷasikoṇḍirdandamī taḷta rū
pidu dal dēvana dēviyandamidu pēḻ munnelli kaṇḍandamō

div.p:
endu bagediruḷkaṇḍa kanasaṁ maṟudevasaṁ nenevante niratiśayasura
lōkasamudbhavasukhānubhavamanāgaḷe nenedu,

lg.l: kkidaṟoḷ pakkāgi gōtraskhalane negaḻe pūmāleyiṁ mōduvetteṁ

div.p:
mattamamarasamitiverasōlagaṅgoṭṭirdalli madīyasiṁhāsanārdhaikadēśa
manaḷaṅkarisi padavaḍedu sōṅki kuḷḷirda rūpumanamarāṅganeyara bīsuva cāmarada
gāḷiya[le]pinoḷalluguva bambalguruḷgaḷa bambalindaṁ taḷarva cinnapūgaḷanava
yavadoḷe saytumāḍuva keytamumaṁ, amarīmadhuragītaninādakkādamoṟaldirda
śiraḥkampadoḷinisānumeṟagida karṇapūrapārijātastabakamanōsarisuva
viḷāsamumaṁ, kanakakadaḷīvanadoḷagaṇa maṇimayabhavanadoḷage parimitaparijana
sahitamenna manamoṟalvinegamenna sōṅkinoḷ kuḷḷirdu vīṇeyaṁ bājisuva
rūpamumaṁ acyutēndrapūjāviḷāsamumaṁ mandarakandaravihāramumaṁ illiyē
kāṇalādapudondē,

lg.l: rvida kaḍegaṇṇa jarbugaḷo mōdida nīḷa sarōjamāḷeyiṁ
dudirdu madaṅgadoḷ toḍardu tōrpa daḷaṅgaḷo pēḻimāvudeṁ
budan ene kādi mōdidavināṇamadilli dalilla nallaḷā

div.p:
mattamorme maṇimayasuratabhavanadoḷage nirbharapraṇayakalaha
kaluṣaparavaśeyāgi,

lg.l: muḷidire pādapaṅkajamanāṁ taleyoḷ nile tāḷdi nallaḷē
tiḷip ene mattamā pesarge nīnire nōntavaḷāvaḷembuduṁ

div.p:
mattamorme pañcaratnaprabhāprasādhitaprasādhanaśāleyoḷage svayaṁ
prabheyanāne pasadanaṅgoḷisuttumirdu,

mattamorme mandapavanāndōḷitavimānōpavanadoḷage pasarisi
kusumisida kusumadesaḷa misuguva posavaseyoḷasadaḷameseye pasarisi posayisida
posasusila masakada basadoḷe basadāgiyumasiyaḷenagasavasadoḷe besedu pōgi,

lg.l: deṟaguvuduṁ latāṅgi muḷisiṁ lateyaṁ lalitāṅgigettu nī
neṟagideyenna pakkade peṟaḷg ene berci latāṅgigāgaḷā

div.p:
intivu modalāge peṟavumennākeyaṟikeyavināṇaṅgaḷ kelavu baredu
villendadanākr̥ṣṭadr̥ṣṭiprasaranumacaḷitapakṣmavisaranumakampitabhrūvibhramanuṁ prakaṭita
cittavibhramanuṁ atiprabaḷasvēdajaḷaprakṣāḷitanuṁ kusumaśaraśalākākīlitanumāgi,
endu tannoḷe bagedu saṅkalpasamāgamasukhamananubhavisi,

lg.l: ṣada tani[ge]ttu bāyge baḷasal padedaḻkaṟaḷurke tō[ḷge] vaṁ

div.p:
āgaḷ kadambastabakakarṇapūrāyamāṇarōmāñcakañcukitakapōḷa
mūḷasthaḷaniśvāsakallōḷanatisūkṣmapāḷiparicyutataraḷataranayanōdabindusandōha
rasavaśagatanāgi,

ī paṭamanilligārtandarembannegaṁ bhavadīyaprāṇavallabhaṁ lalitāṅgacara
vajrajaṅghanembudanāṁ munname tiḷidānumā mahānubhāvanaṁ bēgameydepōgi,

lg.l: tudiyeydittenagenna pūṇke ninagaṁ puṇyōdayaṁ sārci baṁ
dudu dhātraṅgamaḷaṅkegoṁ[ḍa] piriduṁ cintāntaraṁ pōytu kū
dudu rāgōtsavamellamillige jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ

div.p:
embudumā viḷāsarasavārāśi vismayasmēramukhacandrasāndra
candrikāmr̥tācchajaḷaśiśiraśīkaraṅgaḷoḷe munnamenna manamāṟuvinamunna
mitaikabhrūlatāviḷāsanantembudanembuduṁ nīṁ lalitāṅgacaranappudaṟindaṁ
svakīyaprāṇēśvari tatsvayamprabhādēvi nimma māvaṁ vajradanta cakravartigaṁ nimmatte
lakṣmīmatimahādēvigaṁ śrīmatiy emba magaḷ āgi puṭṭidaḷ.

lg.l: biduve vikalpamallade viḷāsada keytada rūpu sōltu nō
du tamaṁ kaikoḷvinaṁ kōmalatanuvalargaṇ nīḷda dhammillamudbhrū
oḷapoyyal ninnanā kanneya tuṟugemegaḷ suttaluṁ ninnanā kō

div.p:
mattamāke nīlōtpaḷadaḷanayaneyuṁ kundakuṭmaladaśaneyuṁ
śirīṣadāmakōmaḷabāhuyugaḷeyuṁ kamaḷadaḷakōmaḷakarataḷeyuṁ vakuḷamukuḷa
surabhiniśvāseyuṁ campakadaḷadāmāvadāteyum āgi kusumasukumāratanuvappu
daṟindatanuparitāpamaṁ sairisalāṟade ninnoḷāda vr̥ttāntamanī paṭadoḷ baredu
āṁ tanage paramaviśvāsabhūmiyen āgi kiṟiyandinditta naḍapidōdisida
dādiyenappudaṟiṁ paṇḍitey emba baṟiya pesarallade rājakuḷasatatasaṁvāsaprāpta
prāgalbhyateyumuḷḷudaṟindamī paṭamaṁ prāṇamane kaiyeḍeguḍuvantenna kaiyoḷkoṭṭu
madīya prāṇavallabhananelli pokkumellandadoḷamaṟasendaṭṭidoḍe bandidanilli pasarisi
pāḻpakkevaṭṭirdeṁ. madīyakāyaklēśaphaḷamuṁ janmaphaḷamumenagindu ninna baravinindaṁ
saphaḷamādudembuduṁ teṅkaṇelaralepadindaṅkurisida cūtadante ātaṁ rōmāñca
kañcukitaśarīranāgi,

lg.l: manadannai tōṟu ninnī paṭamanenagadaṁ nōḍi matkānteyaṁ kā

div.p:
endu manaḥpriyatamana bareda sābhijñānapaṭamanīvudumākeyumadaṁ
nimirci nōḍi,

lg.l: kivivuge paṇḍitege nuḍida nallana nuḍi ta

div.p:
annegamatta śrīmativajrajaṅghara janmāntarasnēharasāmr̥tapātracitrapaṭa
vyatihāramaṁ vajrajaṅghānucararindamaṟidu vajrabāhumahīnāthaṁ nijatanūjaguṇa
maṇimālege tatkanyāratnamaṁ nāyakamaṇi māḍalendātmīyaviḷāsaṁ berasu bandu
puṇḍarīkiṇige mundaṭṭida dūtaṅge prītan āgi mecci meccittu vajradantacakravarti
yumanantasāmantāntaḥpuraparivāraparivr̥tanuṁ bandhuragandhasindhurārūḍhanu
māgi,

ant’ atiprītiyiṁ vajrabāhukṣitipatigidirvōgi nijavijayagajadiniḻidu
tanage poḍevaṭṭa vajrabāhuvanāśīrvādapurassaravappikoṇḍātmīya
śikhaṇḍa maṇimarīcigaḷiṁ nijapadakamaḷadoḍane vasundhareyumanaḷaṅkarisida
vasundhareyumaṁ nijānujeyaṁ parasi vinayavinamitamaṇimukuṭanāda
vajrajaṅghanananēkabhōgabhāgiyāgendu parasi piridumaḻkaṟinoḷtarkkaisikoṇḍu
nijavijayagajēndramanēṟisi mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu bare purajanaṅgaḷuttuṅgaprāsāda
kūṭakōṭigaḷumanudagrasaudhōparimataḷaṅgaḷumanēṟi nōḻpalli.

endu tammoḷōrorvaroḷ nuḍiyuttuṁ paurajanaṅgaḷ sūsuva
lājavarṣamumaṁ kusumavarṣamumaṁ antukoḷuttuṁ muttina muṟida
lambaṇaṅgaḷveraseḻalva pacce[sāra]da hārada tōraṇaṅgaḷaṁ nuguḷuttuṁ bandu
rājamandiramaṁ pokku karumāḍada kelada māḍadoḷ vajrabāhunr̥pananirisi
majjanabhōjanatāmbūlāmbarānulēpanabhūṣaṇādi vividhaviśēṣasatkāraṅgaḷiṁ
santasambaḍisi nānāvinōdaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟi vajradantacakravarti ninagāvudu
manōrathamadaṁ bēḍikoḷḷene,

embuduṁ cakradharanadharakisalayada mēle dantakāntilatāntaprabhegaḷ
pasarise,

lg.l: oḍeyaṁ kūsiṅgadondē kulada calada pemponde celvonde sando
kuḍalirdaṁ kanneyaṁ pēḻ ninagamenagamēṁ dandugaṁ vajrabāhū

div.p: antum alladeyuṁ,

embuduṁ vajrabāhumahīpati vajradantacakravartisūktāmr̥tasiktamappa
nijamanōrathāmaradrumadinogedaṅkurisidaṅkuranikaramananukarisuva rōmāñca
nicayadiṁ nicitāṅganāgi,

endu nijōttarīyāṁśukamane mahōtsavadhvajamaṁ māḍi
vasundharāsaundariyuṁ tānuṁ priyatanayana vivāhōtsavalagnacittar āgi lagnamane
pāruttumirdar. āgaḷ vajradantacakravartiyātmīya putrīvivāhōtsavakke
mauhūrtikaraṁ karedu divasamaṁ besagoḷvuduṁ avar indina vāsarame
śōbhanavidhēyavāsaraṁ, indina divasame śubhadivasāgrēsaraṁ, indina nakṣatrame
sakaḷakṣēmakṣētraṁ indina yōgame samastābhivāñchitaphaḷasamāyōgaṁ, indina
karaṇame kalyāṇakaraṇīyādikaraṇaṁ endu binnapaṅgeyvuduṁ jagajjanajaṅgamakalpavr̥kṣaṁ
kalpavr̥kṣam emba mahāmahimeyaṁ mahāpūtajinālayadoḷ munnaṁ māḍi
baḻiyaṁ nijarājadhāniyoḷosageyaṁ māḍi vivāhamaṇṭapamaṁ sthapatiratnakke
viracisendu besasidāgaḷ,
ā cañcatpañcaratnavēdikāntarāḷavaḷayakkaḷaṅkāramāgi,

āgaḷā vivāhadosageyoḷosagemaruḷgoṇḍante itta vasundharā
saundariyuṁ atta lakṣmīmatimahādēviyumekkekkeyoḷe maṇḍaḷikamahā
sāmantamantrimaṇḍaḷāntaḥpurapurāṅganānikarakke maṇimayabhājanaṅgaḷoḷtekkane
tīvida pañcaratnada keḷiya katturiya koḷatada kappurada paḷikina bāyinaṅgaḷaṁ bīṟi
sāhiyāṇada cīnada dhavaḷavaṭṭada bharmada joṅgada dēvāṅgada sakaḷavaṭṭegaḷumaṁ
meṭṭuveḍegaḷoḷellaṁ pāsi kārōhaṇada kakkaravaḷayigeya citrāvaḷiya pariveḍeya
tuḷiveḍeya neḷala pāṇiya baṇṇada kaṇada baṇṇavaṇṇigeya javaḷigaḷane mogannōḍade
sūsidāgaḷ,

lg.l: ppadivaṁ jaṅgamakalpavr̥kṣam ene koṭṭī māḻkeyiṁ bhājanāṁ

div.p:
āgaḷ pañcaratnagarbhavividhauṣadhisandarbhaśātakumbhakumbhasambhr̥ta
maṅgaḷajaḷaṅgaḷindaṁ misise mindaḷaṅkāramandirakke vandu neṟeye kaigeyye,

annegaṁ śrīmatiyuṁ anantasāmantasīmantinīparivr̥teyuṁ
atiprauḍhavāravanitāparivr̥teyuṁ āgi pālgaḍala tereya noreya doreya
dukūlāmbaramanuṭṭu ātmīyaghanajaghanada nuṇpinoḷ nuṇpumegettu jhaṇajhaṇāya
māna maṇikiṅkiṇīvirājita kanakakāñcīkaḷāpaṁ anaṅgarāgarasapravāhakke
kaṭṭegaṭṭuvante kaṭṭi sāndracandanadravānuliptādr̥ptakucakaḷaśaṅgaḷaṁ taraḷataratāra
hāradindaḷaṅkarisi campakadaḷadāmakōmaḷanijabhujalategaḷananēkamauktikamaṇi
vibhūṣaṇaṅgaḷiṁ kusumisi manmathōtsavābhimukhamukhacandranaṁ candrakavaḷadiṁ
toḍedōronde vajrada pañcalōhamumanavarkamarkevetta muttina
muguḷgaḷumaniṭṭā muguḷane birimuguḷgetteṟagida maṟidumbiyante sogayise
tīvida koggiya katturiyuṁ katturiyoḷaṇṭapariceyuṁ pariceyoḷparicayambaḍeda
madavaṭṭeyuṁ madavaṭṭeyoḷoḍambaṭṭa vipuḷakapōḷataḷalikhitavicitrapatralēkheyuṁ
patralēkheyaṁ muguḷnage naguvantirdadharamuṁ adharamanadharaṁ māḍi poḷeva sulipalla
poḷapuṁ sulipalla poḷap emba tanna bāḷa poḷapane meṟedu neṟedu samaṟida
madananoḍḍaṇadante samaṟida purvuṁ purb emba karbina billiṁ barduṅkida
madananalarembembinamimbāgirda nelevoṭṭuṁ nelevoṭṭinoḷoṭṭaisi paḷañcaleva
kuruḷōḷiyuṁ kuruḷōḷiyoḷ munname sogayisuva cinnapūgaḷuṁ
cinnapūgaḷeḍeyeḍeyoḷ nimirdu miṟumiṟuguva taleduḍugeyuṁ taleduḍuge
yoḷoḍambaḍaṁ paḍedu miḷirdu poḷeva pondaḷiruṁ pondaḷiroḷonda
viṁ[de]yalladondi nāḍeyumandambaḍedu padanaṟidu taḷida mr̥gamadasaliladoḷ
mellamellanuḷḷalarda celviṅge muḍigavidante tōṟuva tōravalligeya muḍi
yumeseye kaigeydāgaḷ,

āgaḷanēkaprasādhanaprayōgapravīṇeyarappatiprauḍhapurandhriyar nōḍi
nōḍi,

lg.l: gaṇada viḷāsamañjisuvavōl peḍeyaṁ muḍiyalli tōrpa nā
giṇiyara keytamento kaḷe pāṟuva pāṟugaḷandamaṁ beḍaṁ

div.p:
antu neṟeye kaigeydu vadhūvararirvarumaṁ mauhūrtikagaṇanirūpita
praśastamuhūrtadoḷatipramōdanirbharapraṇayaprahatamaṅgaḷapaṭaharavaṅgaḷumati
madhuramandramanōhara maṅgaḷagītāravaṅgaḷumalaktakadravāruṇacaraṇaraṇita
nūpuramukharitadigantarāntaḥpurajanāśīrvādakōḷāhaḷamumeseye mundiṭṭu
tandu vivāhamaṇṭapada naḍuvaṇa maṇimayavēdikeya hāṭakapīṭhada mēle
pāsida dugulada daḷimbadoḷirisidāgaḷanēkamakuṭabaddhacūḍāmaṇicakra cumbanōcita
caraṇakamaḷan appa sakaḷacakravarti,

lg.l: ḻkaṟa pempaṁ tōṟalāgaḷ kanakakaḷaśamaṁ tāne bandetti kainī

div.p:
antu kainīreṟedu pāṇigrahaṇaṅgeyisidāgaḷ vajrajaṅghaṁ śrīmatiya
nikāmakōmaḷakarataḷapallavasparśanasukhōnmīḷitalōcananāge,

lg.l: iniyana kendaḷaṁ taḷamanoyyane sōṅke podaḷda nāṇa peṁ

div.p: ā prastāvadoḷ,
āgaḷvajrajaṅghaṁ,

lg.l: gaḷa kōḷaṁ nūtanaprēmade nimirveḍeyoḷ dr̥ṣṭiyaṁ kāvanāvaṁ

div.p:
ant’ abhinavasaṅgasamutpannasādhvasarasaramaṇīyataramugdhavadhūvadana
vilōkanasukhamananubhavisi,

lg.l: nnina bhavadondu kūrmeyoḷe kūḍidudī bhavadindamāda vā
nina bhavamī bhavaṁ maṟubhavaṁ saphalaṁ mr̥galōlalōcanē

div.p:
endu keccuvirda maccumanurcipōda mēḷamumanaḷavigaḻidalampumaṁ
baḷavivaḍedaḻkaṟumanōrorvaroḷ neṟedanēkavidhanidhuvanasukhasudhārasādhīna
cittaruṁ cittajanē vividhaviḷāsavibhramōpadēśōpādhyāyanāgeyumupa
vanāntarāḷakanakakadaḷībhavanaṅgaḷē nivāsabhavanaṅgaḷāgeyuṁ bhramadbhramarabharabhagna
mādhavīlatālatāntasamadhikamakarandabinducitritavipuḷapuḷinataḷaṅgaḷē viśramaṇa
bhūmigaḷāgeyuṁ daradaḷita kamaḷavanagaḷitamadhuramadamadirāmōdamudita
madhukaranikaraninādōpavīṇitakrīḍāsarōvaraṅgaḷē jaḷakēḷīkutūhaḷaniḷayaṁ
gaḷāgeyuṁ sakaḷa kaḷōtkaḷita sarasasahakārakōrakakabaḷanamadamadhura
kōkiḷakōḷāhaḷākuḷitakr̥takakēḷīśaiḷaśikharaṅgaḷē sakaḷadigavalōkananikētanaṅga
lāgeyuṁ sarasasarasijasandarbhagarbhasarōvarasalilaluḷitaśiśirasurabhimandamāru
tāndōḷitacandanavanavīdhigaḷē vihāramārgaṅgaḷāgeyuṁ vasantasamayasamudita
kusumakisalayaṅgaḷē vanakēḷīviḷāsabhūṣaṇaṅgaḷāgeyuṁ tribhuvanaikapavitrī
bhūtamahāpūtajinālayamē niratiśayabhaktipurassarapūjāvicitraviracanādi
sampadāspadamāgeyuṁ pātradānavidhānamē vinōdamāgeyuṁ intu
nityōtsavaṅgaḷ kelavukālaṁ sale salgeverasida tanna naṇpanoṭṭajeyiṁ tōṟi
vajrabāhumahīpatiyaṁ karedumamitatējaṅge bhavadīyātmajeyaṁ

ā vivāhakalyāṇānantaraṁ nijatanūjeyanaḷiyanoḍane kaḻipuvudyōga
manettikoṇḍu,

antu tarisi mattamātmīyasthapatiratnaviracitamaṇikanakakhacita
śibikāndōḷādiyānaṅgaḷumaṁ kanakayōgāḷaṅkr̥taṅgaḷ āgi sogayisuva kariya
piriya meyya niḍiya kiviya kuṇidu meṭṭu[va] vajjarigaḻtegaḷumaṁ vyūhadoḷ
ni[ṭṭe]vaṭṭu maṇimayamaṇḍanāyōgadoḷoḍambaṭṭa piḍigaḷumaṁ muḷiva tiḷiva
gaṇḍara peṇḍira nuḍigaḷane baṇṇisuva puruḷigaḷumaṁ akāṇḍatāṇḍavārambhaśauṇḍa
śikhaṇḍimaṇḍaḷamumaṁ līlālasagamanamaṁ gajagamaneyargupadēśaṅgeyva dīvada
rājahaṁsegaḷumaṁ kubjavāmanabadhiramūkakirātōnmattajaḍajanaṅgaḷumaṁ
gāyakavādakanartakakathakapuṇyapāṭhakavaitāḷikanikaramumaṁ koṭṭu paṇḍiteyu
manoḍavōpantu māḍi rājādhirājanaḷiyana mogamaṁ nōḍi,

endu nuḍidu lakṣmīmatimahādēviyuṁ tānumātmīyapriyātmajeya
mogamanaḻkartu nōḍi,

āgaḷ vajradantananantasāmantāntaḥpuraparivāraṁ berasu pōgi
magaḷumanaḷiyanumaṁ kiṟidantarambaraṁ kaḻipi maguḻvāgaḷ,

lg.l: kuḍuva palarmeyiṁ parasi sēseyanikkuva buddhivēḻva kai

div.p:
antu vajradantacakravarti kaḻipi maguḻe vajrabāhumahībhujaṁ
vajrajaṅghanumaṁ śrīmatiyumaṁ mundiṭṭu katipayaprayāṇaṅgaḷiṁ,

āgaḷ nirantarasamutthāpitaṅgaḷuṁ kanakarajatamayānēkasthāsakālaṁ
kr̥taṅgaḷuṁ vicitracīnāṁśukaruciraṅgaḷuṁ pinaddhavividhamaṇidarpaṇadhvajaṅgaḷuṁ
ālambitajāmbūnadaghaṇṭājālavirājitaṅgaḷuṁ āmōdakusumadāmanikāma
kamanīyaṅgaḷuṁ appa tōraṇaṅgaḷane nuguḷuttuṁ kāśmīramr̥gamadacchaṭāsiktāṁ
gaṇamuṁ aṅgaṇaracitamauktikaraṅgabaliyuṁ balikusumanipatadaḷikuḷārabdhagītamuṁ
gītānugatavādyalayalalitaviḷāsinīnr̥tyamumapputpaḷakhēṭamaṁ puguvāgaḷ,

ā prastāvadoḷapūrvavadhūvararirvaraṁ śrīmatīvajrajaṅgharaṁ
nōḍalendu,
antu neredu,

lg.l: bhavadoḷ bandilli jātismarar ene neredōrorvaroḷ mattamatyu

div.p:
endatipramōdapramattapurajanajanitānurāgadoḍanā dampatiyumoḍane
rājamandiramaṁ pokku rājyalakṣmīdēvateya parivāradēvateyarenisuva
vārasaundariyara sūsuva paramānandasmitasudhāsyandisantatārdraṅgaḷappārdrākṣata
sitakusumāñjaḷigaḷanidirgoṇḍu paṇḍitege vividha vinōdaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟi meṟedu
dānasanmānādigaḷoḷ santōṣambaḍisi puṇḍarīkiṇige kaḻipi kelavudivasa
mirpannegaṁ śrīmatige garbhacihnaṅgaḷ tōṟe,
annegaṁ vajrabāhumahārājaṁ mattondu divasaṁ,
bareyalendu baṭṭigevalageyaṁ tarisi tiṭṭamiṭṭu barevannegaṁ,
āgaḷ,

endā mahānubhāvanā javañjavavibhāvakkēvayisi vajrajaṅghano
ḷātmīyadharābhāramaṁ niṟisi vasundhareverasu palambararasiyaruṁ śrīmatīta
nūjar vīrabāhuprabhr̥tigaḷ appa nālvattombattamaḷgaḷumainūrvarurvīśvararuṁ
berasu paricchēdisi yamadharamunīndrapādapadmōpakaṇṭhadoḷ jātarūpadharan āgi
mōkṣalakṣmīkaṭākṣaikalakṣyanādanannegamittaṁ,

lg.l: kkamma manandaral nimage salladoḍambaḍim endu kālgaḷaṁ
tammaya nettiyoḷ niṟisi mārkoḷe māṇade pōda makkaḷa

div.p:
annegamitta vajradantacakravartiyuṁ sakaḷamakuṭabaddhaparivr̥tanā
sthānamaṇṭapamadhyasthitasiṁhāsanadoḷondudivasaṁ sukhāsīnanāgire,

lg.l: ḷakanittalli tadabjamaṁ nr̥pavaraṁ vaktrābjadoḷ sārce kaṁ

div.p: mattamā līlākamaḷamane līleyiṁ tiripidāgaḷ,

lg.l: nidhanakkantappuvaṁ muṁ bisuḍuvude cadur neṭṭanendalte muṁ pō

div.p:
endu nirvāṇasāmrājyamane bayasi sakaḷasāmrājyamaṁ rājādhirājaṁ
nijāgratanūjaṅgamitatējaṅge koṭṭāgaḷātanintendaṁ -

lg.l: initaṁ nimma manakke kokkarikeyaṁ māḍirda sāmrājyameṁ
menagīgaḷ dayegeyvoḍintu besasal sālginde pōpeṁ tapō

div.p: embuduṁ vajradantacakravarti,
endāgaḷamitatējaṁ dantāṁśudhautakapōḷaphaḷakanāgi,

lg.l: bharadoḷ tandu toḍarci pūṇḍu talegōdirduṁ baḻikkentumī
dharaṇībhāramanāṁ bisuḻpoḍadu ciḥ lōkakke khātvā samī

div.p:
embudumātana paricchēdamanaṟidu tatsahōdararsāsirvarō
rorvarumolladirdoḍamitatējaṅgamanundarigaṁ puṭṭida puṇḍarīkan emba bāḷakanaṁ
santānapālanārthaṁ niṟisi ṣaṣṭisahasrāṅganājanamuṁ viṁśatisahasramakuṭabaddharuṁ
sahasrapramitanijatanūjaruṁ paṇḍitey emba pesaranā prastāvadoḷ nannimāḍida
paṇḍiteyuṁ berasu yaśōdharamunīndrapādapadmōpāntadoḷ vajradanta mahā
rājādhirājaṁ digambarāmbaraviḷāsadiṁ trilōkaśikhariśēkharanādaṁ; lakṣmīmatī
mahādēviyumanundariverasu cakravallabhavyapāyadoḷ puṇḍarīkanaṁ kaikoṇḍire,

ant’ adaṁ kaṇḍu kappamīyade capparisuva maṇḍaḷikarumuṁ aḍaṅgadāṭa
vikarumaṁ otti barpa pārṣṇigrāhakarumaṁ aṟidu lakṣmīmatimahādēvi vajrajaṅghaṅge
baḻiyanaṭṭuva kajjamaṁ mantrivargadoḷāḷōcisi,

lg.l: vanajānīkame paḷḷivōpa teṟadiṁ kiḻterdu bhūpaṁ tapō
nnane naccirdudu kāgum emba bageyindintī mahīmaṇḍalaṁ

div.p:
endu baredu ratnakaraṇḍakadoḷiṭṭu mucci mudrisidōleyumanapūrvō
pāyanamumaṁ pariṇatāśēṣaśāstrārtharumunnatānvayaruṁ gandharvapurādhināyakaru
m appa cintāgatiyuṁ manōgatiyum emba vidyādharara kayyoḷkoṭṭemmaḷiyanaṁ
taḍeyade mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu bannimendaṭṭidoḍāgaḷā gaganacarar vimānārūḍha
ratitvaritagamanadiṁ pōgevōge,

antu bandutpaḷakhēṭamaneydi vajrajaṅghanumaṁ śrīmatiyumaṁ kaṇḍu
dūrāvanatamastakar āgi tamma tandupāyanamberasu ratnakaraṇḍakamaṁ mundiṭṭāgaḷadaṟa
mudrikeyanoḍedantassthitakāryapatramaṁ bājisi nōḍi, vismayākrāntacittanāgi,

endu nijasabhājanakkellaṁ pogaḻdu tadvārtākarṇanōdīrṇaśōka
vyākuḷeyāgirda nijavallabheyallige bandu,

lg.l: taradindaṁ banda mōhaṁ biḍadalevudaṟindādoḍaṁ dhairyadiṁ saṁ

div.p:
endu ā śōkāvēgamanāṟisi, banda vidyādhararaṁ yathōcita
pratipattigaḷiṁ santōṣambaḍisi nijapriyapradhānamantri mativaranoḷaṁ sēnānāyakana
kampa[na]noḷaṁ purōhitanānandanoḷaṁ pradhānaśrēṣṭhi dhanamitranoḷamāḷōcisi,
ant’ atitvaritagamananiścitamanan āgi balādhyakṣanaṁ barisi,

antu besasidandadoḷe bandu munde ninda caturaṅgabalaṁ berasabaḷābāḷa
vr̥ddhavr̥ddhōkṣaśakaṭasaṅkaṭam appa kaṭakamaṁ mellamellanoḍagoṇḍu barpantu kūrcāḷa
tundiḷajaratsāmantasandōhakkappayisi śubhadinamuhūrtadoḷ prayāṇabhēriyaṁ
poyisi poṟamaṭṭāgaḷ,

lg.l: koḍe taḻe taḷta sīguriṁ karīndraghaṭāḷi turaṅgasainyamu

div.p:
antu puṇḍarīkiṇigabhimukhan āgi payaṇambandu śaṣpasarōvaramemba
koḷanaṁ baḷasida mādhavīlateya maṇṭapaṅgaḷoḷaṁ cūtalateya baḷḷigāvaṇaṁ
gaḷoḷaṁ aśōkalateya viḷāsagr̥haṅgaḷoḷaṁ navamālikālateyiṟumbugaḷoḷaṁ
tamāḷalateya koñceyaṅgaḷoḷaṁ tāmbūlalateyaḷaṁ kārabhavanaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
eḷalateya kēṇikāvāsaṅgaḷoḷamimbaṟidu bīḍaṁ biḍisidāgaḷ,

lg.l: rdida janadiṁ karaṁ saphalamādudu pempenagādudendu rā
l āgi teraḷdu pokku poṟamaṭṭa madēbhagaṇakke maṇḍanā

div.p:
ant’ ā maṇḍaḷēśvaranā sarōjaṣaṇḍadoḷ bīḍambiṭṭ’ irpannegaṁ
svargāpavargamārgadantapagatakalmaṣaruṁ, ambaradante sanmārgaruṁ, ambhōdhi
yante gambhirāśayaruṁ, ādityanante nirdhūtatamastamaruṁ, candranante
sarvasattvasaumyaruṁ, anilanante nissaṅgaruṁ, cintāmaṇiyante bhavyajana
manōbhilaṣita phalapradaruṁ, mēruvinantacaḷitadhair‍yaguṇarum appa dharmavara
sāgarasēnar emba gaganacāraṇar kāntāracaryāmārgadoḷ tamma vāsakke barparaṁ
śrīmatiyuṁ tānuṁ kaṇḍu sambhramamberasidiraṁ naḍedu baddhāñjaḷipuṭaghaṭita niṭilarāgi
nilkendu nilisi,
tamage dorekoḷe,
antu bīḍiṅgamāścaryaṁ negaḻe,

div.head: pañcamāśvāsaṁ
div.p: besagoṇḍāgaḷ vr̥ddhakañcuki,

embudumarasanaṟidusiradirim endu tanmunigaḷa pādaprakṣāḷanōdakadoḷ
poraḷdu puṣpavarṣada pūgaḷoḷ pudidu dānānumōdaprabhāvadindupaśama
bhāvamaṁ tāḷdi munipatiya mukhāravindamaṁ nōḍutirda śārdūlavarāha
gōlāṅgūlanakuḷaṅgaḷaṁ nōḍuttumavarke bha[kṣyāpū]paṅgaḷaṁ tarisi nīḍuttu
mirdātmīyaparamaprasādabhūmigaḷāgirda mantrisēnānāyakapurōhitaśrēṣṭhi
padaniyuktarappamativarākampanānandadhanamitrar emba nālvara bhavāvaḷiyaṁ besagoḷe
dama[dha]ramunināthanavadhibōdhadindanukramandappade,

ī mativaranī bhavakkaydaneya bhavadoḷī jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada
vatsakāvatīviṣayada pratibaddhaprabhākarīpurado[ḷa]ti[gr̥]ddhanembarasanāgi,

lg.l: tave paṅkaprabheyoḷ daśābdhyupameyiṁ duḥkhāgniyoḷ bendu ma

div.p:
āgaḷā parvatadoḷirda śārdūlaṁ jātismaran āgi parityaktāhāra
śarīran āgi upaśāntasvāntanirdudembudaṁ tanmunīndraravadhijñānadindaṟidu ā
prītivardhananaṁ pratibōdhisuva bageyoḷā śārdūlana pūrvabhava vr̥ttāntamumaṁ
kālalabdhi dorekoḷe śarīraparityāgaṅgeydirdudembudumanaṟipi tadgiritaṭadoḷ
munne pūḻda suvarṇapūrṇakaṭāhaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟidāgaḷ cōdyambaṭṭu,
antu nōntu,

endu dhairyamane manadoḷavalambisi samādhivaḍedīśānakalpadoḷ
divākaraprabham emba vimānadoḷ divākaraprabhan emba dēvanādaṁ. ā
prītivardhananumā bhaṭṭārakar dayegeyda dīkṣey emba kalpalateya phaladiṁ
damr̥tapadaviyaṁ paḍedaṁ. ātana sēnānāyakamantripuṅgavapurōhitar mūvaruṁ
nr̥pana dānānumōdada phaladindamuttarakuruvinoḷār‍yar āgi jīvitāntyadoḷīśāna
kalpadoḷ sēnānāyakanappāryaṁ prabhākaravimānadoḷe prabhākaranemboṁ
dēvanādoṁ; mantriyappāryaṁ kāñcanavimānadoḷ kanakaprabhan emba dēvanādaṁ;
purōhitanappāryaṁ ruṣitākhya vimānadoḷ prabhañjananemboṁ dēvanādaṁ;
munna pēḻda śārdūlacaran appa dēvaṁ berasu antu nālvar dēvar lalitāṅga
dēvanādandu ninage parivāradēvarādarār; ā lalitāṅgadēvanai nīnilli bandu
vajrajaṅghanādai; ninna dēviy appa svayamprabheyumīgaḷ śrīmatiyādaḷ;
śārdūlacaran appa divākaradēvaṁ bandu matisāgaranembaṅgamātana bhārye
śrīmatigaṁ tanūjan āgi ninage mantri mativaranādaṁ; prabhākarāmaraṁ bandu
aparājitaṅgamārjavegaṁ nandanan āgi sēnānāyakanakampa[na]nādaṁ; kanakaprabhadēvaṁ
bandu śrutakīrtigamanantamatigaṁ tanayan āgi purōhitanānandanādaṁ;
prabhañjanakalpajaṁ dhanadattaṅgaṁ dhanadattegaṁ putran āgi nijaśrēṣṭhi dhanamitranādaṁ; adu
kāraṇadindivaroḷ appa snēhaṁ piridādudu. ī bhavakkeṇṭaneya bhavadoḷ bharatadoḷ
nīnāditīrthapravartakanādandī śrīmati dānatīrthapravartakaṁ śrēyāṁsanakkuṁ;
ī ninna mantri mativaranandu ninage bharatēśvaranembanātmajanakkuṁ; ī bhavadīya
sēnānāyakanakampa[na]nuṁ bāhubaliy emba tanayanakkuṁ; ī bhavatpurōhita
nānandaṁ vr̥ṣabhasēnanemboṁ tanūjanakkuṁ; ī ninna śrēṣṭhi dhanamitrananantavīryanemba
tanūbhavanakkumembudumatiprītiyiṁ vikasitavadanasarōjanāgi,

lg.l: dmaṅgaḷanaide macci nelasirdapuvī puli pandi kōḍagaṁ
muṅguriy emba nālkaṟa bhavāvaḷiyaṁ besasiṁ munīśvarā

div.p:
embuduṁ gaganacāraṇarint’ endu besasidar : ī śārdūlaṁ
prāgjanmadoḷī viṣayada hastināpurada paradaṁ dhanadattaṅgamātana paraditi
dhanadattegamugrasēnanemboṁ tanūjanapratyākhyānakrōdhadiṁ tiryagāyuṣyaṅgaṭṭi,

ī viṣayada vijayapuradoḷānandanr̥patigaṁ vasantasēnegaṁ hari
kāntan emba tanayanapratyākhyānamānadoḷ tandegavinītan āgi pēḻdudaṁ geyyade,

ī vānaraṁ pūrvajanmadoḷ dhānyapuradoḷ vaṇigvaraṁ kubēra
dattaṅgaṁ tadvanite vasudattegaṁ nāgadattanemboṁ maganapratyākhyānamāyeyaṁ kaikoṇḍu,

lg.l: maṁ capaḷaṁ koṇḍu pusidu kaḷavaḷisi khaḷaṁ

div.p:
ī nakuḷaṁ pōda bhavadoḷ supratiṣṭhapuradoḷ apratyākhyāna
lōbhābhibhūtaṁ dravyalōlupanemboṁ kalluriganāgi,

lg.l: puravarēśana māḍida caityakkiṭṭigegaḷ bare nōḍi ka

div.p:
ondu divasamātaṁ keladūrge pōguttuṁ tanna magaṅgiṭṭigegoḷva
besanaṁ pēḻdu pēdoḍavanondumaṁ koḷḷadire maguḻdu bandu,

tadvr̥ttāntamellanaṟidu tatparādhīśaṁ daṇḍise gatajīvitan āgi bandilli
nakuḷanādaṁ; intī śārdūlavarāhagōlāṅgūlanakulaṅgaḷ nālkuṁ
bhavaddānānumōdadiṁ jātismaraṅgaḷ āgi bhōgabhūmige baddhāyuṣyaṅgaḷāduvu.
antu divyamānuṣagōcaram appa sukhaṅgaḷaṁ ninnoḍanuṇuttuṁ bandu bharatadoḷ
nīṁ bhaviṣyattīrthakaranādandanukramadoḷ ninaganantavīrācyutavīra[suvīra]remba
tanayarapparend’ intu cāraṇamunīndrar besasi satpathōnnatiyaṁ nannimāḍuvante
satpathātithigaḷādar. arasanuṁ śrīmatiyumandellarumavara guṇaṅgaḷane
mativarādigaḷoḷ nuḍiyuttumirdu maṟudivasaṁ samastasāmagriyiṁ payaṇada
mēle payaṇambōgi puṇḍarīkiṇiyaneydi.

ant’ ātmīyabhāginēyananā rājyadoḷ paduḷammāḍi mahā
sāmantamantrimaṇḍaḷakkappayisi nijavijayarājadhānigutpaḷakhēṭakke vandu,

ant’ anēkasaṁvatsaraṅgaḷ salvinegamondudivasaṁ rajanīsamayadoḷ anarghya
marakatamaṇiśilāsampāditamēdinīvibhāgadoḷ amarakhacarakinnaramithunasanātha
vicitrabhittivirājitadoḷatibahaḷakāḷāgarudhūpadhūmāmōdadoḷativiśadamaṇi
pradīpikōddyōtadūrīkr̥tatamastamadoḷanēkaratnaracitapratipādukāvinyastakāñcana
mañcōpaśōbhitadoḷ payaḥpayōdhiphēnasaṅkāśadukūlōpapracchadācchādita
vicitranētrōbhayōpadhānaśayyātaḷadoḷanēkaviḷāsinī viḷāsāvāsabhavanadoḷā
dampatigaḷanyōnyāṅgasparśasukhōnmīḷitavilōcanarantante nidrārasavaśagata
rāgirdar; annegamalli muccirda harinīlagavākṣajālakavāṭapuṭaṅgaḷaṁ
teṟeyalmaṟedu sūryakāntada dhūpaguṇḍigeyoḷaḷavaṟiyade sejjevaḷanikkida
kēśasaṁskārakāḷāgarudhūpaṁ,

lg.l: modaloḷ nīḷdu podaḷdu parbi padapaṁ kaikoṇḍu mandaisi mā
pudidā dampatiyaṁ puduṅgoḷisi lōkāścaryamaṁ māḍi koṁ
manujayugaṁ nōḍe nōḍe tat kṣaṇadoḷ tā

div.p:
āgaḷādityōdayadinavaraṁ nōḍi hāhākrandanadhvanigaḷantaḥpurakkaṁ purakkaṁ
negaḻe mativarādigaḷ taddampatigaḷge śarīraśōbheyaṁ māḍi candanaharicandanēndha
naṅgaḷoḷ dahanakriyeyaṁ nirvartisi taddhūpadhūmadoḷalliye vigatajīvitaṅgaḷāda
tir‍yagjātigaḷumaṁ saṁskarisi, baḻiyaṁ śrīmatītanayaṁ vajrabāhuvembaṅgeṁ
dharābhāramaṁ koṭṭu rājyadoḷ niṟisi tapōbharadoḷ nālvaruṁ nindu
jīvitavyapāyadoḷadhōgraivēyakadoḷahamindrapadaviyaṁ tāḷdidar; antu
pañcatvamanaidida vajrajaṅghaṅgaṁ śrīmatigamā tirikaṅgaḷgamuttamapātradānānu
mōdada puṇyaphaladindamī jambūdvīpada mandaramahīdharaduttara digbhāga
doḷirduttarakuruvembuttamabhōgabhūmiye janmabhūmiyādudu; alli,
mattamalli,

lg.l: ḷi manaṅgoḷvudu mellanalli suḻiguṁ mandāniḷaṁ nīr sudhā
pagaliruḷ emba bhēdamanayaṁ baḍavar kaḍuballidar viṣā

div.p: mattamalli,

enisida nānāratnamayaṅgaḷumapratihataprabhādyōtitadiṅmukhaṅgaḷumappa
kalpavr̥kṣaṅgaḷ,

lg.l: māḍe manaṁ vinōdarasadoḷ taḍamāḍe maguḻdu manmatha
krīḍege nōḍe nāḍe guṟiyappuvu dampati bhōgabhūmiyoḷ

div.p:
mattamalli kuśīla kutsitācāra kuvēṣa kudr̥ṣṭigaḷuṁ gr̥hītavrataparicyutaruṁ
māyācārapariṇatarappapātradānigaḷuṁ tiryagjātitvamaṁ pordida mithunaṅgaḷāgi
puṭṭi parasparavairaṅgaḷillade anāmayaṅgaḷumapagatabādhaṅgaḷum āgi ramiyisuvavu.
mattamuttamapātradānānumōdaphaladindalli puṭṭuva jīvaṅgaḷ nārīpuruṣa
saṁyōganiyōjitaśuklārtavaṅgaḷoḷ jīvayugaḷaṅgaḷ āgi nelasi kalilaghanaphēna
budbudādipariṇatiyiṁ navamāsāvasānasamayadoḷ strīpuruṣayugaḷameyāgi
puṭṭuguṁ; puṭṭidāgaḷe mātāpitr̥yugaḷaṅgaḷ sīntumāguḷisiyuṁ parāsugaḷāge
nijaśarīraṅgaḷ mañju karaguvante karage sahajadoḷapāpigaḷumārjavaṅgaḷuṁ
atimr̥dugaḷum appudaṟinde nākalōkaprāptaṅgaḷakkuṁ; avarke puṭṭida yugaḷaṅgaḷ
ēḻudivasamuṁ purātanapuṇyakarmakāmadhēnustanōpamānanijāṅguḷijanita
rasāyanāsvādadoḷamuttānaśayyeyoḷaṁ, kaḻipi, peṟagēḻudivasadoḷ temaḷduṁ,
peṟavēḻudivasakke taḷarnaḍenaḍeduṁ, peṟavēḻudivasadoḷ paduḷaṁ naḍeduṁ,
peṟavēḻudivasadoḷ kaḷākaḷāpapravīṇaṅgaḷāgiyuṁ peṟavēḻudivasadoḷ
vijñānavidaṅgaḷāgiyuṁ, peṟavēḻudivasadoḷ sampūrṇanavayauvanaṅgaḷāgi
śubhalakṣaṇalakṣitaśarīraṅgaḷāgiyuṁ, antu nālvattombattu divasadoḷ samacaturasra
saṁsthānasaṁvāhanaṅgaḷaṟusāsira bilniḍiyav āgi dinatrayadoḷ badarīphaḷa
mātrāhārigaḷumārōgyaśarīraṅgaḷuṁ saundarākāraṅgaḷuṁ tripalyōpama
jīvigaḷumāgi,

lg.l: tolagada javvanaṁ tavada meccu maralcuva nōṭamaḻtiyaṁ

div.p: ant’ anēkabhōganivāsamenisuva bhōgabhūmiyoḷ,

lg.l: ṭṭage tiḷidante tanmanujadampati dampatiyāge tōḷa ta
tā nālkuṁ mr̥gamumalli puṭṭiduv ene pē

div.p: ondu divasaṁ ā vajrajaṅghāryanātmīyaprāṇēśvariverasu,

lg.l: tuṟugidudondu kombu taḷiriṁ muguḷiṁ peṟatondu kombu su
ttiṟidudu taḷta balmiḍiya kāygaḷa goñcalanondu kombu po

div.p:
endu mattamanēkakusumakisalayaphaḷapariṇataphaḷāvanamrāmra
tarunirantaritavanalakṣmiyanoṟaldu nōḍutirpannegaṁ gaganataḷajaḷadhiyoḷ
bahitradante pariva sūr‍yaprabhan emba dēvana vimānamaṁ nōḍi,

ant’ avatarisida cāraṇadvandvakkā dvandvamidirvandu bhaktibharānata
nipatatkarṇapūrapallavaṁ tadīyapādapallavaṅgaḷanānandāśrumiśritajaḷaṅgaḷoḷ
toḷeduṁ nijōttarīyapallavaṅgaḷoḷ toḍeduṁ samuttuṅgamaṇimayāsanadoḷ
kuḷḷirisi,

embudum avaroḷagramuni muguḷnagenakku mahābaḷaviyuttaḷacaranāda
bhavadoḷāṁ ninage sacivaneṁ svayambuddhanembenāgi,

lg.l: paḍedu samādhiyaṁ ninage ninna viyōgada duḥkhadoḷ tapa

div.p:
alliṁ taḷardu jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada puṣkaḷāvatīviṣayada
puṇḍarīkiṇiyanāḷva guṇapriyaṁ priyasēnamahībhujaṅgaṁ tatsaundari saundarigaṁ.
endu pēḻdīyeṇṭuguṇaṅgaḷuṁ samyagdarśanāvayavaṅgaḷ

end’ atiprītiyiṁ prītiṅkarācāryar vajrajaṅghāryaṅgaṁ
śrīmatyāryegaṁ śārdūlāryādigaḷgaṁ muktisāmrājyapadavigiduve yuvarāja
cihnamenisida sūtrānugatam appa samyagdarśanam emba kaṇṭhikeyaṁ kaṭhikābandhanamaṁ
māḍi,

nōḍi tamma manadoḷavarupadēśaparānugrahabuddhiyuṁ sanmārga
darśanakauśalamuṁ nisargasnēhasambandhamumantaraṅgadoḷ taṇmaleye,

endu tadgaganacāraṇamuniguṇamaṇihāramanātmīyahr̥dayadoḷanibaruṁ
tāḷdi samyagdarśanamanaskhalitamārādhisi palyōpamatrayāyuṣyāvasānadoḷōṣadhi
gaḷante phaḷapākāntadoḷ kṣutavijr̥mbhaṇavyājadiṁ lōkāntaritarāgi,

lg.l: maneyindaṁ manegendu pōpa teṟadiṁ mēṇ nū[ke] pās emba mā

div.p:
alli vajrajaṅghāryaṁ suratasukhanivāsadoḷ śrīprabhavimānadoḷ
śrīdharanembaṁ dēvanādaṁ, śrīmatyāryeyuṁ samyaktvamāhātmyadiṁ strīrūpamaṁ
pattuviṭṭu tatsvayamprabhavimānadoḷ śrīdharaṅge sāmānikadēvaṁ svayamprabhanembaṁ
divijanādaṁ; śārdūlāryanuṁ citrāṅga[da] vimānadoḷ citrāṅgadāmaranādaṁ;
varāhāryanuṁ nandanavimānadoḷ maṇimakuṭakēyūramaṇikuṇḍala
vibhūṣaṇan āgi maṇikuṇḍalanemboṁ divijanādaṁ; vānarāryanuṁ nandyāvarta
vimānadoḷ suranārīmanōharaṁ manōharanembanimiṣanādaṁ; nakuḷāryanuṁ
prabhākaravimānadoḷ manōrathāvāptadivyabhōgaṁ manōrathanembaṁ
kalpajanādaṁ; intinibaruṁ sahāyaroḍane,

ondu divasamā dēvanavadhibōdhadiṁ prītiṅkarāryara kēvala
jñānōtpattiyanaṟidu dēvanikāyadoḍananēkavinōdadoḷapūrvaprabheyaṁ
tāḷdirduttuṅgaśrīprabhācaḷakke pōgi,

lg.l: kaḷipaṁ kaḷvanagurvu parve kolipaṁ kolvaṁ parastrīyaraṁ

div.p:
ā narakaṅgaḷuṁ ratnaśarkarāvāḷukāpaṅkadhūmatamōmahātamaḥ
prabhānāmamaṁ tāḷdiduvavaṟoḷ,
mattavaṟoḷanukramandappade,

ā bilaṅgaḷumindrakaśrēḍhībaddhaprakīrṇakaṅgaḷendu mūṟuteṟanakkuṁ. avaṟa
mēgaṇaṭṭugaḷoḷiṭṭa jēna puṭṭigaḷananukarisuvatiraudra bībhatsa kutsitōtpatti
sthānaṅgaḷoḷ kr̥ṣṇanīlakapōtalēśyābahvārambhaparigrahatvādyaśubhapariṇāmaṅgaḷiṁ
jīvaṁ nelasi baḻiyamantarmuhūrtadoḷāhāraśarīrēndriyōcchvāsa
bhāṣāmanaḥparyāptigaḷoḷ neredu,

antu puṭṭida vibhaṅgajñānadindapagatanarakalōkavr̥ttāntarādiṁ baḻiya
mōror‍vara neṟaṅgaḷumananyōnyavairakāraṇaṅgaḷumanugghaḍisuttumōrorva
rōrorvaranikṣuyantraṅgaḷoḷ kabbaṁ piḻivante piḻivaruṁ, kāyda vajramūṣe
yoḷikki lōhamaṁ karagisuvante karagisuvaruṁ, bāḻevāḻe tidiyugivaruṁ,
miḍumiḍuke baḍitaṅgāsuvaruṁ, nōḍe nōḍe kaṇgaḷaṁ mīṇṭuvaruṁ, nuḍiye
nuḍiye nālageyaṁ piḍidu peḍataleyindurcuvaruṁ, kāyda karbonna sūjigaḷaṁ
beralgaḷoḷ beṭṭuvaruṁ, naṭṭu paraguvaruṁ, taḷtaḷane kudiva karbonna
kāygoṇḍeṇṇeyoḷ baḻale tegapuvaruṁ, pasiya tovala tidiyoḷ pudidu
puṭapākaṁ suḍuvaruṁ, kāyda kāvaligaḷoḷ mormaranāge tāḷisuvaruṁ,
kūṭaśālmaligaḷanaḍaravēḻdidiraṁ baḻiyanurcuvaruṁ, uriva kaidīvigegaḷoḷ
mogamaṁ curcuvaruṁ, oḷḷanuriva puṇgaḷoḷ kṣāravārigaḷaneṟedorasi karcuvaruṁ,
antumalladeyuṁ,

antu sadyassantāpitalōhaputrikāparirambhasambhr̥taplōṣacalajjāṅgaḷa
gaḷadrudhiravicaḷadasthiniryanmajjā śuṣyatkaṇṭha svidyadvadana nimīḷannētra sīdadgātra
muhyanmānasākrandat svaraparigatar sairisalāṟade taḍataḍisi paritandatidrutapravāha
mānāruṣkaradravāvartagartagambhīreyaṁ, gambhīranāraka bhīṣaṇamakaramukhakuhara
nipatitākrandadārtaparuṣasvaravirasabhayaṅkareyaṁ bhayaṅkaraśiṁśumāravikaṭa
daṁṣṭrākrakacapāṭyamānanārakanikararudhiracchaṭācchāruṇāruṇitasalilalaharikāni
karakarāḷeyaṁ, karāḷanakra cakracarvita nikīrṇanirayajanikurumbaśalyaśakalaparipūrita
dhavaḷaplavadurnirīkṣaṇaviṣameyaṁ viṣamakaṭhōrakūrmagharmanirbharōcchvāsa
bharadvaidhībhavadambhaḥprakaṭitāgādharandhrāvartamānajaḷacara sañcaraṇavismayanīya
bhayānakeyaṁ bhayānakōbhayataṭaguhāgahvaranirjajjaradajagaragaḷagaḷitagaraḷa
śabaḷitasalilapravāheyaṁ pravāhātyuṣmatāpahasitapraḷayakālaprauḍhatarataraṇiyaṁ
vaitaraṇiyaṁ pokkāgaḷ,

lg.l: raḍi miḍukalke bārademagār śaraṇellige pōpevendu me

div.p:
antu śārīramānasakṣētrajaparasparōdīritadanujōdīritaṅgaḷembayduṁ
teṟada duḥkhaṅgaḷoḷardu nimiṣamātramappoḍamusirpattaṁ paḍeyade,

lg.l: modalindaṁ tudiyeyde sanda narakāyuṣyābdhi kēḷ ondu mū
rcida mūvatt ene tamma muṁ nerapidāyuṣyambaṁraṁ māyamā

div.p:
munne ninna besagoṇḍa śatabuddhiyumatyantapāpabuddhiyindamintuṭappa
duḥkhamaneraḍaneya narakadoḷanubhavisidappanembuduṁ śrīdharāmaranatyantadharma
saṁvēgaparāyaṇan āgi sarvāṅgāliṅgitamahītaḷaṁ gurūpadēśadindātanaṁ
pratibōdhisalallige pōgi,

kaikoṇḍu kālāntaradindā narakadindātaṁ bandu puṣkaravaradvīpada
pūr‍vamandarada prāgvidēhada maṅgaḷāvatīviṣayada ratnasañcayapuramanāḷva
mahīdharaṅgaṁ tatsaundari saundarigaṁ jayasēnan emba magan āgi puṭṭi, vivāha
samayadoḷ tannanā śrīdharadēvanē bandu maguḻduṁ mūdalise, yamadharagurugaḷa
pādamūladoḷ duścaratapaścaraṇaparāyaṇaṁ jīvitāntyadoḷ samāhita
cittanāgi,
annegaṁ,
annegaṁ,

āgi jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada vatsakāvatīviṣayada susīmā
nagaramanāḷva sudr̥ṣṭimahīpāḷaṅgaṁ saundarasunandāmahādēvigaṁ,

lg.l: tave nōḍal nōḍi meccal manadoḷasadaḷaṁ mecci nānāviśēṣa

div.head: ṣaṣṭhāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
ant’ agaṇyapuṇyanidhiyenisida suvidhigamātana manōrame manōramegaṁ
śrīmatīcaranenisidā svayamprabhadēvaṁ dēvalōkadindavatarisi,

mattamā viṣayadoḷ śārdūlacaran appa citrāṅga[da]dēvaṁ dēva
lōkadindavatarise bandu samānapuṇyatvaṁ kāraṇam āgi suvidhisamānan appa maṇḍaḷikaṁ
vibhīṣaṇaṅgaṁ priyadattey emba tatpriyalalanegaṁ varadattanemboṁ maganādoṁ;
varāhāryacaran appa maṇikuṇḍaladivijaṁ nandiṣēṇaṅgamanantamatigaṁ
varasēnanemboṁ tanayanādaṁ; vānarār‍yacaran appa manōharāmaraṁ ratiṣēṇaṅgaṁ
candramatigaṁ citrāṅgadanemboṁ tanayanādaṁ; nakuḷār‍yacaran appa manōrathakalpajaṁ
prabhañjanaṅgaṁ citramālegaṁ śāntamadanan emba putra[nāda]nāgi,

ondu divasaṁ suvidhidharādhīśaṁ tamma māvanappabhayaghōṣa cakravarti
vimaḷavāhanajinacaraṇavandanābhaktige pōge, tānuṁ varadatta varasēna citrāṅgada
śāntamadanar emba nālvar sahāyaruṁ tanna magaṁ kēśavanuṁ berasu pōgi
suvidhi suvidhiyiṁ jinēndrapādāravindaṅgaḷaṁ vandisuttirpannegamabhayaghōṣaṁ
dharmāmr̥tarasamanāsvādisi saṁsāraśarīrabhōganirvēgaparāyaṇanāgi,
tāḷdi,

lg.l: bratamenduṁ pasiyondumaṁ muṟiyenembī pūṇke māḍeṁ pagal

div.p:
antu kaikoṇḍutkr̥ṣṭacāritradoḷ negaḻdu jīvitāvasānadoḷ
saṁsārakṣapakan āgi samādhividhiyiṁ śarīraparityāgaṁ geydu,

kēśavanumātmīyaguruviyōgadoḷ parityaktasakalarājyaparicchēdaṁ
pravrajyapadaviyoḷ parityaktanum āgi tadacyutakalpadoḷ pratīndranādaṁ.

antu mērumūladiṁ taguḷdāṟurajju negedeḍeyoḷacyutakalpamirdudu.
alli tanna nālvaruṁ sahāyar appa sāmānikadēvaruṁ tatpratīndranuṁ berasacyutēndraṁ
navapañcāśadadhikatriśatavimānādhīśanuṁ, trayastriṁśatparimitatrayastriṁśāmarapari
vr̥tanuṁ, ayutapramitasāmānikasurānīkanuṁ, caturayutamitāṅgarakṣakapari
vr̥tanuṁ, lōkapālacatuṣṭayādhiṣṭhitanuṁ, hastyaśvarathapadātivr̥ṣabhagandharvanartakī
pramukhasaptānīkasamētanuṁ, antarmadhyabāhyapariṣatprakaṭitavibhavanuṁ, dvātriṁśa
tpramāṇapradhānadēvīnivahaviḷāsadhavaḷavilōcanagōcaranuṁ, triṣaṣṭisaṅkhyāta
vallabhikāvibhramabhrūlatātribhāgabhājananumāgi,
antu divyabhōgasampatparamparāparigatanāgi,

ant ā dēvanalliṁ taḷardu jambūdvīpada prāgvidēhada sītānadiya
baḍagaṇa taḍiya puṣkaḷāvatīviṣayada pratibaddha puṇḍarīkiṇīpuradoḷ,

mattam ā puṇyadampatige muṁ pēḻda śārdūlāryasura varadatta
carasāmānikanuṁ, varāhāryadivija varasēnacarasāmānikanuṁ, vānarārya
vaimānika citrāṅgadacarasāmānikanuṁ, nakuḷāryāmara śāntamadanacarasāmā
nikanumanukramadoḷ vijaya vaijayanta jayantāparājitar emba nālvar
tanūjarādar. vajrajaṅghanāda bhavadoḷātana mantripurōhitasēnādhipapradhāna
rājaśrēṣṭhigaḷ appa mativarānandākampanadhanamitrar emba nālvarumadhōgraivēyaka
doḷahamindrarāgirdavaralliṁ bandu subāhu mahābāhu pīṭha mahāpīṭharemba
tanayar āgi vajranābhige sahōdararādar. ā śrīmatyāryāsvayamprabhadēvaṁ
kēśavacarapratīndraṁ bandā puradoḷ vaṇigvaṁśāgraṇi kubēranindadhikanenisida
kubēradattaṅgamanantamatigaṁ dhanadēvan emba priyatanūbhavanādaṁ. intu,

lg.l: nigaḷambol toḍardondu mōhanigaḷaṁ tajjanmadoḷ nōḍe to
ṭṭage mattaṁ posatāge tamma manadoḷ taḷpoydu taḷtā tagu
ḷpugaḷoḷ pokkuvu vajralēpada taguḷpaṁ pōlvinaṁ vajranā

div.p:
tadanantame lōkāntikāmaravr̥ndaṁ bandu biccaḷise vajrakke baḷamittante
vajrasēnamahārājaṁ pariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇapariṇatamananāmravanōdyānadoḷ
sahasrasaṅkhyāvanipālakaroḍane,

ant’ ā trilōkaguru dharātaḷaṁ pogaḻvinaṁ yatyāśramadoḷ nindaṁ,
ī dharādhipaṁ gururājyāśramadoḷ nindaṁ; ā munīndra tapōnuṣṭhānadoḷ
niṣṭhitanādaṁ, ī narēndraṁ rājyānuṣṭhānadoḷ niṣṭhitanādaṁ; ā munīśaṁ
mumukṣuvr̥ttiyoḷ negaḻdaṁ, ī kṣitīśaṁ kṣatravr̥ttiyoḷ negaḻdaṁ, ā munināthaṁ
triguptiyoḷ neredaṁ, ī mahīnāthaṁ mantraguptiyoḷ neredaṁ, ā tapasvi
parīṣahaṅgaḷaṁ geldaṁ, ī tējasvi ballidaraṁ geldaṁ, ā mahāyōgi guṇaṅgaḷaṁ
pālisidaṁ, ī mahābhōgi nelanaṁ paripālisidaṁ; ā muniya manōgāradoḷ
dhyānacakraṁ puṭṭittu, ī rājyāśramamuniya āyudhāgāradoḷ cakraratnaṁ puṭṭittu;
ā municakravartiya manadoḷ mūṟuratnaṅgaḷ beḷagiduvu, ī sakaḷacakravartiya
maneyoḷ padinālku ratnaṅgaḷ beḷagiduvu; ā munivr̥ṣabhaṅge kēvala
jñānōtpattiyādudu, ī rājyavr̥ṣabhaṅge sakaḷasāmrājyasampattiyādudu; ā
paramēśvaraṅge dēvēndrarkaḷeṟagidar, ī dharādhīśvaraṅge narēndrarkaḷeṟagidar;
ā trilōkatilakaṅge divyadhvani negaḻdudu, ī kulatilakaṅge digvijayadundubhidhvani
negaḻdudu; ā munirājaṁ karmaṅgaḷaṁ gāḷisidaṁ, ī rājarājaṁ ṣaṭkhaṇḍamaṇḍaḷamaṁ
bāykēḷisidaṁ; ā bhavyavararatnākaraṁ catustriṁśadatiśayabhōgadoḷ kūḍidaṁ,
ī puruṣaratnākaraṁ daśāṅgabhōgadoḷ kūḍidaṁ. intu,
antu viṣayaviraktanāgi,

lg.l: negaḻdī ṣaṭkhaṇḍamaṁ sādhisidoḍe phalamēṁ bhōgadiṁ sādhyamēṁ baṁ
ccigamonduṇṭalli gāmpiṁ toḍarv ene paḍeveṁ śāśvataśrīyanembu
jjugadoḷ cittaṁ karaṁ taṇmaleye neṟeye niścaisidaṁ sārvabhaumaṁ

div.p:
antu niścayisi vasundharābhāramaṁ vajradantan emba nijāgratanūjanoḷ
niṟisi nijagurucaraṇasamīpadoḷ,

lg.l: nijada rūpumaṁ nirgrantharūpumaṁ kaikoṇḍu negaḻdanintī māḻkeyiṁ

div.p:
and’ ent’ endoṇḍe, hiṁsānr̥tastēyābrahmaparigrahaparityāgamembayduṁ
mahāvrataṅgaḷoḷ neredu,

mattam ivu modalāgirpatteṇṭumūlaguṇaṅgaḷoḷamuttaraguṇaṁ
gaḷoḷam uttarōttaraṁ negaḻdu,

mattaṁ caturaśītiśatasahasraguṇamaṇibhūṣaṇavibhūṣitanuṁ aṣṭādaśasahasra
śīlaratnākaranuṁ āgi pañcadaśapramādaṅgaḷaṁ bañcisi,

embinam uttamakṣamāmārdavārjavasatyaśaucasaṁyamatapastyāgākiñcanya
brahmacaryāparyāptadaśadhar‍maṅgaḷumaṁ kaikoṇḍu sākāranirākāragatamappanaśana
m emba modala tapadoḷaṁ, ēkakabaḷōnādyēkasikthapramāṇāhārambaraṁ
barpavamōdaryamemberaḍaneya tapadoḷaṁ, intembeḍeyoḷintembavar
niṟisidoḍallade nillen emba niyamaṁ modalāge vr̥ttiparisaṅkhyānanāmamāda
mūṟaneya tapadoḷaṁ, kṣīradadhighr̥talavaṇatailādirasaṅgaḷaṁ parityāgaṅgeyva
rasaparityāgam emba nālkaneya tapadoḷaṁ, strīpunnapuṁsakamr̥gapaśuparivarjitavivikta
sthānaṅgaḷoḷ nelasuva viviktavāsamembaydaneya tapadoḷaṁ neṟedu kāyaklēśa
membāṟaneya tapamanettikoṇḍu,

lg.l: rgaredūduva gāḷi siḍidu poyva siḍil kā

div.p:
mattam abhyantaratapaṣṣaṭkadoḷaṁ prāyaścittavinayavaiyāpr̥tya
svādhyāyadhyānavyutsargaṅgaḷaṁ kaikoṇḍu panneraḍutapadoḷ neṟedirpatteraḍuparīṣa
haṅgaḷaṁ geldu gaṇadharagaṇamaṁ biṭṭēkavihāriy āgi baḻiyaṁ trailōkyakṣōbhakāraṇa
tīrthakarapuṇyahētugaḷ appa ṣōḍaśabhāvanegaḷaṁ bhāvisi, bhāvaneyoḷāda
buddhitapōvikriyauṣadhirasabalākṣīṇābhidhānasaptardhigaḷoḷaṁ neṟedu, baḻiyaṁ
