mōhanīyakarmōpaśamadoḷ viśuddhātiśayaviśēṣadinupaśamaśrēṇyā
rōhaṇaṅgeydu niravaśēṣamōhōpaśamōdbhūtayathākhyātacāritrasampannananta
rmuhūrtadiṁ svasthānasthitan āgi kālāntaradoḷ śrīprabhādriśikharadoḷ prāyōpa
gamanavidhiyiṁ tvagasthibhūtasarvāṅgaṁ dhairyamane manadoḷavalambisi,

lg.l: yva siḍil timbaravāvu pāyva puliyembī bādheyoḷ meyyano

div.p:
ant’ irdanityādidvādaśānuprēkṣānusmaraṇapariṇatāntaḥkaraṇanāgi
mattameṟaḍaneya sūḻoḷamupaśamaśrēṇiyanēṟi caturvidhaśukladhyānadoḷ
pūrvāparaviṣayaviviktārthavyañjanavīryavidhivyañjanayōgasaṅkramaṇalakṣaṇa
lakṣitam appa pr̥thaktvavitarkavicāram emba modala śukladhyānadoḷ samāhitanupaśānta
guṇasthānadoḷ prāṇaparityāgaṅgeydu, sarvārthasiddhiyoḷahamindranādaṁ; adu
jambūdvīpōpamānavistārapariṇāhapariṇāmamaṁ kaikoṇḍu,

adaṟa parārthyaratnaracanāvicitrōpapādaśayanataḷadoḷanta
rmuhūrtadoḷ paryāptiyaṁ kaikoṇḍu,

annegam itta mērugiriye tanage nābhiyāge sogayisuva jambū
mahīruhalāñchanadvīpāntargata bharatakṣētramadhya madhyamakhaṇḍadoḷ mukhyaṁ
vyavahāramemberaḍuṁ kāladoḷagādimadhyāvasānavirahitamuṁ vartanālakṣaṇamuṁ
pariṇāmadravyaparivartanakāraṇamuṁ lōkākāśapradēśapramāṇaparimāṇamuṁ
asmadādyanumēyamuṁ sarvajñapratyakṣagōcaramum appudu mukhyakālaṁ;
vyavahārakālamembudu mukhyakālanirvartitakriyārūpaṁ; adu samayāvaḷi
kōcchvāsastōkanimēṣanāḷikāmuhūrtadivasapakṣamāsartvayanasaṁvatsarādi
gaṇanānukramadindaṁ percideṇikeyoḷ kūḍidudu. adu śarīrabaḷāyurdēha
pramāṇōpacayāpacayahētutvadindamutsarpiṇiyavasarpiṇi nāmamaṁ
paḍedudadondu pattukōṭikōṭisāgarōpamasaṅkhyeyaṁ tāḷdi suṣamasuṣamaṁ
suṣamaṁ suṣamaduṣṣamaṁ duṣṣamasuṣamaṁ duṣṣamaṁ atiduṣṣamaṁ endu
ondondu[ṁ] ṣaḍbhēdabhinnamāduvu. alli munnamavasarpiṇiyoḷuttamabhōga
bhūmisthitiyoḷ nālkukōṭikōṭisāgarōpamapramāṇaṁ suṣumasuṣamamemba
kālamuṁ madhyamabhōgabhūmisthitiyoḷ mūṟukōṭikōṭisāgarōpama
pramāṇaṁ suṣamam emba kālamuṁ jaghanyabhōgabhūmisthitiyoḷ eraḍu
kōṭikōṭi sāgarōpamapramāṇaṁ suṣamaduṣṣamam emba kālamuṁ kramadoḷ
ṣaṭcaturdvisahasracāpōtsēdhaṅgaḷuṁ tridvyēkapalyōpamāyuṣyaṅgaḷuṁ tridvyēka
dināntarita badarākṣadhātrīphaḷapramāṇāhāraṅgaḷum appa mithunaṅgaḷge sambhōgyamāgi
sale jaghanyabhōgabhūmiya kaḍeya paḷitōpamadeṇṭaneya bhāgamuḻidudembannegeṁ,

lg.l: ttittivargitten emba bage toṭṭane puṭṭire munnamittu be

div.p:
annegam āṣāḍhapaurṇamāsīvāsarasāyantanasamayadoḷ
parabhāgambaḍedu gaganōbhayabhāgadoḷ digbhittigaḷuṁ bhōgabhūmijara
cittabhittigaḷuṁ oḍanoḍane beḷage kālarājana jagadgr̥hapravēśakke niṟisida kanaka
kaḷaśayugaḷamumaṁ paurṇamāsīsaundariya sindūrāruṇakrīḍāgōḷakaṅgaḷumaṁ
pōltu,

ant’ avaṁ kaṇḍu berci begaḍugoṇḍa bhōgabhūmijaraṁ jājvalya
mānamakuṭakuṇḍaḷanuṁ nānābharaṇabhāsurōdāravigrahanuṁ nijatējōnirbhara
nirbhartsitaravigrahanuṁ janmāntarābhyāsajanitāvadhibōdhōdayaviditakāla
niyōganuṁ aṣṭaśatādhikacāpasahasrōtsēdhanuṁ palyōpamadaśamabhāgāyuṣyanu
mappagrimakuḷadharaṁ pratiśrutiyembaṁ,

ā manvantaramasaṅkhyēyavarṣakōṭi kunduttuṁ barpinaṁ tatprastāvadoḷ
triśatayutasahasradaṇḍōcchritaśarīranuṁ palyōpamadaśabhāgāyuṣyanumappa
sanmatiyemberaḍaneya manu puṭṭidandu,

end’ avarge sanmativikāsamaṁ māḍidudaṟinā manuge sanmatiyemba
pesarādudu. ātaniṁ baḻiyamasaṅkhyēyasaṁvatsara pramitamanvantarāva
sānadoḷaṣṭaśataviśikhāsanōtsēdhanumasaṅkhyēyāyuṣyanum āgi mūṟaneya
kuḷadharanādaṁ. ā kāladoḷ,

adaṟind’ ātanaṁ kṣēmaṅkaranendu pesaraniṭṭar. ātaniṁ baḻiyamenitānuṁ
kāladiṁ pañcōttarasaptatiyutasaptaśatakārmukōtsēdhakāyanuṁ tuṭikābda
pramitajīvitanum āgi nālkaneya kuḷadharaṁ puṭṭi pāpasatvaṅgaḷ kāḍe lakuṭayaṣṭyā
dividhiyanupadēśaṅgeydātaṁ kṣēmandharan emba pesaraṁ paḍedaṁ. alli baḻiyamanēka
kōṭi saṁvatsaraṅgaḷ pondadiṁ baḻiyaṁ pañcāśadabhyadhikasaptaśata kōdaṇḍapramāṇa
mūrtiyuṁ kamaḷapramitāyuṣyanum āgi kamaḷavadanaṁ pañcamakuḷadharaṁ puṭṭi,

ātana virāmadoḷanēkābdakōṭigaḷa kaḍeyoḷ pañcaviṁśatyanvitasaptaśata
bāṇāsanōcchrayanuṁ naḷinapramāṇāyuṣyanum āgi naḷinānananāṟaneya kuḷadharaṁ
puṭṭi maryādāvipratipattiyindamūḷvāryajanakkāghāṭaśuddhiyaṁ māḍi
sīmandharanembanādaṁ. ā mahāpuruṣaniṁ baḻiyamanēkavarṣakōṭyantaradoḷ
saptaśataśiḷīmukhāsanōnnatāpaghananuṁ padmapramitāyuṣyanum āgi padmavadana
nēḻaneya kuḷadharaṁ puṭṭi,

ātaniṁ baḻiyamasaṅkhyātavarṣaṅgaḷ sale pañcasaptatyuttaraṣaṭchata
bāṇāsanōtsēdhanuṁ padmāṅgapramitāyuṣyanumappeṇṭaneya manu puṭṭi,

ant’ ātaniṁ baḻiyaṁ kelavukālaṁ kaḻiye pañcāṁśadadhikaṣaṭchata
cāpōtsēdhavapuvuṁ kumudaparimitāyuṣyanumappombattaneya manu puṭṭi,

ātaniṁ baḻiyamanēkasaṁvatsarasahasrātikramadoḷ pañcaviṁśa
tyadhikaṣaṭchatadhanurutsēdhanuṁ kumudāṅgasaṅkhyātavarṣāyuṣyanum āgi daśamakuladharaṁ
puṭṭi candranaṁ tōṟi kūsugaḷanāḍisuvudaṁ tōṟuvanappudaṟindātanabhicandranemba
nāmameseye pesar‍vaḍedaṁ. ā manuvina kaḍeyoḷanēkavarṣasahasraṁ sale ṣaṭchatakāṇḍā
sanōtsēdhaśarīranumayutapramāṇāyuṣyanum āgi pannondaneya kuḷadharaṁ puṭṭi,

ātana kaḍeyoḷasaṅkhyēyavarṣāntaravirāmadoḷ pañcasaptatyuttara
pañcaśataśarāsanōtsēdhasaṁhana[na]nuṁ ayutāṅgāyuṣyanum āgi panneraḍaneya
kuladharaṁ puṭṭidandu,

lg.l: deṟaguva maḻe kadaḍi barpa toṟe beṭṭu tevar

div.p:
antu karmabhūmisthitiyoḷupanadyupasamudramupaparvataṅgaḷati
prakaṭamāge sōpānapaddhatigaḷoḷ giridurgārōhaṇamumaṁ drōṇiyāna
pātrādigaḷoḷ jaladurgōttaraṇamumanupadēśaṅgeydu,
ātana kaḍeyoḷucitamanvantaravyatikramadoḷ,
padimūṟaneya kuladharaṁ puṭṭi,

ātaniṁ baḻiyamasaṅkhyēyavarṣapramitamanvantarātikramadoḷ
padinālkaneya manu puṭṭidaṁ. ātaṁ,

ā nābhirājana kāladoḷ payōdharakālasvarūpaṁ citrarūpadiṁ
nabhōbhāgamaṁ parvidāgaḷ,

lg.l: lvidirgoḷe barpa sonnaligeyāge nijadhvani tūryamāge rā
gadininaraśmiy emba kasamaṁ kaḷedambaram emba pāḻanē

div.p:
antu koṇḍa padavaḻegaḷoḷ kaḷamaṣaṣṭikāvrīhiyavayāvanāḷa
gōdhūmakaṅguśyāmākakōdravanīvāratiḷātasi masūrikā kuḷittha mudgamāṣarāja
māṣāḍhakīniṣpāvacaṇakakusumbhakārpāsasarṣapajīrakadhānyakādi vividhadhānya
bhēdaṅgaḷuṁ kalpavr̥kṣaparikṣayadoḷ prajājīvanōpāyahētugaḷakr̥ṣṭapacyaṅgaḷāgi,

lg.l: tugaḷī paṇgaḷe bhōjyam endu viḷasadbhāgyōdayaṁ tōṟidaṁ

div.p:
tōṟi phaḷapākāntaṅgaḷappauṣadhigaḷaṁ stambakaryādinānāvidha dhānyaṅgaḷaṁ
padanaṟiduḍuguva kaṇaṁ māḍuvokkuvaḍukuva baytiḍuvakkimāḍuva vividhabhājanaṁ
gaḷoḷaḍuva ghr̥talavaṇatailakṣīradadhivyañjanaṅgaḷoḷ saṁskāraṁ māḍuvaḷaviyaṟi
dumbupāyamaṁ puṇḍrēkṣudaṇḍaṅgaḷaṁ kaḍikaḍidu yantrapīḍaneyiṁ rasagoḷva
teṟanumanaṟiye pēḻdu,

lg.l: mogamaṁ tāvare kaṇṇanutpaḷadaḷaṁ dhammillamaṁ sōge se
ḷḷuguraṁ kēdage purbanaṅgajana bil dantāḷiyaṁ muttu kai |

div.p:
ant’ anyōnyaprēmasañjātasvāntasampatparamparāparigatam āgi niḷiṁ
padampatiyane pōlva dampatige pavitrībhūtam appa bhūtaḷōddēśadoḷutpatsyamāna
bhāvitīrthakarapuṇyadūtāhūtaṁ puruhūtaṁ bandu,
sogayisuguṁ. mattamalli,

mattam akr̥trimapraṇayarasavisaravaśagatavibudhamithunaśataratarabhasabadhirī
kr̥takr̥takagirigaḷoḷaṁ kr̥takagiriparītanūtacūtalatāliṅgitaśātakumbharambhā
vanāntargatamaṇibhavanaṅgaḷoḷaṁ maṇimayabhavanamarakatasōpāna paṅkti
tantanyamānadīptisantānāmr̥tanānānīrajarajaḥpiñjaritajaḷajaḷāśayaṁ
gaḷoḷaṁ neṟedu sogayisuvudyānavanada kusumakisalayaparāgapiśaṅgitaraṅgattaraṅga
mādante,
ā vaprapramadege,

adaṟoḷage sutrāmane sūtradhāranāgiyuṁ kalpajare śilpigaḷāgiyuṁ
sameda celviṅge sarvatōbhadramenisida sarvatōbhadraṅgaḷoḷaṁ chandōvidyeyante
nānācchañjam appa vaḷabhicchandaṅgaḷoḷaṁ nābhirājāṅgasaṅgatam appa nandyāvartadante
sogayisuva nandyāvartadoḷaṁ janiṣyamāṇavr̥ṣabhajināvataraṇamaṅgaḷanihita
kaḷaśadarpaṇadante praśastasvastikāyamānasvastikādinānāmaṇimayaprāsādaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
vividha vīthīsanātha catuṣkaśr̥ṅgāṭakavēdikegaḷoḷaṁ vandivr̥ndakke cintāmaṇi
bhūmiyuṁ gāyakanikāyakke gandharvabhūmiyuṁ kr̥tasukr̥takke tajjanmabhūmiyu
mirpantirda nagaralalaneya lapanakke kēḷīlīlālalāmalakṣmiyaṁ tāḷdi.

antu sameda puravarakkarātinikarakkayōdhyeyappudaṟindayōdhyeyumanēka
nikētanasamanvitam appudaṟiṁ sākētamuṁ vinītajanākīrṇam appudaṟiṁ vinīteyuṁ
bhaviṣyatkauśalaviṣayasāhacaryadiṁ sukauśaleyum emba pesargaḷaniṭṭu nābhirājaṅge
rājyābhiṣēkaṅgeydu marudēvimahādēviverasu sāmrājyapaṭṭamaṁ kaṭṭi
sakaḷajanamumanājñākaraṇavidhānadoḷ niyōjisi divijakujajanitavasanaprasava
vilēpanābharaṇaṅgaḷiṁ pūjisi bhagavadamaralōkāvataraṇavinihitāntaḥkaraṇa
nāgirpannegaṁ,
ā prastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: layamaṁ karmatamastamakke jayamaṁ dharmakke pīnaṁ parā
jayamaṁ dōṣagaṇakke lakketeṟadiṁ muṁ māḍi sarvārthasi

div.head: saptamāśvāsaṁ
div.p: annegamittal,

annegam amarapati paramana caramagarbhāvataraṇamanavadhiyindamaṟi
daṟudiṅgaḷuṇṭ ene munname,

mattaṁ kulaśikhariśēkharāyamāṇapadmādisarōvaranivāsiniyarappa
śrīhrīdhr̥tikīrtibuddhilakṣmigaḷembaṟuvarumanātmīyaguṇagaṇamaṇivibhūṣaṇaṅgaḷiṁ
jinajananiyanaḷaṅkarisalumanādyanidhanajinaniḷayarucirarucakācaḷada pūrvadigbhāgada
vaiḍūrya kāñcanakanakāriṣṭadiksvastikanandanāñjanamūḷakaṅgaḷembeṇṭuṁ
kūṭaṅgaḷoḷ ramiyisuva vijaye vaijayante jayante aparājite nande
nandōttare ānande nandivardhaneyembaṇbaruṁ digvaniteyaruṁ paramajinōtsavadoḷ
śr̥ṅgāramberasu bhr̥ṅgārudhārigaḷāgaluṁ tatkuḷadariṣṭaprāgdigdēśadamōgha suprabuddha
rundravimaḷa rucaka rucakōttara candra supratiṣṭham emba kūṭāṣṭakaṅgaḷoḷ
ramiyisuva supratiṣṭhite supraṇidhi suprabuddhe yaśōdhare lakṣmīmati kīrtimati
vasundhare citreyembeṇbaruṁ digaṅganeyaraṁ nābhirājāṅganege maṇidarpaṇamaṁ
piḍiyaluṁ tanmahīdharavaruṇāśāviśēṣakam āgirda lōhitākṣa jagatkusuma padma
naḷina kumuda saumanasa yaśōbhadra sarvatōbhadraṅgaḷ emba dviguṇa catuḥkūṭaṁ
gaḷoḷaṁ sañcarisuviḷādēvi surādēvi pr̥thvi padmāvati kāñcane navamike sīte
bhadreyembeṇbarumāśāvadhūvararanādiparuṣāmbikege gāyakīnāyakiyar āgi
vicitrātapatraṅgaḷaṁ piḍiyaluṁ tadgirīndrōttara kakuddēśada sphaṭikāñjana kāñcana
rajata rucaka kuṇḍaḷa rucira sudarśanaṅgaḷembeṇṭuṁ kūṭaṅgaḷoḷirpa lambūṣe
citrarēkhe puṇḍarīkiṇi vāruṇi ādarśe śrī hrī dhr̥tiyembeṇbaruṁ dikkanyeyaraṁ
marudēvi mahādēvige cāmaramanikkaluṁ mattamā parvatada pūrvadigbhāgadoḷ
nelasida vimaḷa nityāvaḷōka svayamprabha nityōdyōtaṅgaḷ emba nālkuṁ
kūṭaṅgaḷarasiyar appa citre kanakacitre triśire sūtrāmaṇiy emba nālvaruṁ vidyutkumāri
yaranudyadviḷāsamaṇidarpaṇamanā viḷāsaratnākareyirdalli kaṇge sogayisi taḷadaḷisi
beḷagaluṁ tadavanīdharavidiṅniḷayaṅgaḷ appa vaiḍūrya rucaka maṇiprabha
rucakōttaraṅgaḷ emba vikaṭakūṭādhīśeyar appa rucake rucakāsye rucakānte
rucakaprabheyembī nālvaruṁ dikkumārikā mahattarikeyarumaṁ mattamā nagada
negeda ratnakūṭa ratnaprabha sarvaratna ratnōccayaṅgaḷ emba kr̥takadvikr̥takavikaṭakūṭaṅgaḷoḷ
koṇḍāṭadindirpa vijaye vaijayante jayante aparājitey emba vidyutkumārī
purandhriyaraṁ tīrthakarakumārajātakarmakaraṇagarbhaśōdhanādigaḷge vanitāgūḍha
vyāpāradoḷ negaḻaluṁ mattamanyanaganivāsigaḷ appa māḷike māḷini kanakadēvi
kanakacitre puṣpacūḷike māḷati suradēvi triśire modal āgi peṟarumamarakānte
yaranintenitānuṁ teṟada besaṅgaḷaṁ dharmānurāgadiṁ saudharmēndraṁ besasuvudu
mākegaḷ bandu,

antu surasudatīsandōhamamarakāminīmahattarikāniyamitātmīya
niyōgadiṁ jinajananiya manamanaṟidōlagisuvalli,

mattam ākegaḷa vadanēndubimbaṅgaḷa beḷagugaḷoḷe gaganamaṇḍalaṅgaḷella
mindumaṇḍalamayamuṁ, nikāmakōmaḷapadapallavavinyāsaṅgaḷoḷe
maṇikuṭṭimamellaṁ pallavamayamuṁ, vilōlalōcanamayūkhasantānadoḷe
desegaḷellaṁ nīlōtpaḷamayamuṁ, aṅgaprabhāpravāhadoḷe divasamellaṁ
lāvaṇyamayamum āgi nābhirājana bhavanamellamintu madanāmr̥tamayamuṁ
śr̥ṅgāramayamuṁ saukumāryamayamum āgi tōṟe, suramahattarikeyaramara
gaṇikeyaraṁ pesarvesaroḷe karedu, nipuṇikeyaṁ jinajananiya sejjeyanujjvaḷaṁ
māḍaluṁ, candrikeyaṁ candrakāntada karagamaṁ tīvalumamr̥tamatiyanamr̥tāhārada
bōnamanettaluṁ, lavalavikeyaṁ pariyaṇamaṁ bittarisaluṁ, padmikeyanagalaṁ
tandu mandirisaluṁ, manōhariyaṁ paḍisaṇavaṁ nōḍaluṁ, māḷatikeyaṁ
baḍḍisaluṁ, utpaḷikeyaṁ kaighaṭṭinīḍaluṁ, mandārikeyaṁ mandāramālikeyanettaluṁ,
viḷāsavatiyaṁ pasadanaṅgoḷisaluṁ, lavaṅgikeyaṁ lavaṅgapallavarasadoḷ
viḷāsāvāsabhavanamanuttarisaluṁ, prabhāvatiyanindranīlamaṇibhavanadoḷ
maṇipradīpamaṁ beḷagaluṁ, citralēkheyaṁ maṇistambha sālabhañjikāstambhaṅgaḷoḷ
kuṅkumarasapatralēkheyaṁ viracisaluṁ, mayūrikeyaṁ dhārāgr̥hakke gr̥hamayū
raṅgaḷaṁ naḍeyisaluṁ, cūtalatikeyaṁ kanakapañjarāntargata kōkiḷakke cūtalati
kāṅkuraṅgaḷaṁ nīḍaluṁ, mr̥ṇāḷikeyaṁ bhavanakaḷahaṁsege bāḷamr̥ṇāḷanāḷaṅgaḷaṁ
nīḍalumintu peṟavumisuvesaṅgaḷanavaravarge takkuvaṁ takkandadiṁ pēḻdāgaḷ,

lg.l: du nayaṁ bēṟe beḍaṅgu bēṟe poḷevaṅgacchāyeyuṁ bēṟe to
ṭṭane meydōṟe viśuddham appa paḷikiṁ peṇmāḍidantoppidaḷ

div.p: mattam amarādhīśaśāsanadoḷ nābhirājarājamandirāṅgaṇadoḷ,

antu dhanadaṁ sārdhakōṭitrayapramitapañcaratnavr̥ṣṭiyaṁ pratidinaṁ
suriye,

matt’ ondu divasam ā marudēvimahādēvi caturthasnānadoḷ kalpadruma
dukūlavasaneyumūrjitadaśanamayūkhajaḷaprakṣāḷitadaśanavasaneyuṁ sarvāṅgīṇa
mauktikābharaṇakiraṇākīrṇasuvarṇadurlakṣyaharicandanāṅgarāgeyuṁ jhaṅkārānu
mita kuntaḷakuḷakāntimadhuranikaranibhr̥taniḷayamanōharasanmallikādāmaparāgeyu
māgi,

lg.l: gaḷe poṟamaṭṭu banda kamaḷāsane nābhinarēndraneyde saṁ

div.p:
antu sūḻgevandanēkamasr̥ṇabhittivilikhitōpavanalatābhavana
manōbhavakēḷīlampaṭaniḷimpadampatividyādharamithunamanmathōddīpanadoḷātmīya
dēhaprabhāpravāhalalitamaṇidīptiprasaradoḷatucchamaḷayajacchaṭāsiktamarakata
maṇikuṭṭimaprakīrṇa madhukarakuḷaśabaḷamallikāmukuḷadoḷatibahaḷakāḷāgaru
dhūpadhūmajāḷōdgāri harinīlagavākṣajāladoḷaviraḷamuktādāmanikāma
kamanīyavitānadoḷamr̥takiraṇamaṇipīṭhikādhiṣṭhitaparyaṅkadoḷ,

annegaṁ pūrvōkta sar‍vārthasiddhīśvaranā bhuvanāmbikeya mukhāmbu
jātamaṁ pokkumā garbhasarōvarāmbuvinoḷ candrabimbadante saṅkramisidāgaḷā
garbhasthitārbhakana vadanacandranirgatācchajaḷacandrikeyoḷodavidantā mahādēviya
mukhēndumaṇidarpaṇalāvaṇyarasavisaramanodavise vikacadhavaḷakamaḷadaḷadīrgha
viḷōcanaṅgaḷā lāvaṇyarasapravāhakkāyatapraṇāḷaṅgaḷaṁ pōltu garbhaṁ baḷeye
baḷeye,

lg.l: ppasiya bāsege karpasedattē cōdyamidendu maraldu ba
saramaṁ muṭṭade bandu padminiya padmāmōdamaṁ pīrvavol

div.p: antu nijamanōnayanakāntakāntāvadanarasasarasijasaurabhamanāsvādisi,

lg.l: paḍeyal sālado manmathaṅge jayamaṁ mēṇīyadō sāladēṁ
gaḍamī kānteya vaktracandranele tānēnendu candraṁ nabha

div.p:
antu nābhirājananunayapracuravacanaracanegaḷinantaḥkaraṇānurāgamaṁ
māḍeyumamaramanōrameyaruṁ manamaṟidu nijamanōrathaṅgaḷaṁ
saliseyumanukramadoḷ paripūrṇaprasavasamayadoḷ,

lg.l: bare caitraṁ kr̥ṣṇapakṣaṁ dorekoḷe navamīvāsaraṁ porde lōkō

div.p:
ā triḷōkatiḷakana janmōtsavadoḷēkasamayasamavatīrṇasarvartukanandana
vikasadaśōkavikacamallikābaddhakuṭmaḷāḍambarakadambasānandāravindavikasitasindhuvāra
prabuddhalōdhraṅgaḷiṁ rāgamaṁ bīṟuvante muguḷnage naguvante puḷakamanoḷa
koṇḍante nagegaṇgaḷa poḷepaṁ kedaṟidante cinna pūgaḷaṁ meṟevante candrakabaḷamaṁ
toḍevante mahīkānte sogayise, nijaparirakṣaṇakṣamakṣamāvallabhalābha
pramuditamēdinīhr̥dayadante jaḷamapagatakaluṣamāge, karmabhūtaḷōpasarga
vidhvaṁsananimittam āgi nīrājanaṅgeyvante taddharānaḷaṁ dakṣiṇāvartam āgi pajjaḷise,
gaganagaṅgāśīkaranikaraṅgaḷindamānandanayanajalaṅgaḷaṁ sūsuvante divyāniḷaṁ tīḍe,
śaradvidhuviśadatadīya yaśaḥprasarakkavakāśaṅguḍuvante jaladharapaṭalanirōdha
rahitamākāśamatiprakāśitāśāntamāge,

āgaḷuttuṅgaprāsādakūṭakōṭigaḷa mēle puraśrīviḷāsiniya rāgada
dāṅguḍi miḷirvante miḷirva navāmrakamrakisalayaraktāṁśukadhvajaṅgaḷuṁ, ākeya
śr̥ṅgārame pallavisidante mahādvāratōraṇastambhaṅgaṅgaḷoḷagesevabhinavōllasatpalla
vasandānitasaundaravandanamālegaḷuṁ, ākeya viḷāsahāsame poṟapoṇmidante
bīdibīdigaḷoḷeḍegiṟidu kedaṟida kusumarajaṅgaḷuṁ, ākeya nirbharānandasāndra
lāvaṇyadravame desedesege pasarisidante kuṅkumacchadapaṅkacchaṭācchādanadoḷe
sogayisuva gr̥hāṅgaṇaṅgaḷuṁ, ākeya parivāravārāṅganāgaṇadante yauvana
madamuditamārdaḷikavāṁśikaprahanyamāna[vādyamāna]mr̥daṅgavaṁśaninadalayacchanda
sundaranaṭatsundarīsandōhamuṁ apūrvaramaṇīyamāge,
ā pramōdaprastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: gade muṁ kalpadrumaṅgaḷ posatalardalaraṁ tāme sālvannegaṁ sū

div.p:
antu poḍevaṭṭu janmābhiṣēkōdyuktacittanādāgaḷ caturnikāyā
marēndrasamudayamambhōdhivēḷāviḷāsadiṁ sāmānikatrayastriṁśatpāriṣadātma
rakṣalōkapāḷābhiyōgyakilbiṣaroḍane gajaturagarathapadātivr̥ṣabhagandharva
nartakīparihāsikaṁ berasu bandu munde nilvuduṁ,

antu gaganataḷadinavanītaḷakkavatarisi vividhamaṇinikētanāgrāvalagna kētu
māḷāviḷasitasākētamaṁ baḷasi dēvanikāyamire saudharmēndrapramukha
caturnikāyāmarēndravr̥ndaṁ nābhirājarājagēhāṅgaṇadoḷ sandaṇisi bandire
śuciśacimahādēvi tirōhitaśarīreyāgi,

lg.l: suramaṁ pokku tadaṅganāṅkataḷadoḷ bālārkanaṁ pōltu bhā

div.p:
antu bandu jagattritayapatiyaṁ tridaśapatiya nīḍida kēyūra
raśmirañjitabhujayugaḷakke nīḍidāgaḷ divijakujajanitasugandhadravyadravasthāsakāṅkamaṁ
nijāṅkamanēṟisikoṇḍu,

āgaḷ saudharmēndranēṟidairāvatagajēndrakke nijagajēndraṅgaḷaṁ
pakkumāḍi,
ā prastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: ppesaḷōrondaṟa mēle līle mige mūvattirvarōrante na
vadanakkemma taḷakke nīḷda nagegaṇguṁ tāṁ gaḍaṁ tanna nī
ḷda daḷaṅgaḷ gaḍa pōlvey emba seṇasiṁ mikkēvadindikki me
naḍe nōḍal rūpu kēḷal nuḍi purada janakkāytu munnante mēga
ṇgaḍardāgaḷ meyya kāṇal kaḷakaḷaminisaṁ kēḷalāytantu mattaṁ

div.p:
āgaḷ mērugirīndrambaramindranīlaśilātaḷamaṇimayasōpāna
paṅktitrayarūpadinambarame jinarājabhaktiyiṁ pariṇāmisidante sogayisirda
sōpānapaṅktimārgaṅgaḷoḷ nijastambērama[gha]ṭāṭōpaṁ berasimbāgi pōge
vōge,
antu pōgi mandarācaḷamanaididāgaḷ,

lg.l: banadoḷamavu nālku nālku nelasire giri pā

div.p:
endu mandaramahīdharada mahimeyanamarēndranamarasamitigellaṁ pēḻdu
pogaḻuttumadaṁ triḥpradakṣiṇaṅgeyye,

antu bandu pāṇḍukavanada pūrvōttarāśāmukhanivāsiyāgi
śatayōjanaviṣkambhadoḷaṁ pañcaṣaḍyōjanavistāradoḷamaṣṭayōjanōtsēdhadoḷa
maṣṭamīcandrākr̥tiyoḷamaṣṭamaṅgaḷaparivēṣṭanadoḷaṁ neṟedu,

alli dēvarājananēkamaṇikhacitavicitrastambhasambhr̥tamumuttuṅga
vastrāṅgakujasamudbhūtavasanavinirmitavitānavirājitamuṁ tārātaraḷamuktāphaḷa
lambalambūṣabhūṣitamuṁ avalambitasurabhikusumadāmākīrṇamuṁ caturni
kāyāmarēndravr̥ndasaṅkīrṇamum appa śrīmaṇṭapamaṁ viracisi mr̥garāja
viṣṭaradoḷ bāḷakanaṁ pūrvābhimukhaniviṣṭanaṁ māḍuvuduṁ,

āgaḷā saudharmēndranumīśānēndranuṁ siṁhāsanaderaḻkeladoḷaṁ
dakṣiṇōttarabhāgadoḷidirāgirda maṇimayabhadrāsanaṅgaḷoḷ kuḷḷirdu dikpāḷaru
manavaravara digbhāgadoḷe nijaparivāravāhanāṅganāyudhasamētamirisi śēṣā
śēṣadēvanikāyamanucitasthānadoḷ niṟisi janmābhiṣavaṇapariṇatāntaḥkaraṇa
nādāgaḷ,

alliṁ baḻiyamaśōkapallavōllasitacandanacarcitamāḷatīmāḷā
vēṣṭitamaṇidarpaṇaprasāritavimaḷārṇavapayaḥpūrṇakaḷadhautakaḷaśaṅgaḷaṁ
kaḷaśōddhāramantrapūrvakaṁ praṇatiprastāvanapurassaraṁ māḍi prathamakalpēśvaranu
mīśānēndranumettikoṇḍu,

antu saudharmēndranumīśānēndranumeraḍuṁ deseyoḷamaraniku
rumbamōḷivaṭṭaṣṭayōjanagambhīraikayōjanamukhavistāraśātakumbhakumbhaṅgaḷaṁ
koṇḍu,

antu dēvar dēvanoḷāvagamāda tammādaradiṁ mālegaṭṭi dugdhavāri
pūritakanakakaḷaśaṅgaḷaṁ tandu gondaḷisi sandaṇisi nīḍidāgaḷ,

lg.l: ḻkaradiṁ bārade māṇe nir‍misida dōrdaṇḍaṅgaḷoḷ bhūṣaṇō

div.p:
antu nijabhujasahasrōddhr̥takanakakumbhamukhavigaḷitakṣīravāridhāreyaṁ
jayajayaninadapūrvakaṁ jinasavanaprathamaprārambhadoḷ saudharmēndranīśā
nēndranuṁ misisidāgaḷ

lg.l: vanamāytē tanagirkkeyāda kaḍalaṁ kumbhaṅgaḷaṁ pokka dē

div.p:
antu tajjinēndrasavanasamayadoḷamarēndrakarataḷōddhr̥takārtasvara
viḷāsakaḷaśamukhavigaḷitasthūladugdhavāridhārāsahasraṅgaḷondondaṟoḷ kūḍi
mandarācaḷamarakataśiḷātaḷamaṁ sōṅkidalli pasurpesedu padmarāgagrāvaṅgaḷoḷ
kempesedu candrakāntaśiḷātaḷadoḷēkavarṇamāgiyuṁ vanaṣaṇḍaṅgaḷoḷ
taṟumbiyuṁ sarōjaṣaṇḍaṅgaḷoḷ tumbiyuṁ paridu tatpravāhaṁ
jyōtirlōkamaneydi vandāgaḷ,

lg.l: bbuḷikegaḷante tōṟiduvu tīvrakaraṁ karameyde kāydu pa
khaḷegaḷ nālkamanī nagaṁ suranagaṁ munnīgaḷentō himā

div.p:
tadanantarame surēndrasamiti surataruprasūnakarpūrapāṁsugō
śīrṣacandanadravaparimaḷasugandhijalasambhr̥tahāṭakaghaṭitaghaṭakōṭigaḷanettikoṇḍu
suridāgaḷ,
antarcisi,

end’ intu parisamāptisavanārcanastavanasamayānantaramindrāṇi
bhagavadaṅgasaṅgatajaḷakaṇaṅgaḷaṁ dēvāṅgavastraṅgaḷoḷottikaḷedu sahajasurabhi
gandhabandhuraudārikavapuvaṁ nijapramōdaprabōdhitanijadivyaparimaḷāmōdita
digaṅganāmukhaṅgaḷ appa sugandhadravyaṅgaḷaṁ pūsi ikṣvākukuḷatiḷakaṅge tiḷakamaniṭṭu
jagattrayaśēkharaṅge mandāramālāśēkharamaṁ viracisi suragirīndracūḍāmaṇige
cūḍāmaṇiyaṁ taguḷci nirañjanāñjanaviḷasanaṁ māḍi, sahajaviddhacchidrakarṇaṅge
karṇakuṇḍalaṅgaḷaniṭṭu muktisāmrājyakaṇṭhikārhaṅge maṇimayakaṇṭhikeyaṁ kaṭṭi
vijayaśrīnivāsabāhubāhuyugaḷakke kēyūrahārāṅgadakaṭakāḷaṅkāraṁ māḍi
siṁhaviṣṭarārōhaṇōcitakaṭitaṭaṅge kaṭitaṭadoḷ māṇikyamaṇikiṅkiṇīdāmamaṁ
taguḷci surāsurēndravr̥ndavanditapādaṅge mr̥dupadaṅgaḷoḷ kaḷaravaraṇita
nūpuraṅgaḷaṁ tuḍisi divijēndrōtsaṅgasaṅgataṁ māḍidāgaḷ,

antu nirvartitajanmābhiṣēkananēkadundubhibadhiritasakaḷadiṅmaṇḍaḷanā
khaṇḍaḷanamarasamitiverasayōdhyāpurakkabhimukhanādāgaḷ,

āgaḷ kalpāmarēndraprabalabaḷasamiti gaganataḷadindamandambaḍedu
vinītāpurakkavatarisi,

lg.l: gaganābhōgadoḷoppi barpa palavuṁ yānaṅgaḷaṁ tōrpa vē
negaḷaṁ vārdhiye gettu nōḍidudu bandettaṁ purastrījanaṁ

div.p:
antavatarisi cañcaccīnāṁśukamaṇidarpaṇānēkaprasūnapallavōlla
sitavividhamaṇḍanamālālaṅkr̥tarājamārgadindaṁ parimitāmarēndrasamājaṁ
berasu rājabhavanamaṁ pokku,

āgaḷ sutamukhanirīkṣaṇasamayasamupajanitapuḷakakaḷikākaḷitakalpavr̥kṣanappa
nābhimahīja[nuṁ] indrāṇīvadanacandracandrikāvighaṭitanikr̥tanidrāmudritanayana
nīḷōtpaḷey appa jagadgurujananiyuṁ bandu nijatanūjavadanavanajamanaḻkartu
nōḍi,
āgaḷ,

lg.l: dore nimagilla bhūbhuvanadoḷ peṟarirvare nōntirī jaga
dguruge pitr̥dvayaṅgaḷenisal meṟevar peṟarāro nīve pū

div.p:
āntu pūjisi janmābhiṣēkavyatikaramanavarge mahōtsāhakaram āge
savistaramaṟipi jātakarmōtsavadoḷ parijanamuṁ purajanamum osage
maruḷgoṇḍu nirbharakrīḍārasaparavaśarādāgaḷ,

antu puramumantaḥpuramumādipuruṣajanmōtsavasudhāmbu
rāśiyoḷ kūḍi mūḍi muḻkāḍuvudaṁ nōḍi tānumānandanāṭakama
nāḍalbagedu kr̥tānukaraṇame nāṭakam appudaṟiṁ bhagavajjanmābhiṣēkasambandhiyāge
tanna posate sameda samavakārarūpa[ka]maṁ daśāvatārarūpagarbhasandarbhaṅgaḷappa
śēṣāśēṣarūpakaṅgaḷumaṁ surāsurasabhegaṁ nābhirājādimanujasabhegaṁ
meṟeyalendu śuddhaṁ vicitram emba pūrvaraṅgaprasaṅgadoḷ carcarapūjāmaṅgaḷa
padōccāraṇapuṣpāñjalivikṣēpaṇādi nāndividhiyaṁ nirvartisi dr̥śyaśravyadr̥ḍha
mātrādiprayōgaṅgaḷoḷaṁ nānāvidhavādyaṅgaḷoḷaṁ aṅgikābhinayaṅgaḷoḷameseye
maghavanaghavighātārthamuddhatābhinayaprāyamumārabhaṭīvr̥ttiyuktamumappa
tāṇḍavamanāḍaludyōgaṅgeydu maṅgaḷāḷaṅkārālaṅkr̥tan āgi nāṭyavidyācār‍yanaṁ
pōltu raṅgambokku,

āgaḷ nākalōkavādyaṅgaḷoḷanēkabhēdaṅgaḷappupavādaka parivādaka
vādyaṅgaḷoḷ kinnarījanamadhuragītānugataṅgaḷanukramadoḷ negaḻe,

antu tanna tāṇḍavārambhadoḷaḷavigaḻida rāgadiṁ nirmisida bhujaśākhā
sahasraṅgaḷoḷ dāṅguḍiviṭṭanaṅgajaṅgamalategaḷananukarisi dēvagaṇikeyarāḍu
vāgaḷ,

lg.l: cisutuṁ meṭṭuva meṭṭinoḷpu janatānētraṅgaḷaṁ nāḍe ce
tānīkakkeṇeyāgi kūḍe kuṇidar mattaṁ kelar nōḍi sū

div.p:
antu dēvēndrakarasarōjākaradoḷ samutphullamukhapadmaṅgaḷiṁ
padminigaḷenisi surēndratārahāramuktāphaḷapratibimbitatanugaḷiṁ vidyādēvategaḷ enisi
divijasaundariyar gondaṇamāḍuvalli kaḍegaṇṇoḷ tuḷuṅkiyuṁ kadapinoḷ
pompuḻivōgiyuṁ bhrūvibhramadoḷ ponalvariduṁ aruṇādharadoḷ
koḷaṅgoṇḍuṁ darahasitadoḷ beḷḷaṅgeḍeduṁ aṅgarāgadoḷ [rā]gambaḍeduṁ
sirisadāmakōmaleyara bhujalategaḷoḷ pasarisiyuṁ ghanastanaṅgaḷoḷeḍapiyuṁ
gambhīranābhiyoḷ suḻigoṇḍuṁ nitambadoḷ [ta]ṟumbiyuṁ mr̥dupada
doḷandambaḍeduṁ ākegaḷaṅgōpāṅgadoḷintu nāṭyarasame tīvi tuḷuṅkuguṭṭi
divijasāmānikajanakkaṁ nābhirājādimanujasabhegaṁ atyāścar‍yamaṁ māḍidāgaḷ,

lg.l: dhare raṅgaṁ gaganaṁ manōharataraṁ nāṭyālayaṁ nartakaṁ

div.p:
antu purandaranānandanr̥tyāvasānadoḷī paramēśvaraṁ dharmāmr̥ta
varṣadiṁ bhavyasasyasamr̥ddhiyaṁ māḍuvudaṟiṁ vr̥ṣamembudu dharmamadaṟindoppu
vudaṟindaṁ svargāvataraṇasamayadoḷ nijajananīvadanavanajamaṁ svapnadoḷ
dhavaḷavr̥ṣabhākāradiṁ pokkudaṟindaṁ vr̥ṣabhasvāmiyendu pesaraniṭṭu majjanamaṇḍana
kriyegaḷge dēviyaranē dādiyarmāḍi samayānurūpavēṣada surakumārakaranoḍa
nāḍigaḷmāḍi dēvasamājaṁ berasu,
annegamittal,

lg.l: kivigimpaṁ todaḷoḷ podaḷda nuḍigaḷ kaṇgaḻkaṟaṁ rāgadā
ḍuva kūsāṭada celvugaḷ kuḍe pitr̥dvandvakke niccaṁ manō

div.head: aṣṭamāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
antu bālyakālamaṁ bāḷakēḷīlīleyiṁ kaḻipi kumārakāladoḷ
sukumāraparivr̥taṁ mahōtpannamatiśrutāvadhibōdhanappudaṟiṁ viśvavidyēśvaranuṁ
apagatānēkalōkavyāpārakanuṁ janmāntarābhyastakaḷākuśalanuṁ pratyakṣīkr̥tasakala
vāṅmayanappudaṟindaṁ chandōvidyāḷaṅkārapadavicārakāvyagītanr̥tyātōdyādi
gōṣṭhigaḷoḷaṁ śukaśikhaṇḍihaṁsasārasakrauñcakarikaḷabhamallādyanēkākāravikr̥tāmara
[kumāra] paripaṭhananaṭanamr̥dukūjitarasitadarahasitakrēṅkārārōhaṇāyōdhanādi
nānā vinōdaṅgaḷoḷamarādhipaprahitapratidinapravardhamānasurataru prasūna
grathitasurabhidāmadukūlāmbaravicitrabhūṣaṇasurabhivilēpanapramukhabhōgōpa
bhōgaṅgaḷoḷaṁ pratidinapravardhamānatanuvayōvibhavananukramadoḷe baḷeye,

antu paramātiśayarūparasagandhasparśaguṇavatparamāṇuparinirvr̥ta
mūrtiy appa paramana paripūrṇayauvanaśrīyaṁ nābhirājaṁ nōḍi,

endu tanna manadoḷ bagedu sakaḷaviṣṭapapraṇūtananītanananta
rāyamāṇaparamānandasamayadoḷ muktisāmrājyadoḷatiprājyasañjanita
nispr̥hanananavaratakalyāṇaparimitadoḷ nirantaraṁ tantrāvāpacintāntarāyaprāya
sukhalavadoḷī mahītaḷarājyadoḷ niṟisuvuduṁ maduveniṟisuvuduṁ
enagaśakyānuṣṭhānamādoḍaṁ enna bageda bageyanoḍambaḍugumoḍambaḍanemba
sambhramadoḷ āsthānamaṇḍapamaṇḍanībhūtamaṇimayāsanaprācyācaḷaśikhaṇḍa
ratnam āgirda kumāranaṁ sārevandu yathōcitahēmāsanadoḷ kuḷḷirdu
nābhirājaṁ,

antu tannuparōdhadoḷaṁ prajānugrahabuddhiyoḷaṁ pōgalāṟadoḍaṁ
baṭṭādipuruṣanoḍambaḍanaṟidu niśśaṅkan āgi divijēndrananumatadoḷ kacchamahākacchara
taṅgeyar appa yaśasvatimahādēviyuṁ sunandāmahādēviyum emba kanyāratnaṅgaḷaṁ
mahōtsāhadindameraḍuṁ deseyoḷirda dēvēndraśilpigaḷ sameyisida
pañcaratnamayavivāhamaṇṭapadoḷeḍeyaṟidu niṟisida kanakarajatamayānēkabhaṅgi
bhr̥ṅgāraṅgaḷumavaṟoḷ saṅgataṅgaḷ āgi maṇivitānanānāmayūkhaṅgaḷoḷ
seṇasi beḷaguva maṇimukuraṅgaḷuṁ avarke tāṅg āgi pacceya pasaleya pasurana
sakaḻidu nimirda nelevaḍalageya jāgaṅgaḷumavane saṅgaḍaṅgoṇḍirda
sattisaṅgaḍaṅgaḷuṁ avaṟa keladoḷanēkanākalōkōdyānapallavōllāsitaṅgaḷuṁ
padmādi sarōvaramaṅgaḷajaḷaviḷasitaṅgaḷum āgi sarvadhānyada vivāhavēdikeya
mēle nālkundeseyumanaḷaṅkarisirda pūrṇakaḷaśaṅgaḷumaṁ avanaḷaṅkārisi
vadhūvarara rāgāṅkuraṅgaḷirpantirda ratnadīpaṅgaḷumeseye baḷasida cembonna
māṅgāya goñcalgaḷa pondaḷira toṅgalgaḷa suttuṅgoṇḍa [sa]rigeya muttina
bumbhukaṅgaḷa naḍuve,

antanuvaṟidosegeyoḷamararājanuṁ sanābhigaḷ verasu nābhirājanuṁ
bandu viḷāsavatiyenisida yaśasvatiyoḷaṁ manōnayanānandeyenisida
sunandeyoḷaṁ onde paseyoḷ pāṇigrahaṇamaṁ geyisidāgaḷ,

ant’ ā jagatpavitracaritrakṣatranandaneyaroḷ nābhirājanandanaṁ, ā
nijakulatilakeyaroḷ ā manukulatilakaṁ, ā madhukaranikarakāntakuntaḷāḷaṁ
kr̥tārdhēndusaundaralalāṭeyaroḷ ā kuṭilakuntaḷamaṇḍitavipuḷalalāṭaṁ, ā
vikacamēcakōtpaḷalōcaneyaroḷ ā vimukuḷakamaḷadaḷavilōlalōcanaṁ,
ā campakakaḷikāviḷāsanāsikāvaṁśeyaroḷ ā parārthyaratnakarṇapūramayūkha
pravāhasandōhālaṅkr̥takarṇaṁ, ā parisphuranmayūkhadaśaneyaroḷ ā rāja
dvajrōjjvaḷaddaśanaṁ, ā pravāḷapāṭalādhareyaroḷ ā navāmradrumapallavādharaṁ,
ā rēkhātrayabandhurakandhareyaroḷ ā kambukubjakamanīyakandharaṁ, ā rājahaṁsō
nnatāṁseyaroḷ ā kanakaśikhariśikharōnnatāṁsaṁ, ā śirīṣakusumadāmasuku
mārabāhulateyaroḷ ā parighaparivr̥ttadīrghabāhuyugaḷaṁ, ā bāhumūla
paryantaviśrāntakucamaṇḍaleyaroḷ ā lakṣmīlīlāvihārācaḷaruciravakṣassthaḷaṁ,
ā kāmakārmukayaṣṭimuṣṭisamāyatamadhyeyaroḷ ā rājakaṇṭhīravamadhyaṁ,
ā madanacakravartikrīḍācaḷōnnatajaghaneyaroḷ ā mahēndraviracitasiṁhāsanā
rōhaṇōcitajaghanaṁ, ā kanakakadaḷīstambhavibhramajaṅghāyugaḷeyaroḷ ā
bhuvanabharaṇōttaraṇastambharamaṇīyajaṅghāyugaḷaṁ, ā navamaṇigaṇamarīci
kusumōllasitapadapallaveyaroḷ ā purandaracūḍāratnapratibimbacumbita
nakhōllasitapadapallavaṁ, ā lāvaṇyajaḷadhivēḷeyaroḷ ā lāvaṇyārṇava
kallōlaṁ, ā manōjarāja[jai]trapatākeyaroḷ ā manasijavijayakētanavaṁśaṁ
neredire,

ant’ ā garbhēśvariyar ā puruparamēśvarana manassarōvaradoḷ
tamma pādapadmaṅgaḷaṁ nelegoḷisiyuṁ, ā navamāḷikōddāmakōmaḷeyar ā
trilōkatiḷakana manōmadēbhamaṁ tamma rambhāstambhāyamānūrustambhaṁ
gaḷoḷāḷisiyuṁ ā jitāmarakāminiyar ā mahānubhāvana manōmadakaḷa
haṁsanaṁ tamma jaghanavipuḷapuḷinataḷadoḷā[ḍi]siyuṁ, ā madālasagamaneyar
ā jagatpatiya manōyānapātramaṁ tamma kucakumbhaṅgaḷinaḷaṅkarisiyuṁ, ā
mada kōkiḷa kalālāpeyar ā sakaḷakaḷāniḷayana manōmr̥gamaṁ tamma
mr̥dumr̥ṇāḷa kōmaḷabāhupāśaṅgaḷoḷ toḍarciyuṁ, ā campakamukuḷa
viḷāsanāsā vaṁśeyar ā viśvēśvarana manōmadhukaramaṁ tamma mukhāra
vindadoḷ naliyisiyuṁ, ā nīlanīrējanayaneyar ā manuvaṁśabhavyakumudā
karabāndhavana manōlatāntamāleyaṁ tamma kēśahastadiṁ kaikoṇḍuṁ, intu,

ant’ ā latāṅgiyaroḷ ādipuruṣanaśēṣasaṁsārasukhamananubhavi
suttirpinaṁ, anēkasaṁvatsaragaḷ aviditasvarūpaṅgaḷēkasaṁvatsarasamānaṅgaḷ āgi pōge
yaśasvatimahādēvi mattondu divasaṁ caturthasnānadoḷ sudhāramyaharmyataḷa
doḷēḻaneya neleyoḷ puruparamēśvaranoḍane pavaḍisi, yāminīvirāma
samayadoḷ,

āgaḷamaravādakavādyamānadundubhiśaṅkhakāhaḷāprabhātapaṭahadhvanigaḷ
desedesegeseyeyuṁ, anēkamāgadhamaṅgaḷapāṭhakakōḷāhaḷaṅgaḷ negaḻeyuṁ,
udayācaḷacūḍāmaṇi marīcinicayacumbitāmbujavanalakṣmiyoḍane labdha
prabōdhey āgi pūjitakuladēvate rājyādhidēvateyante gr̥hītamaṅgaḷaprasādhaneyuṁ
parivāravārāṅganāparīteyum āgi manōvallabhanallige vandu tadardhāsana
manaḷaṅkarisi tanna kaṇḍa kanasugaḷananukramandappadaṟipuvuduṁ anitumaṁ puru
paramēśvaranavadhārisi, tatsvapnaphalaṅgaḷanint’ endu besasidaṁ.
endu besasidāgaḷ,

annegaṁ [atigr̥dhramahīśanuṁ nārakanuṁ] vyāghranuṁ divākaraprabhanuṁ
mativaramantriyuṁ adhōgraivēyakadivijanuṁ subāhumahīpati[yumāgi]
sar‍vārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭidahamindraṁ bandu yaśasvati mahādēviya garbhāvāsa
doḷ śuktipuṭōdaravartiy appa nirmaḷōdakabinduvinante saṅkramise garbhamaṁ
tāḷdi,

lg.l: ke gaḍaṁ sairisuvan ene podaḷdudu madhyaṁ

div.p:
antu garbhacihnaṅgaḷ tōṟe, līlābhavanōpavanakr̥takagirigaḷirdante
vijayārdhahimavadacaḷakūṭaṅgaḷoḷ vihārisaluṁ, nijagr̥hōpavanakrīḍā
sarōvaraṅgaḷirdante maḷayācaḷacandananandanaṅgaḷoḷ ramiyisaluṁ, kumārabhr̥tya
kuśalabhiṣakpariṣatsampāditakalyāṇāmr̥tāhāraṅgaḷirdante ṣaṭkhaṇḍakṣētramr̥ttikeyane
savinōḍaluṁ, sēvābhijñavārāṅganāśr̥ṅgārasudhāsiktasūktigaḷirdante nissahāya
sāhasōttīrṇamahāhavārṇavapravīraprārabdhārabhaṭīsamudbhaṭakathegaḷane kēḷaluṁ
mr̥dumadhuravidagdhamugdhaparihāsamanōharāḷāpaśukaśārikegaḷirdante pañjara
gatakuñjarārātikiśōrakēsarigaḷane tarisi nōḍuttiraluṁ,

lg.l: keladoḷ śrīdarpaṇaṁ bandireyumosedu vaktrēnduvaṁ khaḻgadoḷ nō

div.p:
antu cakravartijanmōtsavasūcakamappanēkadōhaḷasandōhaṁ negaḻe
sukhaprasūtisamayadoḷ,
ā prastāvadoḷ,

āgaḷ sarabhasapracāritaparijanapadakṣōbhavicaḷitamahītaḷamuṁ, prati
nikētanōtthāpitavicitrakētanamuṁ, mr̥gamadajaḷacchaṭāsiktaprāṅgaṇamuṁ madhukaranikara
jhaṅkārahārikusumōpahāramuṁ, mahīpatinivēdanasambhramagamanaskhalitavr̥ddha
kañcukinikaramuṁ, antaḥpuraparijananirdayasammardanapatitakubjavāmana varṣadhara
nikurumbamuṁ, nābhivilambamānalambastanavisrastāntarīyōttarīya vr̥ddhadhātrī
nartananirīkṣaṇajanatājanitahāsanivāsamuṁ, yugapadutthitamaṅgaḷagītanr̥tyōnmiśritā
nēkānakalayānugata līlālāsyaprasaktakāminīkamanīyamumāgi,

āgaḷ nābhirājakacchamahākacchapramukhaprabhugaḷ neredu jātakarmōtsa
vamaṁ māḍida tadanantaradoḷ,

antu nijadēhaprabhāpravāhajalaṅgaḷoḷaṁ karacaraṇataḷaraktāmbhōru
haṅgaḷoḷaṁ atimr̥duḷabāhubāḷamr̥ṇāḷakāṇḍaṅgaḷoḷaṁ rājyalakṣmīlīlā
karanappudaṁ nannimāḍuttumantaḥpurakāntākaraparamparāsañcāraratnadarpaṇananuṁ
bandhujanakarakamaḷavanavihārakēḷīkaḷahaṁsanuṁ gurujananayanēndīvarānanda
śaraccandranumāgi,

antu nijānvayalīlālalāmaṅge lōkayātrāpravartananimitta
mādibrahmanannaprāśanacaulōpanayanādikriyegaḷananukramadiṁ tāne māḍi
sahapāṁsukrīḍānēkavibhramakrīḍārasōdārarājadārakaparivr̥tanāgi, mr̥gamadakarda
masampāditamadalēkhāmaṇḍitagaṇḍasthaḷanuṁ, kuṅkumapāṁsupaṭalasāndra
sindūritamastakapiṇḍanuṁ, dakṣiṇakarāḷambitanibiḍanivēṣṭitāṁśukaviśālasthūlavr̥tta
hastanuṁ, madāndhavijayasindhurasindūrīkr̥tanuṁ, daśaikādaśavarṣadēśīyanuṁ,
antaḥpuradāsērakananēṟi kiñcidākuñcitāgratarjanīniśitāṅkuśanantaḥpurapramada
vanapraviṣṭanāgi, kr̥takagiriśikharaṅgaḷaṁ giridurgōttuṅguśikharaṅgaḷendu pāyisiyuṁ,
atinibiḍabāḷakadaḷīṣaṇḍaṅgaḷaṁ vanadurgaṅgaḷende paḍalvaḍisiyuṁ śatasahasra
mukhāvahajānudaghna dīrghikāmbhaḥkulyāpravāhaṅgaḷaṁ jaladurgaṅgaḷende nūṅki
kadaḍisiyuṁ, līlākamalākarānīkaraktakamaḷaṅgaḷanāsyānuśōṇita śōṇaripunr̥pa
śiraṅgaḷendu tuḻiyisiyuṁ, uddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkaṅgaḷaṁ śvētātapatraṅgaḷendē māḍi
piḍisiyuṁ, abhinavōdvr̥ttadhautaśaṅkhaśaśāṅkaviśadajaḷārdrakusumaṅgaḷaṁ sārva
bhaumōcita dvātriṁśaccārucāmaraṅgaḷaṁ māḍi piḍisiyuṁ, samullasadaśōkapalla
vaṅgaḷananēkavijayavaijayantigaḷendē māḍisikoṇḍettiyuṁ, vandibāḷakavr̥ndajaya
jayānandakōḷāhaḷameseye latāgr̥ham emba rājagr̥hakke vandu,

antu nikhiḷajagadāścaryaśaur‍yarasabahaḷabālakrīḍācamatkāritavīra
cakranuṁ nijōdayānanditajagaccakranum āgi yauvanaprāptanāge,

lg.l: tandeya rūpe tandeya viḷāsame tandeya celve tandeyoṁ

div.p:
mattamā kumāraniṁ nērgiṟiyan āgi munna pēḻda purōhitanānandanuṁ
adhōgraivēyakāhamindranuṁ pīṭhanum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭida
ahamindraṁ bandu vr̥ṣabhasēnanemboṁ tanayanādaṁ; śrēṣṭhi dhanamitranuṁ adhōgrai
vēyakāhamindranuṁ mahāpīṭhanum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭidahamindraṁ
bandanantavijayanembaṁ tanūjanādaṁ; śārdūlār‍yanuṁ citrāṅgadadēvanuṁ varadatta
nr̥panumacyutasāmānikanuṁ vijayanr̥panum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭidaha
mindraṁ bandanantavīryanembaṁ tanūbhavanādaṁ; varāhāryanuṁ maṇikuṇḍalā
maranuṁ varasēnabhūmipanumacyutasāmānikanuṁ vaijayantabhūpanum āgi
sarvārthasiddhiyoḷahamindran āgi puṭṭida divijēndra bandacyutanembanātmajanādaṁ;
vānarār‍yanuṁ manōharadivijanuṁ citrāṅgadāvanipanuṁ acyutasāmānikāmaranuṁ
jayantamahīpāḷanum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭidahamindraṁ bandu
vīranembonātmabhavanādaṁ; nakuḷāryanuṁ manōrathadivyanuṁ śāntamadana
mahīnāthanumacyutasāmānikanaparājitanr̥panum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ
puṭṭidahamindraṁ bandu suvīranemboṁ nandananādaṁ; intu bharatakumāraṁ
berasu ēḻvar kumārarādiy āgi nūrvar kumārarumananibariṁ kiṟiyaḷ
brahmiy emba magaḷumaṁ paḍedu,

munna pēḻda vajrajaṅghana sēnānāyakanakampananumadhōgraivēya
kāhamindranuṁ mahābāhumahīpatiyum āgi sarvārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭidaha
mindraṁ bandu sunandāmahādēviya garbhadoḷ avatarisi,

lg.l: ḍade vaḷibhaṅgamaṁ kaḻiye tōrpudanante tanūdarakke mā |

div.p: antu garbhaṁ baḷeye,

lg.l: bagegoḷe nōḍaluṁ negaḻda mallarumaṁ piḍidotti gelda je
ṭṭigar ene sanda mallarane pōrisaluṁ piridondu dōhaḷaṁ

div.p: antu garbhadōhaḷaṁ negaḻe,
ā bāḷakana janmōtsavadoḷ,

antu janmōtsavānantaramā bāḷakaṅge bāhubaliyembanvarthābhi
dhānamaniṭṭātana lalitōttānaśayitadarahasitataraṅgitagatiskhalitamugdhajalpitādibālya
viḷāsaṅgaḷindaṁ karikarōddhūtadhūḷīviḷāsapāṁsukēḷiyindaṁ mallamēṣōddhata
rājadārakaniyuddhadindamānanditahr̥dayan āgi nābhirājānandanandananirpannegaṁ
yauvanapravēśasamayadoḷ

lg.l: n ene negaḻduvu bāhubalige palavuṁ pesargaḷ

div.p:
munnaṁ vr̥ṣabhēśvaraṁ vajrajaṅghanāda bhavadoḷā mahātmaṅge
taṅgeyādanundariye katipayabhavaparibhramaṇadiṁ bandu bāhubalikumāraniṁ
nērgiṟiyaḷāgi,

antu bharatēśvaraṁ bāhubalikumāraṁ modalāge nūrvar
kumārarumanirvar kanyeyarumanādipuruṣaṁ nōḍi manadoḷādaḻkaṟiṁ
nijānvayabhūṣaṇatanayavargakke bhūṣaṇaviśēṣaṅgaḷaṁ tanagamindraṅgaṁ sakaḷa
cakravartigaṁ tuḍalke yōgyam appa sāsiradeṇṭu tōramuttina saradindracchandaṁ
modalāge vijayacchandahāradēvacchandārdhahāraraśmikaḷāpagucchanakṣatramāḷārdhaguccha
māṇavakārdhamāṇavakaṅgaḷ emba pannondu nānāratnada suvarṇapadakaviracanādi
bhēdadiṁ pratyēkaśīrṣakōpaśīrṣakāvaghāṭakaprakāṇḍakataraḷatarabandhōpapada
pañcakasamētaṅgaḷ āgi pañcapañcāśatpramāṇaṅgaḷoḷāda hāraṅgaḷumaṁ peṟavuṁ
pratyaṅgōcitātyaṅgamaṇibhūṣaṇaṅgaḷumaṁ svamatiparikalpanadiṁ yugārambhadoḷ
paḍedu,

matt’ ondu divasam amarakumārakarapallavavidhūyamānacārucāmarajanita
mandamārutāndōḷitasūkṣmakṣaumāmbarapallavaṁ anēkadivijavandivr̥nda
saṁstūyamānatridivāvataraṇajanmābhiṣēkanānāpratibaddhanisargamahimākarṇa
nōdīrṇadarahasitavadanasarasīruhaṁ, avanatadivijadanujamanujamakuṭamaṇi
marīcipuñjapiñjaritōttuṅgasiṁhāsanāsīnavr̥ṣabhēśvaraṁ, sakaḷa[kaḷā]kaḷāpa
vidyōpadēśōtsukāśayakuśēśayanāgirpannegaṁ

lg.l: yyage mogamaṁ nōḍi karci kadapaṁ nuḍidaṁ

div.p: adu kāraṇaṁ,

adaṟiṁ nimage vayasamembudu vidyābhyāsayōgyam endu viśāla
hēmapaṭṭakadoḷ ātmahr̥tpadmasadmeyaṁ sarasvatiyaṁ pūjāpūrvakamadhivāsisi
nijatanūjeyarirvarumaneraḍuṁ keladoḷirisi,

ant’ akārādi hakārāntasvaravyañjanabhēdabhinnaśuddhākṣaraṅgaḷumaṁ
ayōgavāhacatuṣkamumaṁ saṁyōgākṣaraṅgaḷumaṁ brahmige dakṣiṇahasta
doḷupadēśaṅgeydu,

mattaṁ svayambhuvābhidhānapadavidyācchandōvicityalaṅkāraṅgaḷemba
mūṟaṟiṁ pesarvaḍeda vāṅmayamumaṁ, samastakaḷākalāpamumaṁ ādi
brahmanupadēśaṅgeydu nijātmajeyarir‍varumaṁ vidyāparipūrṇeyarumappantu māḍi
bharataṅge bharatamumanarthaśāstramumaṁ, vr̥ṣabhasēnaṅge gītavādyārthasaṅgrahamappa
gāndharvaśāstramumaṁ,anantavijayaṅge vicitra citrakaḷeyumaṁ vāstuvidyeyumaṁ
upadēśaṅgeydu, bāhubalige kāmatantrasāmudrikāyurvēdadhanurvēdahastyaśvatantra
ratnaparīkṣegaḷumaṁ mattamivu modalāge peṟavuṁ lōkōpakārigaḷappa
śāstraṅgaḷenitoḷavanitumaṁ mattina tanūjavargakkellamupadēśaṅgeydaṁ. intu,

ā prastāvadoḷ phaḷapākavirāmaṅgaḷ appa garbhaṣaṣṭivrīhiyavagō
dhūmādimahauṣadhaṅgaḷuṁ tiḷātasīkusumbhādidīprauṣadhigaḷuṁ yāvanāḷakaṅgu
kōdravādisarvauṣadhigaḷuṁ munnamakr̥ṣṭapacyaṅgaḷappuvandu viraḷaṅgaḷāgiyuṁ
analpakalpāvanijaṅgaḷapētarasavīr‍yapākaṅgaḷāgiyuṁ ādhivyādhibādhitaśarīrar
mānavarabhimānavaṁ bisuṭu nābhirājananumatadindamādibrahmanallige vandu
meyyikki poḍevaṭṭu,

lg.l: karagidudemma bāḻva teṟanāvudu dēva śaraṇge vandevā

div.p:
embuduṁ tadīyakaruṇārasaprēritārdrāśayaṁ tatprajājīvanō
pāyamaṁ pūrvāparavidēhasthitisamānamāge ṣaṭkarmaṅgaḷumaṁ varṇāśrama
vibhāgaṅgaḷumaṁ grāmagr̥hādibhēdaṅgaḷumaṁ bhōgabhūmivirāmadoḷ ī
karmabhūmiprārambhadoḷemage niṟisalvēḻkum endu manadoḷ bagedu avaraṁ
añjadirim endu tadabhimukhaprakampitakarapallavadiṁ santayisi tadanantaraṁ
bhagavadanusmaraṇamātradindamarasamitiverasērēndraṁ bandu,

endu nuḍidu tadanumatadiṁ śubhadinanakṣatramuhūrtadoḷ
jagadguruvinanumatadoḷayōdhyāmadhyam appa tanmahādigvibhāgaṅgaḷoḷ jinēndra
mandiraṅgaḷaṁ nirmisi, baḻikaṁ dēvamātr̥kasādhāraṇānūpajāṅgaḷabhēdaṅgaḷu
[ma]nantapāḷapāḷitadurgaparivr̥tāntaṅgaḷuṁ lubdhakāraṇyacara puḷindaśabarādipari
rakṣitāntarāḷadēśaṅgaḷum appa kāśikausalakaḷiṅgavaṅgakāśmīrakarahāṭakarnāṭacōḷa
kēraḷapāñcālamāḷavamahārāṣṭrasaurāṣṭravanavāsyāndhra kāmbhōjabāhlikaturuṣka
kēkayasauvīrābhīracēraśūrasē[nā]parāntikavidēha sindhu gāndhāra kurujāṅgaṇa
vidarbha vatsa yavana cēdi pallava daśārṇa kacchamahākaccha magadhāvani ramyaka kuru
samudrakādi vividhaviṣayaṅgaḷumaṁ tajjanapadamadhyaṅgaḷoḷ parikhāvapraprākāra
gōpurāṭṭāḷakāḷaṅkr̥taṅgaḷ appa rājadhānigaḷumaṁ, avaṟa baḷasiyuṁ yathōcita
pradēśaṅgaḷoḷ ēkavr̥ttiparivr̥taṅgaḷuṁ atisamr̥ddhakr̥ṣīvalakuḷādhiṣṭhitaṅgaḷumappa
abhirāmajalāśayaṅgaḷumaṁ, prabhūtayavasōdakaṅgaḷumaṁ samastasasyasampatsampanna
sukṣētraṅgaḷumaṁ, krōśadvikrōśasīmābhāgayōjanapañcaśatakuṭumbikulā
virbhāvitādhamōttamabhēdaṅgaḷumaṁ saridgiridarībhūruhasētuvanasīmōpa
lakṣitaṅgaḷum appa mahāgrāmaṅgaḷumaṁ, pūrvōttarāmbhaḥplavaṅgaḷumaṁ parikhāva
praprākāragōpurāṭṭālaparivr̥taṅgaḷumaṁ nānābhavanavinyāsōdyānalīlā
jalāśayaṅgaḷumaṁ pradhānapuruṣādhyāsitaṅgaḷ appa puraṅgaḷumaṁ, girisaritsaṁ
ruddhaṅgaḷ appa khēḍaṅgaḷumaṁ, urvīdharaniruddhaṅgaḷ appa khar‍vaḍaṅgaḷumaṁ, pañcaśata
grāmaparītaṅgaḷ appa maḍambaṅgaḷumaṁ, samudrōttīrṇanivāsaṅgaḷ appa paṭṭaṇaṁ
gaḷumaṁ, nimnagātaṭanikaṭavartigaḷ appa mahādrōṇāmukhaṅgaḷumaṁ, śirōvyūḍha
dhānyasañcayōpabhōgijananivāsigaḷ appa saṁvāhaṅgaḷumaṁ, ghōṣākarasaṅgrahākara
gōvrajaṅgaḷumaṁ, avanāḷva teṟegoḷva biṭṭibesakeyisikoḷva bhōgipa niyōgaṁ
gaḷumaṁ māḍidaṁ. intu,

tadanantaraṁ prajāpatiyuṁ prajōpajīvananimittamāge sēvādharmō
citamenisuva [asikarmamumaṁ], anēkalipividhānaṅgaḷ appa maṣiyumaṁ, kr̥ṣīvala
kulōcitam appa kr̥ṣiyumaṁ, śāstrānugatam appa vidyeyumaṁ, vaṇigvyavahārānu
kāriy appa vāṇijyamumaṁ, hastakauśalakaḷitam appa citrakaḷāpapatracchēdyādisamanvitamappa
śilpamumaṁ paḍedu tanna paḍeda sakaḷakṣatriyavaṇikchūdrar emba mūṟuvarṇaṅgaḷoḷage
kṣatatrāṇādiguṇōpētam appa akhiḷakṣatriyasamūhakke śastrakarmamumaṁ, vaṇigvaṁśakke
pāśupālyakr̥ṣipaṇyakarmaṅgaḷumaṁ, mattaṁ spr̥śyāspr̥śyakārugaḷumendirteṟada
śūdrasantatige śuśrūṣāniyōgaṅgaḷumaṁ, yathāyōgyamupadēśaṅgeydu
varṇasaṅkaramāgalīyade tamma tamma jātigaḷoḷ naṇpumaṁ koḷkoḍeyumaṁ
niyōjisi,

lg.l: ṟenisi varṇamanintu muṁ samakaṭṭiyuṁ baḻikaṁ jaga

div.p:
antu kr̥tāyugārambhasūtradhāranenisidādibrahmaṅge rājyābhiṣēkaṁ geyva
bageyaṁ bagedu,

antu bhuvanatrayacūḍāmaṇiya rājyābhiṣēkadosageyaṁ nābhi
rājādirājasabhegaṟipi mahānadyubhayataṭamr̥dumr̥tsnāvilasitavēdikāvi
rājamānadoḷ cañcatpañcaratnacūrṇaviracitaraṅgavallīviḷāsavirājita sunāsīraśa
rāsanadoḷ parasparaspardhamānaparikṣiptamallikāmukuḷamuktāphaḷōpaśōbhita
doḷindranīlamaṇikuṭṭimasaṅkrāntamauktikadāmābhirāmadoḷ pariviracita
citrāmbaravitānacchāyācchuritaraṅgabhūmiyoḷ maṅgaḷōpakaraṇasamuddharaṇa
niyamitānēkakāminīkarapallavavidhūyamāna cārucāmaramarudāndōḷita
prākārapralambamānamandāramāḷāviḷāsadoḷ anyōnyahastaparamparōpanīya
mānanānāsnānōpakaraṇadoḷ niyamitānēkanākakāminīniruddhasañcāramārga
doḷ paryaṅkanihitabahuprakārabhr̥ṅgāramaṅgaḷajalasambhr̥taśātakumbhamaṇidarpaṇa
prasāritadigaṅganāmukhadoḷ amaravāravanitākarapallavavidhūyamānaviḷāsa
doḷ gandharvasamārabdhasaṅgītamr̥daṅganādapramōditāśēṣarājadrājabhavana
doḷ sañcaratsuraviḷāsinīlalitamr̥dupadavinyāsamañjuguñjanmañjīrakamanōhara
jhaṅkārapravardhamānamadāḷikuḷakōḷāhaḷadoḷ rājabhavanāṅgaṇamadhyasthita
rājyābhiṣēkamaṇṭapadoḷ,

irisi mahāsaritsarasīsamudranandīśvaradvīpavāsigaḷindaṁ banda
tīrthōdakaṅgaḷindaṁ tīvida kaḷadhautakakaḷaśaṅgaḷanamaratarupallavaprasūna
paripūrṇamukhaṅgaḷanamararājasamājamuṁ nābhirājaṁ berasettikoṇḍu,

tadanantarame māgadhādivyantarāmarar māḍida dhārābhiṣēkadoḷaṁ
paurar māḍida naḷinīpatrapuṭaprasāditasāravajaḷapādābhiṣēcanadoḷaṁ
abhiṣēkavidhiyaṁ nirvartisi viśadayaśassiddhādhiṣṭhānapīṭhamenipa majjanapīṭhamana
dhiṣṭhisidāgaḷ, kelambararuṇamaṇikuḷaprabhājāḷajaṭiḷitapiñjaraṅgaḷ āgi nijarāga
pravāhaśaṅkeyaṁ māḍuva jaḷaṅgaḷindaṁ, kelambarindukāntakaḷaśakiraṇadviguṇa
dhavaḷanijadantakāntibahaḷaparihāsacchāyāvibhramamaṁ puṭṭisuva tōyaṅgaḷindaṁ,
kelambarindranīlakaḷaśarucinicayanicitaṅgaḷ āgi nikṣiptanīḷanaḷinadyutipaṭaḷavibhrāntiyaṁ
paḍeva salilaṅgaḷindaṁ,
āgaḷ majjanāvasaramaṅgaḷapāṭhakamadhuraninadamanālisuttuṁ,

añcu niṣpannamajjananuṁ vinihitanīrājananum āgi surarājana samarpita
santānakusumadāmāmbarabhūṣaṇaprasādhitaṁ purudēvaṁ mr̥gēndraviṣṭaradoḷire
nābhirājaṁ berasu bandu,

ant’ anēkamakuṭabaddhamaṇimakuṭamaṇikarṣaṇamasr̥ṇitacaraṇaṁ āptādhi
rājyaṁ nābhirājasannidhānadoḷakhilaprajāpālanadoḷatiprayatnaparan āgi tanna munna
paḍeda varṇatrayakkaṁ bharatanindaminn appa vipravarṇakkaṁ yathōcitavr̥ttigaḷa
naṟipalendu,

lg.l: vadanaṁ tōḷ toḍe pādamembivanivar śuśrūṣegeyyalke lā
ṟidoḍā varṇacatuṣkamaṁ kumatigaḷ tatsthānadoḷ munna pu

div.p:
antu bhaviṣyad dvijanmavarṇakadhyayanādhyāpanadānapratigrahayajanayāja
naviśiṣṭavr̥ttiyumaṁ, kṣatriyajātige satyatyāgaprajāpālanaśaraṇāgatarakṣaṇapraharaṇa
kṣamādiguṇācaraṇamumaṁ, vaṇigvaṁśakke jaḷasthaḷayātrāsaṁvr̥tamartha pravartana
mumaṁ, śūdrānvayakke brāhmaṇādivarṇatrayakkaṁ śuśrūṣā[dya]nyakar‍makaraṇōpa
jīvanamumaṁ niṟisi

mattaṁ daṇḍadhararilladandu tantamma vr̥ttigaḷaṁ prajegaḷatikramisi naḍegumenduṁ
atyantaduṣṭabaḷavajjanagrasanadiṁ durbaḷajanaṅgaḷoḷ matsyanyāyaṁ pravartisu
gumenduṁ yathōcitadharaṇīdharar appa bhūpāḷakaranavaravara padaviyoḷ niṟisal
bagedu mūrdhābhiṣiktamaṇḍaḷikaraṁ catussahasramakuṭabaddhaparivr̥taraṁ sōmaprabhahar‍ya
kampanakāśyaparaṁ barisi taducitapratipattigaḷoḷirisi, tanagāptan appa sōmaprabhaṅge
kururājābhidhānamaniṭṭu kurukulāgragaṇyanaṁ, harige harikāntanāmamaniṭṭu
harivaṁśadhvajanaṁ, akampanaṅge śrīdharāṅkanāmamaniṭṭu nāthānvayapurassaranaṁ,
kāśyapaṅge maghavākhyanāmamaniṭṭu ugravaṁśalalāmanaṁ māḍi, kacchamahākaccha
pramukhadharādhinātharumanadhirājapadaviyoḷ niṟisi,

ant’ ādidēvanikṣurasasaṅgrahaṇasamayāhūtabhūtaḷanappudaṟindaṁ ikṣvāku
kuḷatiḷakanuṁ, prajājīvanōpāyamananadinde manuvuṁ, nijakulōddharaṇadiṁ
kuladharanuṁ tējōvācakam appa kāśyamaṁ pālisuvudaṟiṁ kāśyapanuṁ,
kr̥tayugārambhakkādiyādudaṟindaṁ ādibrahmanuṁ emba apūrvābhidhānamaṁ
prayōgippanvarthanāmaṅgaḷuṁ lōkaprasiddhamāgiral, aṟuvattamūṟulakke pubbaṁ
rājyakālaṁ sale,

div.head: navamāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
mattaṁ siṁhāsanāsannasthitamaṇimayapīṭhadoḷ nābhirājanuṁ,
kanakapīṭhadoḷ kacchamahākaccharuṁ, sōmavaṁśalalāmaṁ, sōmaprabhanuṁ,
harivaṁśāgragaṇyaṁ harikāntanuṁ, nāthavaṁśanāyakanakampananuṁ, ugravaṁśāgragaṇyaṁ
kāśyapanuṁ ire, mattaṁ peṟarumaṟikeya nāyakaruṁ maṇimakuṭabaddharātmōcita
pradēśāsanaṅgaḷoḷirdōlagisuttirdannegamādidēvana pariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇamatyā
sannamembudaṁ nijāvadhibōdhadindamaṟidu saṅgītaprasaṅgadindamōlagisalendu,

bandu bhagavadāsthānamaṇṭapamanavanatamaṇikirīṭaratnapradīpaṅgaḷinda
marcisi siṁhāsanōpāntasthitakanakapīṭhadoḷ kuḷḷirdu,
antum allade,

lg.l: posave pugil posave calligaḷ posave nayaṁ

div.p:
endu saṁsāraśarīrabhōgaviraktāntaraṅganuṁ muktikāntānurakta
cittanumāgirpannegaṁ, pūrvabhavābhyastasamastāgamārtharuṁ upacita śubha
bhāvanādhyāsitāntaḥkaraṇaruṁ tribhuvanagurupariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇaśāradāgama
pratīkṣaṇadivyahaṁsaruṁ brahmakalpāntanivāsigaḷum appa sārasvatādityavahnyaruṇagarda
tōyatuṣitāvyābādhāriṣṭarembeṇbaruṁ lōkāntikadēvar bandu,

adu kāraṇadindī vasundharārājyamōham emba vajralōhanigaḷamaṁ
paṟiye poyva rājakuñjaraṅge ninagapavargamārgaṁ nirargaḷame valamādoḍamēṁ,

endavar pratibōdhisi pōgaloḍaṁ pariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇōtsa
vōtsukarāgiralā sakaḷasurasamājaṁ berasamararājaṁ muṁ māḍida janmābhiṣēkakkaṁ
baḻikke māḍida rājyābhiṣēkakkamiduve migilembant āgi pañcamahāmbudhipavitrajaḷa
paripūrṇasuvarṇakalaśaṅgaḷindamabhiṣēkaṅgeydu tadanantaradoḷ bharatarājanaṁ
barisi rājyābhiṣēkaṅgeydu,
antu taḷidu,

antu dayegeydayōdhyāpaudanapurādhipatyadoḷirvarumaṁ niṟisi
nirbharapramōdaparamparāparītadivijamanujasamājadoḷ,

mattamā vr̥ṣabhanāthanuḻidapatyavargakkellamiḷātaḷavibhāgamaṁ paccukoṭṭu
samuttīrṇarājyabhāranuṁ pariniṣkramaṇōdyuktacittanumāgi, nābhirājādi
sanābhigaḷaṁ bīḻkoṇḍu maṅgaḷāḷaṅkaraṇālaṅkr̥taṁ saudharmēndradattahastāvalambaṁ
ārūḍhaśubhapariṇāmamaṁ guṇaśrēṇiyanēṟuvudanabhyāsaṅgeyvante sudarśanavemba
śibikeyanēṟidāgaḷ,

antu vr̥ṣabhēśvarananamarēśvararuyvudaṁ kaṇḍu purajanaṅgaḷ
gujugujugoṇḍu tantammoḷintendar
embudum alliyuṁ kelar vivēkigaḷ,

lg.l: arasana pambalaṁ bisuḍimēk ene barpaneyappoḍī dharā

div.p: endu tamma tamma bagegaḷane bagedu nuḍiye,

lg.l: dano nr̥panentu sairisuvevayya viyōgamanendu sōrva ka
ṇbaniya teraḷke gadgadikegoḷva saraṁ mige pōdarātmanā
thana baḻiyaṁ manaṁ maṟukamoyye yaśasvatiyuṁ sunandeyuṁ

div.p:
āgaḷ antaḥpuravr̥ddharavaranarasarīgaḷe bandapparañjadirimendāsevātu
gaḷoḷāṟisi nuḍidoḍagoṇḍu mandirakke maguḻdar. itta nābhirājaṁ bharatēśvara
kacchamahākacchapramukhapradhānapārthivaruṁ marudēvimahādēviyuṁ pariniṣkramaṇa
kalyāṇāvalōkanakutūhaladiṁ vr̥ṣabhēśvaranoḍane suraparivr̥ḍhanayōdhyāpurakkati
dūramumatyāsannamumallada siddhārthavanada naḍuvaṇa nirantaranicitatarunikara
vigaḷitapuṣpōpahāraśōbhitadoḷ indrāṇīhastavinyastamarakatacūrṇa
raṅgavallīvirājitadoḷ amaravārāṅganārabdhamaṅgaḷagītaṅgaḷoḷ dēvāṅgavastra
viracitavicitramaṇṭapadoḷ paryantanivēśitavividhamaṅgaḷadravyaparikarapari
pūrṇadoḷ pāṇḍukaśilātalaviḷāsōpahāsicandrakāntaśiḷātaḷadoḷ, śibikeya
nirisi surāsurasabheyaṁ dūrōtsāritammāḍi janada kaḷakaḷamaṁ bārisi tanmadhyadoḷ
jagannāthananirisi paricārakabhr̥tyamaṁ dēvēndraṁ māḍal śubhabhāvaneverasu samasta
vastugaḷoḷ samateyaṁ bhāvisi bāhyābhyantaraparigrahaparityāgōnmukhamānasaṁ
trisākṣikan āgi vastrābharaṇamālyādigaḷaṁ meyyiṁ tolagisi pūrvābhimukhanuṁ
nibiḍanibaddhapalyaṅkāsananumāgi,

āgaḷ tadutpāṭitavinīḷakuṭilakuntaḷaṅgaḷanamaratarukusumadāmō
ddāmarajōrañjitaṅgaḷananarghyaratnamayapaṭaḷikeyoḷāntukoṇḍu pōgi,

antu dēvēndraṁ pariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇamaṁ mannisi tanmunīndra
padapayōjaṅgaḷgeṟagi poḍevaṭṭu pōgi tadanantaradoḷ bharatanavanatabhaktibharanirataṁ
trilōkagurucaraṇasarasijaṅgaḷanarcisi nijaparijanamberasu rājadhānige pōdaṁ.
annegamitta kacchamahākaccharuṁ bharatana magaṁ marīciyuṁ berasu nālsāsirvar
makuṭabaddharapparasumakkaḷ pōgalollade,
āgaḷ ā trilōkaikavallabhaṁ,

ant’ ā paramēśvaraṁ saptardhisampannan āgi niścaḷayōganiyōgadinda
m onderaḍu tiṅgaḷ nile, kacchamahākacchamarīcyādigaḷādimunipati[ya] mogamaṁ
nōḍi kayyanettikoḷvudaṁ kāṇade, kṣutpipāsāśītātapapramukhaparīṣahaṅgaḷaṁ
sairisalāṟade bhagnōtsāharuṁ dūrōtsāritābhimānigaḷumāgi,

lg.l: divasamanondu mēṇeraḍu mūṟ ene nilvudu mūṟutiṅgaḷā
duvu tanu kūḻa nīra deseyilladoḍalgaḷanentu tāḷduvaṁ

div.p:
inn’ emage nilaluṁ nittarisaluṁ bāradu. bisuṭu pōpoḍaṁ bharatana
deseyoḷapamānasthānarappevadaṟindaṁ nammarasanindu nāḷe kayyanettikoṇḍu pōgi
maguḻdu rājyadoḷ nilvannegamī banada kandamūlaphalaṅgaḷaṁ tindumaravinda
makarandagarbhasandarbhasarōvarajalaṅgaḷaṁ kuḍiduṁ nittarisuvamendavaroḷage
bagedu, kelar kāṇgum endu kuḍiyaluṁ peṟagaṇiṁ peṟagugeydu jaguḻduṁ, kelabar
kaṇḍoḍe karegum endu kelada maraṅgaḷanottugoṇḍuṁ, kelabaremmaneḻbaṭṭi
piḍidukoḷgum endu maguḻdu nōḍuttuṁ bīḻuttumēḻuttumōḍiyuṁ pōgi
paṇphalaṅgaḷaṁ paṟiyaluṁ koḷada tiḷinīraṁ kuḍiyaluṁ kayyaṁ nīḍuvu[daṁ]
kaṇḍu,

āgaḷ avargaḷā rūpinoḷadaṁ negaḻalañji valkalavasanaruṁ kaupīna
dhārigaḷuṁ bhasmōddhūḷitāṅgaruṁ jaṭādhararuṁ ēkadaṇḍitridaṇḍigaḷ appa parivrājakaru
m āgi tamage tāvē vanapravēśamaṁ māḍi bahuprakāraviṭapirājigaḷoḷirdu
vividhamūlaphalāśigaḷuṁ sarōvaranadīnirjharāmbupāyigaḷum āgi parityaktānya
dēvatābuddhigaḷanēkavanakusumaṅgaḷiṁ vr̥ṣabhēśvarana padapayōjaṅgaḷanarcisuttumire,
bharatasutaṁ marīci parigr̥hītaparivrājakanapasiddhāntabhāṣitaṅgaḷiṁ mithyātvavr̥ddhiyaṁ
māḍi nijōpanyastam appa kāpiḷasiddhāntamumaṁ yōgaśāstramumaṁ tōṟi
lōkamaṁ samyak jñānaparāṅmukhaṁ māḍire, ittalādi tīrthakartāranamaragiriyanta
caḷitanuṁ, pārāvāradantakaluṣitanuṁ, anilanante nissaṅganuṁ ambaradante
nirlēpanum āgi nile,
mattam ā munīndrana tapaḥprabhāvadoḷ anyōnyavairaṅgaḷaṁ maṟedu,

ā prastāvadoḷ tattapōnidhiya sannidhige kacchamahākacchara tanayarappa
namivinamigaḷabhinavayauvanārambhaprēritēndriyaviṣayasukhānubhavōnmukha
mānasar kr̥pāṇakhēṭakavyagrapāṇigaḷ bandu mahītaḷāliṅgitalalāṭapaṭṭaratisurabhi
kusumaphalapavitrajalaṅgaḷindamādipuruṣana padapayōjaṅgaḷanarcisi yuktāyukta
vicāradūramatigaḷāgi,

endu tamma bhōgakāṅkṣeyane bagedu paramayōgige yōgavyāghātamaṁ
māḍuvuduṁ pakampitāsananutpannāvadhibōdhaṁ

kaṇḍ’ ādidēvana tapōlakṣmige vismayākṣiptacittan āgi nijākr̥tisaṁvr̥tiyiṁ
triḥpradakṣiṇaṅgeydu tribhuvanagurugeṟagi poḍevaṭṭu namivinamigaḷa mogamaṁ nōḍi,

embuduṁ dharaṇēndranidiroḷavarantarnigūḍhakōpāvalēparumīṣadā
rōpitabhrūcāparumāgi,

embuduṁ dharaṇēndranavara mahānubhāvamumanādidēvanoḷāda
nirbharabhaktiyumaṁ mecci nijarūpaṁ tōṟidāgaḷ,
antu divyarūpamaṁ tōṟi,

tānum ādibhaṭṭārakara padapayōjaṅgaḷgeṟagi nijavimānamanā mānavara
nēṟisikoṇḍu pōgi rajatācalamaneydi,

lg.l: doregaṁ pempiṅgamāṭippavara mahimeyaṁ tāḷdidir nīme gambhī
bhareyoḷ sandī madīyāyatiya dorege nīṁ sakkiyembaṁ
tire nīḷpiṁ parvi pūrvāparajaḷadhigaḷaṁ muṭṭi nindattagēndraṁ

div.p:
idu bharatam emba vijayārdhadoḷ nindudaṟiṁ vijayārdhamemba
pesaraṁ paḍedudidarke prathamamēkhaḷāsthitōbhayaśrēṇiyoḷ karmabhūmiya
niyōgame niyōgaṁ; alliya khacararutkr̥ṣṭanikr̥ṣṭakālassthitiyoḷ aynūṟubillinda
mēḻumoḻadēhapramāṇadoḷ kunduvaruṁ percuvarumallar. avarge prajñaptividye
modal āgi kulajātisādhitavidyegaḷ palavuṁ besakeyvuvu. alli sādhitavidyegaḷaṁ
sādhisuvāgaḷ siddhāyatanaprabhr̥tinavakūṭaṅgaḷoḷaṁ dvīpādisamudratīraśuci
pradēśaṅgaḷoḷamirdu sādhisuvudendavaranallige vāstavyarmāḍi dakṣiṇōttara
śrēṇigaḷoḷirpa vidyādharādhīśvararaṁ barisi gaganavallabharathanūpuracakravāḷaṅgaḷemba
rājadhānigaḷ āgi negaḻda nūṟapattuṁ poḻalgaḷanoḷakoṇḍa dakṣiṇōttaraśrēṇigaḷaṁ
namivinamigaḷge koṭṭu gāndhārapannagavidyegaḷanavarge vidhipūrvakamittu,

antu dharaṇēndranavaranambaracarēndrapadaviyoḷ niṟisi nijāmaralōkakke
pōdaṁ. annegamittal,
antu,

lg.l: ḷtire tannoḷ dhareyaṁ padāmbujarajaṅgaḷ nīrajaṁ māḻpinaṁ

div.p:
antu taḷardanukramadindaṁ grāmanagarakhēḍakharvaḍamaḍambaṅgaḷo[ḷe]ḍaṁ
baḍillade caryāmārgadoḷ naḍevalli janapadapurasanābhijanaṅgaḷ kaṇḍar
kaṇḍalliye musuṟikoṇḍu,

ant’ ā munīśvaraṅge nikhiḷajagajjanāścaryacaryāparyaṭanadoḷ
mattamaṟudiṅgaḷ pōge saṁvatsaraṁ neṟedandu kurujāṅgaṇaviṣayaviśēṣakamappa
hastināpuramanāḷva kuruvaṁśaśikhāmaṇi sōmaprabhaṅge tatsvayamprabhāśrīmatyār‍yā
svayamprabhadēvakēśavamahīśācyutapratīndraṁ dhanadēvacaraṁ sarvārthasiddhiyiṁ bandu
paramaśrēyōnidhānaṁ śrēyāṁsanemboṁ priyānujanāgirdātaṁ andina beḷagappa
jāvadāgaḷ,

lg.l: daradindaṁ pēḻdu kāṇbutsavadoḷe paramānandamaṁ tāḷdi nindaṁ

div.p:
annegam ādimunīśvaranumā purāntarāḷadoḷ saṁvēgavairāgyābhi
vr̥ddhyarthamāge jagatkāyasvabhāvabhāvanāparaṁ sakaḷaśarīraguṇādhikaduḥkhārdi
tāvinītaroḷ maitripramōdakāruṇyamādhyasthavr̥ttigaḷaṁ bhāvisuttuṁ yugapramāṇa
kṣōṇīnirīkṣaṇanirutanumatidrutavilambitagativyapētanum āgi nagarāraṇyanir‍vi
śēṣanuttamamadhyamajaghanyāgāraṅgaḷoḷ candragatiyiṁ saluttumāḷōkasambhramō
pētapurajanānugamyamānaṁ sōmaprabharājamandirābhimukhan āgi barpannegaṁ,
dvārapāḷakaṁ siddārthanembaṁ paritandu bhagavadvr̥ttakaprasaktavacanaracanāmukhara
mukhasarasīruhan āgirda sōmaprabhaṅgaṁ śrēyāṁsaṅgamaṟipidāgaḷ,

āgaḷ āditīrthakartārana digambararūpamaṁ kāṇaloḍaṁ śrīmatiyāda
bhavadoḷ vajrajaṅghanuṁ tānumirda śaṣpasarōvaradoḷ cāraṇayugaḷakke
vidhipūrvakaṁ mahādānamanittudanāgaḷāgaḷe puṭṭida bhavasaṁskāradindaṁ
savistaramaṟidu,
ant’ atipramōdaprīṇitāntaḥkaraṇanāgi,
div.trailer:
idu dēvēndramunīndravandya paramajinēndramukhacandra
vākcandrikāprasaraprasādōdīrṇasūktikallōlamālākīrṇa
kavitāguṇārṇavapraṇītamappādipurāṇadoḷ
pariniṣkramaṇakalyāṇavarṇanaṁ
navamāśvāsaṁ

div.head: daśamāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
embinam āditīrthakartāranaṁ śraddhādisaptaguṇasampannanuṁ pratigrahādinava
vidhapuṇyapurassaranum āgi niṟisi, karmabhūmiya modaloḷādidānatīrtha
pravartakaṁ śrēyāṁsaṁ nijāgrajan appa sōmaprabhaṁ berasu kanakakaḷaśadoḷ tīvidamr̥ta
rasasamāna dhavaḷēkṣurasadhāre puṇyadhāreyante sogayisuvinaṁ samuttānīkr̥taviśāla
pāṇipātradoḷeṟevuduṁ,
antu kāyasthitiyaṁ nirvartisi tadanantarame,
ant’ eṟagidāgaḷ,

antu parasi poṟamaṭṭu pōpa yatipatiyaṁ kṣitipatigaḷirvaru
magalalāṟadoḍanoḍane pōgi,

ant’ entānum avaran anugamisi sōmaprabhanuṁ śrēyāṁsanuṁ maguḻdu
bandu divijakarōnmuktamuktādiratnaṅgaḷaṁ poḻalgellaṁ gōsaneviḍisi negaḻda
dānātiśayakke vismayambaṭṭu mahāmbhōrāśigambhīranappādibhaṭṭārakana
cittavr̥ttiyanā mahātmanāva māḻkeyoḷaṟidanendu bharatēśvaranakampanādinr̥pa
samūhaṁ berasu bandu pūjisi,

int’ endu pēḻdaṁ :- ī vr̥ṣanāthanī bhavakkeṇṭaneya bhavadoḷ ī
jambūdvīpada pūrvavidēhada puṣkaḷāvatīviṣayadutpaḷakhēṭam emba poḻalanāḷva
vajrabāhugamātanarasi vasundharegaṁ vajrajaṅghanemboṁ tanūjanādaṁ. ānumā
vidēhada puṇḍarīkiṇiy emba poḻalanāḷva vajradantacakravartigaṁ ātana mahādēvi
lakṣmīmatigaṁ śrīmatiy emba tanūjey āgi vajrajaṅghaṅge vallabheyeṁ, andu
śaṣpasarōvaram emba koḷana taḍiyoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭirdu cāraṇayugakke
vidhipūrvakaṁ mahādānamanittudanīgaḷādināthana munirūpamaṁ kāṇaloḍaṁ
jātismaranen āgi mārgasthitiyanaṟidu niṟisideṁ. ā dānamaṁ kuḍuva tanagaṁ koḷva
paramapātrakkamupakāriyappāhārādivitaraṇamaduvuṁ,

kuḍuvudumāhārābhayabhaiṣajyaśāstradānadiṁ caturvidhamakkuṁ.
pātramuttamamadhyamajaghanyabhēdadiṁ trividhamakkuṁ. alli darśanaviśuddhanuṁ
śīlasampannanum appa saṁyatanuttamapātraṁ; śrīsamyagdarśanaviśuddhanumaṇuvratadhāriyu
m appa śrāvakaṁ madhyamapātraṁ; darśanaviśuddhanāgiyuṁ śīlavratabhāvanārahitana
saṁyataṁ jaghanyapātraṁ; mithyādr̥ṣṭiyappaṁ tannanentuṁ samaṟi negaḻdoḍamātana
pātrame.

uḻida madhyamajaghanyapātradānaṅgaḷ madhyamajaghanyabhōgabhūmi
bhōgānubhavamanīguṁ; apātradānaṁ bhōgabhūmigaḷoḷaṁ bhōgabhūmi
pravibhāgadvīpaṅgaḷoḷaṁ tir‍yagjātitvamumaṁ antardvīpaṅgaḷoḷ kumānuṣatva
mumaṁ māḍuguṁ; idāhāradānaphalaṁ
āgaḷ avargaḷ,

adaṟinī yugādiyoḷādidānatīrthapravartanaikapuṇyabhājananai
nīneyendu pogaḻdu pūjisi pōdar. annegamitta vr̥ṣabhayōgīndranuṁ sakaḷa
sāvadyātidūram appa jinakalpitamembācaraṇamaṁ kaikoṇḍu, yōgayōgyaṅgaḷoḷ
avahitadhyānādhīnamānasan āgi vihārisuttuṁ saṁvatsarasahasraṅgaḷaṁ kaḻipi, puri
matāḷapurabahirbhāganikaṭaśakaṭōdyānavaṭaviṭapiya keḷage viśāḷanirākuḷanirjantuka
nirmalaśilāpaṭṭada mēle nibiḍanibaddhapalyaṅkāsananuṁ pūrvānumukhanu
māgirdāgaḷ,

lg.l: ldire tanu niṣprakampamire dantacayaṁ saman āgi tannoḷoṁ

div.p:
antu yōgayōgyabāhyasāmagriyoḷ munname neṟedu parama
padamane manadoḷ niṟisi, samyak jñānadarśanānantavīryasūkṣmatvāguru
laghutvāvagāhāvyābādhaṅgaḷ emba siddhaparamēṣṭhigaḷaṣṭaguṇaṅgaḷaṁ neneyuttuṁ,
adhruvādidvādaśānuprēkṣābhāvanābhāvitāntaḥkaraṇan āgi munnamājñāvicayama
pāyavicayavipākavicayasaṁsthānavicayam emba nālkuṁ dhar‍madhyānamaṁ dhyānisuttuṁ,
jñānādipariṇāmaṅgaḷoḷ niratiśayalēśyāviśuddhiyaṁ tāḷdi, tadanantaramapramatta
guṇasthānaṅgaḷoḷadhaḥpravr̥ttyapūrvānivr̥ttikaraṇapariṇāmaṅgaḷindamanantānubandhi
krōdhamānamāyālōbhaṅgaḷaṁ visaṁyōjisi, antarmuhūrtamaṁ viśramisi,
maguḻduṁ trividhakaraṇapariṇāmapariṇatananukramadiṁ mithyātvasamyaṅmithyātvasamyaktva
prakr̥tiy emba darśanamōhanīyatrikada nirmūlanadiṁ kṣāyikasamyagdr̥ṣṭiyāgi,
baḻiyamantarmuhūrtakālaṁ pramattāpramattaparāvartanasahasraṅgeydu mōkṣa
prāsādādhirōhaṇaniśrēṇībhūtakṣapakaśrēṇiprāyōgyādhaḥpravr̥ttikaraṇapariṇatana
pūrvakaraṇakṣapakaṁ prathamaśukladhyānapariṇatanāgirdāyuḥkarmamanuḻipi mattinuḻida
karmaṅgaḷaṁ sthityanubhāgakāṇḍakaghātapradēśaguṇaśrēṇinirjarādi vidhiyinanukramaṁ
kiḍisuttuṁ pratisamayamanantaguṇaśaktikhacitaikapariṇāmānivr̥ttikaraṇakṣapakan āgi
pūrvōktavidhānadinantarmuhūrtadiṁ nidrānidrāpracaḷā pracaḷāstyānagr̥ddhinarakagati
tatprāyōgyānupūrvitir‍yaggati tatprāyōgyānupūrvyēkēndrīyavikaḷēndriya
jātyātapōdyōta sthāvara sādhāraṇasūkṣmaṅgaḷ emba padināṟu prakr̥tigaḷumaṁ
niravaśēṣaṁ kiḍisi, mattamantarmuhūrtadiṁ viśuddhapariṇāmātiśayaparavaśana
pratyākhyāna krōdhamānamāyālōbhaṅgaḷembeṇṭu kaṣāyaṅgaḷaṁ kiḍisi, mattaṁ
kiṟikiṟidu bēgadiṁ tanna pariṇāmaviśēṣadiṁ catussañjvalana navanōkaṣāyaṅgaḷemba
padimūṟuprakr̥tigaḷumanantarakaraṇaṁ māḍi, mattaṁ kiṟikiṟidu bēgadiṁ kramakramadoḷe
napuṁsakavēdamumaṁ strīvēdamumaṁ puṁvēdamumaṁ purātana satkar‍madoḍane
hāsyaratyaratiśōkabhayajugupsābhidhānanavanōkaṣāyaṣaṭkamumaṁ ghātisi,
puṁvēdādinavabandhamumaṁ, mattaṁ pratisamayapravartamānasañjvalana catuḥkaṣāya
ghātitāśēṣānubhāgāśvakarṇakaraṇāpūrvakaraṇaspardhakābhighātadinantarmuhūrta
kāladiṁ kiḍisi pūrvaspardhakānubhāgamanucitakr̥ṣṭividhānadinananta guṇahānirūpadiṁ
dvādaśasaṅgrahakr̥ṣṭigaḷaṁ māḍuttumantarmuhūrtadiṁ kr̥ṣṭirūpagatacatuṣkaṣāya
samastānubhāganāgi, mattaṁ kiṟikiṟidu bēgadiṁ kramakramadindaṁ krōdha
mānamāyālōbhasañjvalanaṅgaḷaṁ mūṟuṁ teṟada kr̥ṣṭigaḷaṁ bēṟebēṟe kiḍisi
kaṣāyatrikakke nirmūḷaviḷayaṁ māḍi, mattinisuṁ bēgadiṁ lōbhasañjvalanada
modala kr̥ṣṭigatānubhāgamaṁ kiḍisi, mattaṁ dvitīya kr̥ṣṭigatānubhāgamaṁ bhēdisuttuṁ,
bādarasāmparāyakr̥ṣṭirūpānubhāgamananantaguṇahānirūpadiṁ kundisi sūkṣma
sāmparāyasamanvita sūkṣmasāmparāyakṣapakan āgi yathōktapariṇāmadiṁ
sūkṣmasāmparāyakr̥ṣṭigaḷaṁ māḍuttumantarmuhūrta kāladiṁ bādaralōbha
sañjvalanamaṁ kiḍisi, vinivr̥tta sāmāyikacchēdōpasthāpanā śuddhisaṁyamānu
gatānuvr̥tti guṇasthānan āgi tadanantarasamayadoḷ sūkṣma sāmparāyasaṁyama
samanvitaṁ sūkṣmasāmparāyakṣapakan āgi yathōktapariṇāma kāladiṁ sūkṣma
sāmparāyalōbhakke nirmūlavilayamaṁ māḍi nirastāṣṭāviṁśati mōha
nīyamaḷakaḷaṅkan āgi vītarāgadvēṣabhāvanābhāvitayathākhyātacāritrakṣīṇa kaṣāya
vītarāgacchadmastha guṇasthānānēkatvavitarkavicārābhidhānadhyānapariṇatanaparimita
pradēśanirjarādi kriyākaḷāpakaḷitanucitakatipayasamayaṅgaḷinātmadvicarama
samayadoḷ nidrāpracalegaḷaṁ kiḍisi caramasamayadoḷ matiśrutāvadhimanaḥ
par‍yaya kēvaḷāvabōdhaviṣayajñānāvaraṇapañcakamumaṁ cakṣuracakṣuravadhi kēvala
darśanāvaraṇacatuṣkamumaṁ dānalābhabhōgōpabhōgavīr‍yāntarāya
pañcakamumaṁ nirmūḷamappantormodale kiḍisi, tadanantarasamayadoḷ,
ā prastāvadoḷ,

āgaḷ ādidēvana kēvalajñānasampūrṇacandrōdayōjjr̥mbhitajagatrayāṁ
bhōdhivēḷāpradhvānānukāri ghaṇṭāravakaṇṭhīravārāvapaṭahapraṇādaśaṅkhanisvana
samutpannabōdhānēkayānavimānārūḍha kalpajajyōtiṣkavānavyantarabhavanāmara
nikāyaparivēṣṭitaśōbhitamatiruciranijāṅgarucigaḷoḷaṁ anēkāḷaṅkāraratna
prabhāprasaradoḷaṁ gaganataḷamanaḷaṅkarisi saudharmēndranindrāṇīsamētamanēkakalpā
marēndraparivr̥tan āgi bare,

lg.l: jayajaya nanda nanda paramēśvara pāpavināśa lōkavi
smayakara śambhu śaṅkara manōjabhayaṅkara bhavyabandhu ni

div.p:
antu saudharmēndraṁ bandu tanna besadoḷ munname dhanadavinirmita
m āgirda samavasaraṇamaṁ kaṇḍaṁ. adu bhūbhāgadindamaisāsiradaṇḍaṁ mēge
negedalli panneraḍuyōjanasamavr̥ttamuṁ ēkēndranīlaśilātalaghaṭitamasr̥ṇataḷamuṁ
dikcatuṣṭayavyavasthitadēvamānavatir‍yagvinēyajanasukhārōhaṇahētubhūtapadauṣadh
śaktiyuktamaṇimayaviṁśatisahasrasōpānavirājitamuṁ bhuvanatrayalakṣmīlapana
viḷōkanamaṅgaḷadarpaṇāyamānamum appa bhūmibhāgada paryantapradēśamana
ḷaṅkarisi cañcatpañcaratnapāṁśumayamāgi,

adaṟa nālkudeseyoḷaṁ makaratōraṇāḷaṅkr̥tajyōtiramaradauvāri
kaparipāḷitabahirantarjagatīdvayanihitapratyēkāṣṭōttaraśatāṣṭamaṅgaḷa navanidhi
samanvitajātarūpagōpurābhyantaramahāvīthīmadhyadoḷ dvādaśagōpuravirājita
sālatrayaparītakuṇḍadvayasamēta nandanādiṣōḍaśasarōvaraparivēṣṭita
dikcatuṣṭayavyavasthitatapanīyaṣōḍaśasōpānōpaśōbhitajagatītaḷamadhyadoḷ
anukramadoḷeṇṭu nālkunālkuṁ bilniḍiyav āgi vaiḍūr‍yahēmapañcaratna
mayaṅgaḷ appa mūṟupīṭhaṅgaḷa mēge caturaśrādhōbhāgaparivr̥ttāgrabhāgādhyāsita
hiraṇmayajinabimbakadambaṅgaḷuṁ parilambitahēmaghaṇṭākiṅkiṇīcāmara
dhvajaṅgaḷumāge,

antu harmyacaityālayāvaniyembudu. adaṟa vistāramardhayōjanaṁ.
allindatta pūrvōktavarṇanōpētavividhamaṇikhacitarajatamayacaturgōpura
dvāravirājamāna vēdikāvr̥tōbhayataṭaghaṭitamaṇimayasōpānabhāsamāna
mumardhayōjanavistāramumāgi,

ant’ allindatta vicitraratnaracitajyōtiṣyadauvārikāṣṭamaṅgaḷanavanidhi
sanāthajagatīsamanvitatāramayacaturgōpuravibhrājitahiraṇmayavēdikā
vaḷayitamuṁ aśōkalatikāpratānanavamālikāvallarīsamullāsamānamāḷatī
vratativitānacūtavallīvēllananisargasaundarakrīḍācaḷakēḷīsamabhirāmamum āgi,

lg.l: damaṁ neṟeye bhaṅgi bhaṅgiyane pō[le] dēvīviḷā

div.p: adaṟa nālkuṁ deseyoḷaṁ rajatamayagōpuracatuṣṭayaṁ nelasirdudu.

antu nālkuṁ deseya vīthigaḷoḷirda nālkunālkuṁ gōpuragaḷindaṁ
padināṟu dhūpaghaṭaṅgaḷindamoppi tatkanakaśālābhyantaradoḷ triśālatripīṭhōpa
sthitārhatpratimōpētacaityadrumōpētābhirāmamadhyapradēśāśōkasaptacchada
campakacūtapādapōpaśōbhitamumēkayōjanapramāṇavistāramumāgi,

allindatta vanavaniteya kanakakāñcīkaḷāpamananukarisi ratnābharaṇatōraṇa
ghaṇṭājāḷamuktālambanapuṣpadāmāṣṭamaṅgaḷanavanidhipradhānaṅgaḷuṁ yakṣa
dauvārikādhiṣṭhitaṅgaḷ appa nālkuṁ rajatagōpuraṅgaḷanoḷakoṇḍa kaḷadhautavēdi
kābhyantaradoḷ maṇipīṭhada mēgaṇa suvarṇastambhāgraṅgaḷoḷ,

antu nālkuṁ deseyoḷamambudhivīcīcayaviḷāsamaniḷisi miḷirva
nālsāsirada mūnūṟirppattu mahādhvajaṅgaḷindaṁ nālkulakkeyumaṟuvattaṟu
sāsiradaynūṟaṟuvattu parivāradhvajaṅgaḷindameseva patākāvanitaḷamondu
yōjanaṁ. allindattamaṣṭamaṅgalanavanidhisamētaṅgaḷuṁ nāṭyaśālādundubhidhūpa
ghaṇṭādvandvābhirāmaṅgaḷuṁ nāgakumāra dvārapāḷakavirājitaṅgaḷum appa beḷḷiya
nālkuṁ gōpuragaḷindamoppi vaḷayākr̥tiy āgi baḷasida mānuṣōttaraparvatama
niḷisuva jātarūpamayaviśālavaḷayadoḷage parabhāgambaḍedu caityavr̥kṣaparikalita
caturdigavasthitasiddhapratimāvabhāsisiddhārthavr̥kṣaparibhrājitam appa madhyapradēśamumēka
yōjanaviṣkambhamumāgi,

allindatta kārtasvaravēdikāvibhūṣaṇaṅgaḷuṁ nāgadauvārikābhirā
maṅgaḷuṁ aṣṭamaṅgaḷanavanidhiviḷasitaṅgaḷum appa rajatamayacaturgōpuraṅgaḷoḷage
nālkuṁ mahīvīthīmadhyaṅgaḷoḷ ratnatōraṇaśatāntaritaṅgaḷuṁ jinēndra
rundrasiddhābhyarcitaṅgaḷuṁ kadaḷikātapatracāmarakanakaghaṇṭākiṅkiṇīmanōharaṅgaḷu
mappombattombattuttuṅgastūpaṅgaḷamardire tadvēdikāvaḷayāntaradoḷardhayōjana
vistāram āgi,

allindatta gadādihastakalpajadauvārikādhiṣṭhitanavanidhimaṅgaḷāḷaṅkr̥tēndra
nīlagōpuracatuṣṭayavirājamāna gaganasphaṭikaprākāravēdikākuḍyadvayōpa
śōbhitamuṁ jagattrayaśrīnivāsamumākāśasphaṭikamayamumēkagavyūtivistāra
mum āgi śrīmaṇṭapamirdudu. adaṟoḷage dhūḷīśāḷadindaṁ prathamapīṭhambaraṁ
mahāmārgōbhayabhāgaṅgaḷoḷ nīḷda nirmalasphaṭikamayabhittigaḷeṇṭu berasu
padināṟuṁ bhittigaḷoḷ nālku vīdhigaḷuḻiye negaḻda panneraḍuṁ kōṣṭhaṅgaḷoḷ,

emba dvādaśagaṇaṅgaḷirkuṁ, allindattakramadoḷe vaiḍūr‍yahēmasarvaratna
mayaṅgaḷumaṣṭacatuṣṭayacaturdaṇḍōtsēdhaṅgaḷuṁ pañcāśadadhikasaptaśata
dhanurvyāptaṅgaḷumēkacāpōtsēdha citradharmacakradharayakṣādhiṣṭhitaṅgaḷumappa
mahādhvajaṅgaḷumaṣṭāṣṭamaṅgaḷadravyasampannaṅgaḷum appa prathamadvitīyatr̥tīya
pīṭhaṅgaḷindaṁ mēge ṣaḍdaṇḍaśatavistārāyāmadoḷaṁ navadaṇḍaśatōtsēdhadoḷaṁ
neṟedu,
mattaṁ ghātigaḷa kēḍinoḷ gavyūtiśatacatuṣṭaya subhikṣate modalāge,

intu dhanadaṁ sameda samavasaraṇamaṁ kramakramadoḷe nōḍuttuṁ
bandu gandhakuṭiyaṁ triḥpradakṣiṇaṅgeydu sarvāṅgapraṇatanāgi,

lg.l: binagaṁ nirbharabhakti tamma manadoḷ kaigaṇme kaimaiyoḷiṁ

div.p:
antarcisi karmārivijayānantacatuṣṭayaprāptivākpūjāsthāyikāvihāra
śarīraprakr̥tigaḷembeṇṭumatiśayaṅgaḷinatiśayabhaktiyiṁ stutiyisi, nijōcita
sthānadoḷkuḷḷirdāditīrthakarananōlagisuttirpannegaṁ, purimatāḷapurādhīśvaraṁ
bharatamahīśaniṁ nērgiṟiyaṁ vr̥ṣabhasēnakumāraṁ nānāvidhārcanāmaṅgaḷadravyahastaṁ
samastaparijanaparivr̥taṁ bandu vr̥ṣabhēśvarana śrīmukhamaṁ kāṇaloḍaṁ
āsannabhavyatāprēritanāgi,

antu dīkṣāgrahaṇānantarasamayasamutpannasaptardhijñānacatuṣṭayaṁ
prathamagaṇadharanādaṁ. annegamitta bharatarājanayōdhyeyoḷāsthānamaṇṭapadoḷire
tatpurōhitāyudhādhyakṣāntaḥpuravr̥ddhakañcukigaḷ bandu mahītaḷāśliṣṭajānu
lalāṭapaṭṭar praṇāmārpaṇapurassaraṁ śirōvēṣṭanapralambacēḷāñcaḷapihita
vadanarāgi,

antu bandu gaganamaṇḍaḷamanalaṅkarisidabhavanāsthānamaṇṭapamaṁ
geṇṭaṟoḷe kaṇḍu madagajēndramaniḻidu rājacihnaṅgaḷanirisi dhūḷīśāḷamānastaṁ
bhāmbhaḥkhātikāvallīvanōpavanapatākāvanikalpabhūruhabhūtaḷastūpaprāsāda
māḷāviḷāsitamumanavaṟeḍeyeḍeya kanakaprākāravēdikānēkagōpuradvāra
pāḷakāṣṭamaṅgaḷanavanidhi tōraṇa dhūpaghaṭa nāṭyaśālā caityavr̥kṣa siddārtha
mahīruhamahāśōbheyumaṁ śrīmaṇṭapaśrīyumanatyantavismayasmēramukhanu
matiruciranyastahastapallavanuṁ muhurmuhurāndōḷitamastanuṁ udañcadrō
māñcakañcukitanumāginōḍuttumuttuṅgaprathamadvitīyatr̥tīyapīṭhaṁ
gaḷananēkārcanegaḷindarcisuttuṁ mūṟusūḻbalagoṇḍu jagattritayādhīśvara
śrīmukhābhimukhan āgi nindu stutisi,

end’ anēkastōtrapavitrīkr̥tamukhāravindanamarasamājavismayasmērēkṣaṇaika
lakṣyan āgi nijōcitapradēśasthānadoḷ kuḷḷirdu,
antu besagoḷe,

antu negaḻda divyadhvaniyoḷā paramayōgīndranint’ endu besasidaṁ.
ninna besagoṇḍa tattvamuṁ hēyōpādēyarūpadiṁ dvividhamakkuṁ; alli
saṁsārakāraṇaṅgaḷ hēyaṅgaḷ; muktikāraṇaṅgaḷupādēyaṅgaḷ. avaṟoḷ
dravyakṣētrakālabhavabhāvabhēdadiṁ pañcavidhaṁ saṁsāraṁ. alli mithyādarśanāvirati
pramādakaṣāyayōgōpārjitajñānāvaraṇādikar‍maṅgaḷ saṁsārakāraṇaṅgaḷ.
anādibandhanabandhadravyabhāvakarmavigamadinanantajñānādinijarūpamaṁ paḍevudu
mukti. samyagdarśanacāritraṅgaḷavikalpaṅgaḷ mōkṣakāraṇaṅgaḷ. alli tattvārthaśraddhānaṁ
samyagdarśanaṁ; ā tattvamuṁ jīvājīvāsravabandhasaṁvaranirjarāmōkṣabhēdadiṁ
saptavidhaṁ. pramāṇanayanikṣēpānuyōgasadādigaḷiṁ niścayisida saptatattvaṅgaḷoḷage
cētanālakṣaṇam appudu jīvatattvaṁ. ā jīvatattvamuṁ saṁsārimuktabhēdadiṁ
dvividhamakkuṁ. alli muktajīvamēkaprakārame. saṁsārijīvaṁ trasasthāvaravikalpadindi
rteṟanakkuṁ. alliyuṁ trasanāmakarmōdayavaśaṅgaḷ trasakāyaṅgaḷ.
sthāvaranāmakarmapākādhīnaṅgaḷ sthāvaraṅgaḷ. sparśanarasanēndriyōpētaṅgaḷappa
śaṅkhādidvīndriyaṅgaḷ; sparśanarasanaghrāṇēndriyasamanvitaṅgaḷ appa pipīlikādi
trīndriyaṅgaḷ; sparśanarasanaghrāṇacakṣurindriyasamanvitaṅgaḷ appa madhukarādi
caturindriyaṅgaḷ; sparśanarasanaghrāṇacakṣuśśrōtrēndriyasamanvitaṅgaḷ appa manuṣyādi
pañcēndriyaṅgaḷ end’ intu trasajīvaṅgaḷ caturvidhamakkuṁ. sparśanēndriyamātraṅgaḷ
sthāvaraṅgaḷembuvu. avu pr̥thivyaptējōvāyuvanaspatibhēdadiṁ pañcavidhaṁ. cētanā
rahitamajīvatattvaṁ. adu gatisthityavagāhaśarīrādivartanāhētudhar‍mādhar‍mākāśapudgala
kālabhēdadiṁ pañcavidhaṁ. śubhāśubharūpamanōvākkāyaparispandahētukam āgi
barpa karmada baravāsravamembudu. karmada jīvana kṣīranīranyāyasambandhaṁ
bandhamembudu. śubhāśubhapariṇāmapraṇāḷikeyiṁ barpa karmamaṁ baralīyade
guptyādigaḷiṁ taguḷvudu saṁvareyembudu. yathākālānubhavana tapōnimittamāgi,
savipākāvipākarūpadiṁ pūrvārjitakarmanirjaraṇaṁ nirjareyembudu.
mūlōttarādibhēdabhinnakarmaprakr̥tigaḷa nirmūḷōcchitti mōkṣamembudu.
saṁśayaviparyayasāvadyānavadyāvasāyasvabhāvarahitam āgi jīvādipadārtha
yāthātmyāvagamaṁ samyak jñānaṁ. adu matiśrutāvadhimanaḥparyayakēvala
jñānabhēdadiṁ pañcavidhaṁ. saṁsāraparityāgōdyuktasamyak jñānōpētabhavyajīvana
bāhyābhyantara kriyānivr̥tti samyakcāritramembudu. adu sāmāyikacchēdōpasthāpanā
parihāraśuddhi sūkṣmasāmparāya yathākhyātacāritrabhēdadiṁ pañcavidhamendu
hēyōpādēya tattvamanaṟipi mattamivarkādhārabhūtajagattrayānta
sthitaikōnapañcāśannarakaprastarabhavanavyantarāvāsāsaṅkhyātadvīpābdhitriṣaṣṭisvarga
paṭalaṅgaḷumaṁ vistarisi tannivāsigaḷa dēhāyuḥpramāṇaṅgaḷumaṁ sukhaduḥkhādi
gaḷumaṁ tīrthakara cakradhara baladēva vāsudēva prativāsudēva kathāsambandhamumaṁ
nirṇayammāḍidāgaḷ,

tadanantaraṁ kuruvaṁśacūḍāmaṇiyenisida sōmaprabhanumātananuja
nādidānatīrthakarapravartakaṁ śrēyāṁsanuṁ bharatēśvarānujananantavīryanuṁ
bhaṭṭārakapādamūladoḷ dīkṣeyaṁ kaikoṇḍu gaṇadhararādar; brahmiyuṁ
saundariyuṁ [ātta]nirvēgeyar vivāhavimukheyar āgi guruprasādadiṁ dīkṣeyaṁ
kaikoṇḍu gaṇinīgaṇapradhāneyarādar; mattaṁ gr̥hitōpavāsakavrataṁ śruta
kīrtiyembaṁ śrāvakāgraṇiyādaṁ; priyavrateyemboḷaṇuvratagrahaṇadiṁ
śrāvikāpurassareyādaḷ; bharatarājaputraṁ marīciyorbanuḻiye munnaṁ
bhagna[tapa]rāda kacchamahākacchādigaḷarhadrūpamaṁ kaikoṇḍar; anantavīryanī
kṣētradoḷanēkakālaṁ parāmr̥ṣṭamāda muktimārgamaṁ munname samaṟuvenembante
mōkṣalakṣmīvallabhanādaṁ; bharatēśvaranuṁ bāhubalikumāranuṁ jinēśvarapāda
padmaṅgaḷgeṟagi nijarājadhānigaḷge pōdar. itta saudharmēndranuṁ dharmacakravartitvakke
digvijayamenisida bhagavadvihāramanavadhiyindamaṟidu, adane punaruktaṁ māḻpante,

endu dēvēndranādijinēndraṅge binnapaṅgeyyaloḍamanēka bhavyakōṭiya
puṇyaprēraṇeyindaṁ samavasaraṇamaṇḍaḷaṁ gaganamaṇḍaḷadoḷ naḍeye marutkumāra
sammārjitayōjanāntaritaramyabhūmibhāganuṁ, mēghakumārasasaṁsiktapraśamitarajaḥ
prasaradharaṇītaḷanuṁ, paripakvagandhaśālivanavirājamānavasudhāsūcitāgamananuṁ,
prasannadikkanyānanasamuddiṣṭātmasannidhānanuṁ, dhautāsinibhanabhōmaṇḍaḷanuṁ,
janitajagajjanānandanuṁ, samastajanamaitrīsamētanuṁ, sakaḷartukakusumapallava
phaḷaviḷasitataru nirantaritaratnamayadarpaṇapratimāvanītaḷaviḷāsanuṁ, anukūlaśiśira
surabhimandānilanuṁ, anyōnyāhvānaniratadivijaninadapūritasakaḷagaganataḷanuṁ,
ādarśādyaṣṭamaṅgaḷadhvajamāḷāvitānavicitrāmbaranuṁ, sahasradinakarakaraspardhi
sahasrāradharmacakrapurassaranumāgi,

lg.l: śaka kāśmīrāndhra karnāṭaka magadha yavāvanti pāñcāḷa saurā
ṣṭra kaḷiṅgābhīra sauvīraka kuru karahāṭāṅga gāndhāra vaṅgā

div.p:
antu dharmakṣētraṅgaḷaṁ vihārisi vinēyajanāśayakuśēśayaṅgaḷa
nalarcutuṁ bandu,
div.trailer:
idu dēvēndra munīndravandyaparamajinēndramukhacandra
vākcandrikāprasaraprasādōdīrṇasūktikallōlamālākīrṇa
kavitāguṇārṇavapraṇītamappādipurāṇadoḷ
kēvalajñānōtpattiprakaraṇaṁ
daśamāśvāsaṁ

div.head: ēkādaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p: āgaḷ,

ā sudarśanam emba cakraratnamaṁ pūjisimbaḻiyaṁ dvādaśayōjanā
yāmadoḷaṁ navayōjanavistāradoḷaṁ bīḍaṁ biḍuva cakravartiya kaṭakamaṁ
tanna neḻaloḷe kāva sūryaprabham emba vicitramaṇimayūkhacitritacchatraratnamu
mutkhātamātravitrastasamastārimaṇḍalamuṁ, vīralakṣmīkarṇapūranīḷēndīvara
śyāmaḷamum appa saunandakam emba khaḍgaratnamuṁ, vijayārdhācaḷamahāguhā
gahvaramukhavajrakavāṭapuṭavighaṭapaṭuv appa caṇḍavēgam emba daṇḍaratnamuṁ,
agādhajaladurgasamuttaraṇa niratasakaḷaśibirasandhāraṇaśaktiyuktam appa vajramayamemba
car‍maratnamuṁ, cakravartiya maṇimakuṭaśikharāyamānam appa cūḍāmaṇiyemba
maṇiratnamuṁ, mahāguhāgahvarāntara sūcinirbhēdyatamastamōnirasana
prabhāprabhūtaguṇōpētam appa cintājananiy emba kākiṇīratnamuṁ, nāmagrahaṇa
mātradindame samastavastuvistārāntarnihitavastusamarpaṇaparāyaṇamappa
kāmavr̥ṣṭiy emba gr̥hapatiratnamuṁ, mlēccharājasēnāpaticchadamadāvalēpapari
lōpaviḷāsiyuṁ ṣaḍvidhasēnānāyakaparāyaṇanumappayōdhyanemba
sēnāniratnamuṁ, mahānadāvagāhanasamayanaudrōṇisaṅkramādividhāna prāgalbhyanuṁ
anusmaraṇamātraniṣpāditasaptataḷādi prāsādaprakara[ṇa]num appa bhadramukhanemba
takṣakaratnamuṁ, śāntikapauṣṭikakriyākuśalanuṁ dharmakār‍yādi kuśalanumappa
buddhisāgaran emba purōhitaratnamuṁ, kāmarūpiyuṁ kāmacāriyumappa
vijayaparvatam emba yāgahastiratnamuṁ, pavanavēganivartananipuṇamuṁ dvādaśa
yōjanōllaṅghanara[ṁ]hōnivāsabhūmiyum appa pavanañjayamemba
turagaratnamaṁ, manōharamum appa strīratnamumend’ intu jīvājīvaratnaṁ bēṟevēṟe
sahasrayakṣarakṣitaṅgaḷappuvaṁ,

antu bharatēśvaracakravarti cakrapūjāgratanūjajātakarmōtsavanirvarta
nātiprīṇitāntaḥkaraṇanāgirpannegamātana tīvrapratāpame tannoḷ saṅkramisidante
dinakarakiraṇaṅgaḷoḷ paḷaccan appa poḷepuṁ, ātana beḷgoḍeya pajjaḷisuva pajjaḷikeye
tannoḷapokkante candramaṇḍalakuccamāge paḷaccan appa beḷdiṅgaḷuṁ, ātana digvijaya
dosageyoḷ digaṅganeyarettida beḷḷiya kaḷaśaṅgaḷante taḷadaḷisi poḷeva biḷiya
mugilgaḷuṁ, ātana baravinutsavakke santasambaṭṭu mahīlalaneya nagemogadante
tiḷida koḷaṅgaḷuṁ, ātanantaḥpurakānteyara nagemogada nagegaṇgaḷa beḍaṅgane
kiṟunagenaguvante mellamellanuḷḷalarva mahōtpaḷanīḷōtpaḷaṅgaḷuṁ, ātaṅge
tuṟuṅgaluṁ bambalumāge bīsuva cāmarada poḷepugaḷe desedesegesevante pasarisi
negeva rājahaṁsegaḷuṁ, ātana paḍege naḍeyaleḍemāḍidante baḷvaḷāda desegaḷuṁ,
ātana vijayārtha sainyakke taḍeyade pāyalke vēḻkumembante nelemāḍida
mahānadīnadaṅgaḷuṁ, ātana vijayakaṭakamadasindhurabandhuramadagandhamane tanage
paḍevante desedesege poṇmuva saptacchadavanaṅgaḷuṁ tanna baravaṁ prakaṭammāḍe

antu tanna digvijayōdyōgakkupayōgiy āgi banda śāradaśrīya
n idirgoṇḍanēkagaṇakagaṇagaṇitaśubhadinanakṣatramuhūrtadoḷ digvijayaprayāṇa
bhēriyaṁ poysidāgaḷ,

ā vijayaprasthānabhērīninādānantarame śāradanīradanikāśaviśāla
dhavaḷadukūlāmbaravirājamānanuṁ, candrātapapāṇḍuraharicandanānuliptagātranuṁ,
abhinavaviḷasitamāḷatīmāḷāpariṣkr̥tamakuṭanuṁ, apūrvadūrvāpravāḷālaṅkr̥ta
karṇapūranuṁ, gōrōcanāracitavicitratiḷakaviḷasitalalāṭanuṁ, tārātaraḷamuktā
phaḷakalitajānulambitabrahmasūtranuṁ, indracāpaviḷāsōpahāsi rundrēndracchanda
hārābhirāmaviśāḷavakṣassthaḷanuṁ, purōhitōccār‍yamāṇapuṇyāśīrvacana
nirghōṣadattakarṇanumāgirdāgaḷ,

āgaḷ nijasthapatiratnaprayatnanirmitamuṁ, kumudadaḷadhavaḷamanōjava
kāmacāristhū[rī]pr̥ṣṭhayōjitamuṁ, anukūlaśūrarathakalpapariṇatarathacōdaka
paribhrājitamuṁ āgi,

āgaḷ mauhūrtikar bandu dēvā vijayaprasthānalagnaṁ sārevandudendu
binnapaṅgaidāgaḷ,

lg.l: nādaṁ gambhīranādaṁ negaḻdire taḷardaṁ rāgadiṁ sārvabhaumaṁ

div.p:
antu taḷardu kr̥taprasthānavividhamaṅgaḷavidhānōcchritacitrātapatradhō
dhūyamānadhavaḷacāmarasahasrasañchādita sahasrakaraprabhāprasararathamanēṟi
mahāmakuṭabaddhaparivr̥taṁ rājabhavanamaṁ poṟamaṭṭu cañcatpañcaratnatōraṇālaṅkr̥ta
rājamārgadiṁ barpāgaḷ,
antu barpāgaḷaṅgajavijayakadaḷikāviḷāsamaṁ tāḷdi,

lg.l: nosalaṁ toṅgalguruḷ mēludanogeva kucaṁ bennanā nīḷakēśa
prasaraṁ celviṁ podaḷdoḷniṟiyaneḍada tōḷ sōgeyaṁ nūla toṅga

div.p:
mattorvaḷ uttuṅgasaudhōtsaṅgadoḷ nindu manuvaṁśadhvajanaṁ
makaradhvajanendu bagedu,

lg.l: idu ninnarcisuvikṣucāpamidu ninnī lōkamaṁ kaige mā
ttida caitradhvajam endu tōrpa teṟadiṁ bhrūlāsyamaṁ nīḷdapāṁ

div.p: mattam orvaḷ uttuṅgaprāsādōparimataḷadoḷ nindu,
mattam ond’ eḍeyoḷorvaḷ,
matt’ orvaḷ,

mattam orvaḷ abhinavayauvanāsavamadaviḷāsaniraṅkuśe kuṅkuma
paṅkāṅkitōccakucayugaḷame sindūritamastakapiṇḍamaṇḍalamaviraḷacaḷatkāñcīkaḷāpa
maṇikiṅkiṇīgaṇajhaṅkārame mada[na]ḍiṇḍimaravāḍambaramāḷōḷatuḷā
kōṭikaḷakvaṇitame nigaḷāndukāravamāge,
matt’ orbaḷ nijaprasādhanagrahaṇaprastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: puramaṁ kaigaḷoḷāgaḷāgaḷe toḍarcuttuṁ janaṁ kūḍe ka

div.p: intu bharatēśvaracakravartiya rūpātiśayamaṁ nōḍuvalli,

antu manasijanāvēśamantradiṁ stōbhaṅgoṇḍante purapurandhrīkṣōbha
māge manuvaṁśagaganacandrōdayakṣubhitanagarakṣīrāmbhōrāśiya kallōlamāle
gaḷante desedesege poḷeva purāṅganājanadapāṅgamāḷegaḷuṁ taḍiya śīkaranikaraṅgaḷante
sogayisuva dhavaḷākṣatasitakusumamaṅgaḷalājāñjaligaḷumanurāgamaṁ paḍeye,
purapradhānajanasahitāśēṣāśīrvādaparampareyanānuttuṁ pañcaratnatōraṇadyuti
samuddyōtitakanakaprākārapratōḷidvāramaneydevandāgaḷ,

lg.l: rarasaṁ kaigaṇmi poṇmuttire nijabalamaṁ nōḍidaṁ sārvabhaumaṁ

div.p:
antu kirīṭakōṭiratnaraśmirañjitadikcakram āgi bandeṟagida rāja
cakramananukramadoḷe nētratribhāgakaṭākṣasamagrēkṣaṇabhrūvibhramadarahasitāḷāpanapari
hāsavisrambhāḷāpaṅgaḷiṁ santasambaḍisuttuṁ bandandina dinamayōdhyā
purāsannadoḷ nijasthapatiratnaviracitamāgi,

antu pokku maṅgaḷaśēṣākṣataṅgaḷanāntukoṇḍu harinīlakuṭṭi
manihitarajatahēmabhājanālaṅkr̥tam āgi vikasitāmbhōjahēmakamaḷamanō
harataraśrīyaṁ tāḷdirda bhōjanabhūmige rājahaṁsaviḷāsadiṁ bijayaṅgeydu
sakalavidyāpravīṇagurujanār‍yajanaviḷāsinījanaparivr̥tanatimr̥durasanāsammardana
mātradrāvaṇīya ghr̥tapūramumaṁ, alpadaśanadaṁśamātrakhaṇḍanīya maṇḍakamu
manatyantakōmaḷatāḷutaḷasaṅghaṭṭamātrakṣōdanīya mōdakamumaṁ aniṣṭhu
rōṣṭhapuṭamadhyasandhāraṇamātracūrṇanīya śākavartikamumaṁ, ati
dūrōcchvāsavikāsanāsāñjalipuṭapīyamāna dugdhahaiyaṅgavīnamumaṁ,
nīhāraśakalapariṇatakapitthaphaḷaparimaḷamadhuradadhiyumaṁ, ēkībhūtasakaḷabhuvana
śiśiradravyasambāradra[vya]śaṅkākara śikhariṇīramaṇīyamumaṁ, amr̥tapiṇḍāya
mānapiṇḍadugdhasnigdhamum appa manōharāhāramumaṁ

ant’ ārogisidiṁ baḻiyaṁ ācamitacandrakāntadravasurabhisalilanuṁ
ghanasāracandanasārapramr̥ṣṭakarataḷanumaṅgīkr̥takastūrikāvilēpananuṁ, viracita
surabhikusumaśēkharanuṁ, mr̥gamadakhadiraguḷikābahaḷakarpūrapāḷīsammiśra
tāmbūladviguṇitavadanāravindāmōdanumāgi, ṣaṭkhaṇḍamaṇḍaḷavijayaviḷāsa
vihāraśīlaṁ katipayapadaṅgaḷaṁ vihārisi, dukūlapracchadācchāditasukhāsanāsīnaṁ
maṇimayasiṁhāsanamanavaṣṭambhisi,

antu andina divasamaṁ kaḷedu maṟudivasaṁ dvādaśayōjana
saṁsarpadgambhīradhīrārāvaṅgaḷappānandigaḷ emba panneraḍubhērigaḷuṁ, ahita
mahīpāḷahr̥dayakavāṭapuṭavighaṭanapaṭugaḷ appa vijayaghōṣaṅgaḷ emba panneraḍu
paṭahaṅgaḷuṁ, agaṇyapuṇyābdhisambhavaṅgaḷ appa gambhīrāvartaṅgaḷembirpattanālku
śaṅkhaṅgaḷuṁ, matsyamakarakuliśakalaśakuḷīravarāhavānarakaṇṭhīravacamūru
mayūragaruḍaphaṇirājacihnaṅgaḷ appa nālvatteṇṭukōṭi patākegaḷeseye
pūrvābhimukhan āgi cakraratnapurassaraṁ bijayaṅgeydāgaḷ,

lg.l: nnane naḍe nōḍisuttumire jāyilamonderaḍendu tōṟe ne

div.p:
antu mahībhāgamellaṁ caturaṅgamayamuṁ, digvibhāgamellaṁ rajō
mayamuṁ, nabhōbhāgamellaṁ divijavidyādharamayamuṁ, antarikṣamella
m ātapatramaṇḍaḷamayamuṁ, samīraṇasañcaraṇamellaṁ madagandhamayamuṁ,
sr̥ṣṭiyellamavanipāḷamayamuṁ, bhuvanavivaramellaṁ jayajayaninādamayamuṁ
āgi naḍeva nijavijayasainyadoḷanēkamakuṭabaddhaśēkharasahasraparisrastakusumakēsara
rajamuṁ, anavaratavitaraṇaniratarājakumāramuṣṭivikīr‍yamāṇasantarpaṇacūrṇa
saṅkīrṇakarpūrarajamuṁ, samadavijayagajaviśālakumbhabhittiparikṣiptasāndrasindūra
rajamuṁ neṟambaḍedu,
āgaḷ,

lg.l: layadiṁ melpiṁ beḍaṅgaṁ paḍeva turagadiṁ citritacchatrikālī
bare musukiṭṭa paṭṭaṇigeyuṁ poṟapoṇmuva kaṇṇa beḷpumō

div.p: ā prastāvadoḷ,

antu maḷayajarasaśiśiraśīkarāsāracāriy āgi banda mandāniḷana
baḻiyane bandu,

lg.l: ralevantirdudu banda karb ene vanaśrī baṇṇisalbarkumē

div.p:
āgaḷ śaradada bisilaḷure poṇmida gharmabindugaḷiṁ nāndu
puccaḻidarevorekanāda kuṅkumapatrabhaṅgada koragida nagemogaṅgaḷuṁ payaṇa
doḷaḷḷeviḷḷey āgi bambalabāḍida tanulategaḷuṁ eṟeviṟanāda taleduḍugegaḷuṁ
bāḍida pūmāleyoḍane baḻalda sōrmuḍiyuṁ aḍigaḍige taḍataḍav appa naḍegaḷuṁ
berasu,

āgaḷ bharatēśvaraṁ samastāntaḥpuradoḍaniḍidaḍare sale pūta cūtalateya
noḷagumāḍi baḷasida mādhavīlateya baḷḷavaḷḷiya baḷḷigāvaṇada munde baḷvaḷa
baḷedeḷadaḷisuva posagendaḷira gondaḷadoḷe sandaṇisidaśōkalateyōlaga
śāleyoḷagaṇa kappuravaḷukina jaguliya mēgaṇa kusumadesaḷa misuguva posadaḷimbada
mēge kiṟidu bēgaṁ viśramisi mēḷadākegaḷ verasu bandu kāvaṇamaṁ pugaloḍaṁ,

antu bharatarājaṁ sakaḷartukarājan appa manōjarājaṅge māḍidudenisuva
virājamānaraktāśōkapallavōllasitakāyamānadoḷ kinnarīkarakisalaya
caḷanasamutpanna kākaḷīkaḷaravamiḷitamadhukaratantrīsamañcitavipañcīmandratāramadhura
mūrcchanāsanāthaprayōgaṅgaḷumaṁ antaḥpuraparivāravārāṅganāsaṅgīta
gītaṅgaḷumaṁ navaprasavaparāgāsavāsaktabhr̥ṅgāṅganāgītaṅgaḷumaṁ ālisi
kēḷuttirpannegaṁ, ātanantaḥpurastrīyarimmāvina soneya sōneyoḷ taḷideḷadaḷira
jompaṅgaḷoḷaṁ kuḷirva puḷinaṅgaḷoḷaṁ kōḍuva dhārāgr̥haṅgaḷoḷaṁ viśramisi
śāradātapapariśramamaṁ kaḷeye,

antu divyaprabhāvadiṁ sakaḷartukasaundar‍yamumaṁ bēṟevēṟe tōṟuva
vanalakṣmiyaṁ rājyalakṣmīvallabhaṁ nōḍuvāgaḷ,
āgaḷ ā vanadēvatāprēraṇeyoḷage cakravartige saṅgītamaṁ tōṟuvante,

annegaṁ alli navamāḷikākusumasukumāriyar navamāḷikālategaḷumaṁ,
rambhāstambhōpamānōruyugaḷeyar śātakumbharambhāvanaṅgaḷumaṁ,
abhinavamr̥gamadatiḷakaviḷasitalalāṭeyar utpaḷatiḷakatarugaḷumaṁ, campakamukuḷa
nikāśanāsāvaṁśeyar kanakakiṅkiṇīkamanīyakusumacampakaviṭapigaḷumaṁ,
raktāśōkapallavādhareyar atiraktapallavāśōkānōkahaṅgaḷumaṁ, vinirjitāḷi
mālāviḷāsasāḷakānaneyar sāḷakānanaṅgaḷumaṁ, kāmakārmukōpamānabhrū
latikeyar punnāgalatikegaḷumaṁ nōḍuttuṁ, kusumāpacayakrīḍāviḷāsadiṁ
toḻalvalli,

lg.l: ḍa]ḷisuttirpa śukāḷi tamma besadiṁ tantamma ṭhāṇāntaraṁ

div.p:
endu adaṁ mecci mattondu pallavitakōrakitakusumitaphalita
pariṇataphalalalitasahakārabhūruhamanatinibiḍāliṅganaṅgeydu,

lg.l: taḷiroḷ nīne beḍaṅganai nanegaḷoḷ nīṁ nīṟanai puṣpasaṁ
kuḷadoḷ nīne viḷāsiyai miḍigaḷoḷ nīṁ celvanai paṇta paṁ

div.p: end’ adaṁ pogaḻdu,
end’ adaṁ meccuttuṁ,

lg.l: virahigaḷaṁ teraḷci tuḻivallige nīṁ neramayyoḷakke nīṁ
bare bhuvanaṅgaḷoḷ negaḻdudī madhumāsamumī banakke nī
narasane enna rājyavibhavakkele nīne dalendu banda mā

div.p:
mattam orvaḷ mallikāvallarīsamullasitamukuḷaṅgaḷan alampinoḷ āydu
koydu mallikāmālabhāriṇi,

lg.l: magamagisalke mandayisi diktaṭamaṁ baḷasalke pīrva tuṁ
bige taṇipalke namma jasamaṁ beḷagalkive sālgum endu ta
tsavamidu dēva mallige pasurnanedōṟidudendu nāḍe bi
