soḍara beḷaginoḷ koraguva jādiyaṁ tumbiyoḷpagegoṇḍa sampageyaṁ
muḍigeyikkiyuṁ kaiyanetti pogaḻduṁ taṇiyane madananuṁ malligeyaṁ
pareye pasurpu beḷpaḍare balmuguḷoḷ poredōṟe tembela
rporevoreyaṁ saḍilce naḍu poṅgire malligegaḷ vasantadoḷ
biridoḍe nallaraṁ neneda nallara mellerdegaḷ nirantaraṁ

div.p: ene mattorvaḷ māḷatīnavamāḷikākusumasukumāre,
ene mattorvaḷ [mādhavīlatālalite]

lg.l: tadūtiy ene tāne negaḻda mādhaviy ene saṁ

div.p: ene mattorvaḷ māḷatīśyāmaḷakōmāḷāṅgi,
ene mattorvaḷ kundakuṭmalaradane,
ene mattorvaḷ surabhipāṭaḷīpāṭaḷadaśanavasane,
ene mattorvaḷ abhinavasurabhikusumasaurabhe,

lg.l: lisi posat appa māṇikada nuṇbaralaṁ madhu manmathaṅge ba
ṇṇisi samedante tōṟuvudu pūgaḷoḷēṁ surahonne cennanō

div.p: ene mattorvaḷ karṇikārakusumasukumāravarṇe,
ene mattorvaḷ campakakusumagandhi,
ene mattorvaḷ kētakīdaḷadhavaḷalōcane,

lg.l: duvuvesaḷorme pīraloḍamāgale sōrvuvu kampu sōṅke kaṁ
davu daḷameyde pīre tavaduṇmuva saurabham endu pīrdupī

div.p: ene mattorvaḷ sindhuvārasurabhiniśvāse,
ene mattorvaḷ nīlōtpaḷadaḷanayane,
ene mattorvaḷ vakuḷamukuḷāsavavadanaparimaḷe,
ene mattorvaḷ śatapatrakubjakusumamāḷākōmaḷe,
antum allade,
ene mattorvaḷ kastūrikākadambacumbitakabarībhāre,

endu bhinnarucigaḷ āgi tantamma meccidicceya pūgaḷane pogaḻe
mattorvaḷ kuṅkumapaṅkāṅkitakadambacumbitamr̥gāṅkavaktre,

endu bagege vanda pūgaḷoḷ pūduḍugeyaṁ māḍi vasantakānteyarante
neṟeye kaygeydāgaḷ,
āgal antaḥpurakāntāprasādhanakusumāmōdamatipramōdamaṁ paḍeye,

āgaḷ ākegaḷalaktāraktamaṇinūpurakvaṇitasubhagavāmapādapraharaṇa
doḷaśōkatarugaḷaṁ kusumisiyuṁ, vadanasarasijāsavasēkadoḷe vakuḷakujaṅgaḷa
nalarciyuṁ, unnatakucataṭāghātadoḷe kuravakaṅgaḷaṁ puṣpitaṅgaḷaṁ māḍiyuṁ,
kṣīragaṇḍūṣasēcanadoḷe campakaviṭapigaḷanalarciyuṁ, āyatadhavaḷāpāṅga
saṅgadoḷe tiḷakabhūruhaṅgaḷanabhinavalatāntaṅga[ḷo]ḷ [kū]ḍiyuṁ intu nānāvidha
krīḍeyindupavanakrīḍeyaṁ nirvartisi,
end’ aśōkavakuḷapādapaṅgaḷaṁ bīḻkoṇḍu,

lg.l: nanegaḷa goñcalaṁ taḷira toṅgalanāḍuva [ba]ḷvaḷ appa koṁ
bina miḍiyaṁ teraḷci tegedōvade kāyade kūraka[mma]diṁ

div.p: endu mākandamahīruhamanappukeydu,
endu vanalategaḷananunayisi,

lg.l: gade nimmaṁ balagoṇḍu pōpa guṇamaṁ koḷḷiṁ manaḥprītiyiṁ

div.p: endu vanatarugaḷanoḍambaḍisi,
endu kōkiḷakuḷamaṁ visarjisi,
endu madhukaranikaramaṁ biḍisi,

end’ atilalitagamanasamuccaḷitaraśanākaḷāpanūpurakiṅkiṇīkvaṇitānu
sāriy āgi barpa rājahaṁsamaṇḍalamaṁ maguḻci barpāgaḷ,

lg.l: gaḷinaṅgōpāṅgadoḷ saṅgaḷisuva palavuṁ bhaṅgiyiṁ kūḍe nīlō

div.p:
antu vanavihārānantaraṁ bharatēśvaracakravarti vanakusumapallavōpa
śōbhitalīlāprasādhanaṁ madāndhasindhuralīleyindamantaḥpurakariṇīgaṇaṁ berasu
gaṅgājalakrīḍāsaktacittan āgi tatparisarapradēśamaneydevandu cañcatpañcaratnaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
kedaṟida kāḷāgarukāśmīrakastūrikarpūrayakṣakardamakṣōdadoḷaṁ nadītaraṅgaṅgaḷaṁ
vicitravarṇaṅgaḷaṁ māḍi,

antu cakradharana [jala]krīḍāprārambhamaṁ kaṇḍu nīrāṭakke takka
pasadanaṅgoṇḍu taṇḍataṇḍadiṁ puguvāgaḷ,

lg.l: gaḷa meyyoḷ tāne taḷpoydesedudu pesargoḷveggarārembinaṁ ni

div.p: āgaḷ amr̥takiraṇanamr̥tajalaṅgaḷiṁ kumudinigaḷaṁ taḷivante,

lg.l: poḷeyuttirpannegaṁ kuṅkumada kadaḍinoḷ keṅkam āgirda nīraṁ
ṇṇiṁ tuḷkuva kempu sarada naḍukaṁ mige ta

div.p: antu jalakrīḍāvinōdaṅgaḷaṁ nirvartisidāgaḷ,

lg.l: ṇṇada celvaṁ geḍegoṇḍu citritapatākālīleyaṁ tāḷdi niṁ

div.head: dvādaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
antu bharatēśvaracakravarti nijasthapatiratnaviracitamaṇimayarājamandiramaṁ
puguvuduṁ, ā prastāvadoḷantaḥpurada pūsida kāśmīrarāgamuṁ uṭṭa
kausumbhāmbararuciyuṁ toṭṭa padmarāgābharaṇakiraṇaṅgaḷuṁ saṅkramisidante,

āgaḷ vr̥ṣabhēśvaranandanaṁ sandhyāsamayōcitajinēndravandanā
kutūhalitāntaḥkaraṇanāgi,

tadanantaradoḷ tadāsthānamaṇṭapadoḷ beḷaguva kaidīvigegaḷa
beḷagugaḷoḷaṁ baḷvaḷabaḷedu nimirva kāḍigeguḍigaḷa mahēndranīlamarakata
maṇibhavanaṅgaḷa vijayakaṭakasamadagaja[sa]majaṅgaḷa karpugaḷellamaṁ nerambaḍedu,

lg.l: guḷisuva bāya kempanudayaṅgeye poṇmuva kempu pōlvinaṁ

div.p:
antu purandaradigvadhūvadanamaṅgaḷamaṇidarpaṇamumanindragajēndra
dhavaḷakarṇacāmaramumananukarisi,

antu purandarakarōddhr̥tagaganataḷaspardhisphaṭikakaḷaśamukhavigaḷita
sudhādhārāprasaramananukarisi,

antu kāmarāgarasasāgaramaṁ nelevercisuva śaraccandrātapadoḷ
pagalina śaradātapapariśramamanāṟisi nijavijayakaṭakada nāgarikaramaṇaramaṇī
janaṅgaḷ kaumudīmahōtsavōtsukar āgi neredalli,

āgaḷā strīsamūhaṁ nerediralalli viḷāsinīvāṭadoḷond’ eḍeyoḷ ondu
kamanīyakāyamānābhyantaracañcatkāñcanamañcōpaśōbhitamr̥dutaḷpadoḷera
ḍaṟiyade kūrta nalla[ḷ],

matt’ ond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaṁ tanna prāṇēśvariya mogamaṁ nōḍi taleyaṁ
tūgidoḍe āke śaṅkākuḷitey āgi tanna keḷadig’ int’ endaḷ

lg.l: ḷaṅgane ninna bīgi bigidirda kucadvayamadhyadalli tāṁ

div.p: matt’ ondu vicitrakāṇḍapaṭaparivr̥tapaṭakuṭīpradēśadoḷ
ene mattorvanintendaṁ,
mattam ond’ eḍeyoḷ palabar vidagdhaviṭar neredirdalliyorvaṁ,

lg.l: basaniye gellakāṟana negaḻtege kēḷige nāḍe geṇṭadaṁ
besagoḷavēḍa neṭṭane cadur tanaguḷḷoḍe melpu mēḷamaṁ
posayi[se] tanna munnuḻivu bēṭada lalleya balme patti su
nelanaṁ parvuva baḷḷigaṁ caduranoḷ maimaiyoḍambaṭṭu ta
ydalaḷumbaṁ nelanākegaṁ baḷasiyuṁ lallaisiyuṁ nōḍi kā
ṇalaḷumbaṁ manamembidaṁ caduraroḷ muṁ kēḷadiṁ kēḷpenē

div.p: endu mattorvanintendaṁ,

lg.l: baḷeda viyōgadoḷ poreda cinteyoḷeyde maḍalta taḷta me
odavida cinte perce pasivillade marberdeyurbe nidreyi

div.p:
endu bēṭamane vastumāḍiye vastukavitva varṇakavitva kāmatattva
vidanenisidatividagdhanorvanintandaṁ:

lg.l: aleduṁ nōḍiyoṟalduviṭṭa padamuṁ nōḷduṁ kaḻalduṁ paḷaṁ
caleduṁ muṭṭida sīyan appa daniyuṁ mēlvāydumēvaisiyuṁ

div.p: endu māṇade,

lg.l: biḍe naḍeyendu pēḻdinisanāṁ maguḻdāgaḷe sūsi kaṇṇa nī

div.p: end’ erdeyāṟade,

lg.l: odavi taguḷda gaggarike sūsuva kaṇbani kaṇgaḷoḷ kalaṁ
kida beḷargempu kaṇge vare sārcidagalkeyoḷintu bēṭadu
bbadigamanānta nallaḷa mukhāmbujamaṁ naḍe nōḍinōḍi sā

div.p: endum avadharisade,

lg.l: toḍare rasāntadoḷ bagedu bhōṅk ene pōdapanōpanīsaluṁ

div.p: endu sairisade,

mattam ond’ eḍeyoḷande posayisida posavēṭakāṟar appa kaḍunallaru
mirvarumire,

lg.l: kuḍuguruḷ emba [teṁ]belara bembiḍidiṁ posavēṭam emba ce
biḍidalariṁ musuṅki susil emba basantadoḷēṁ podaḷduvō

div.p:
mattam ond’ eḍeyoḷ paḻikeydu bandu nallaḷa muḷisanoḷakoṇḍu
mukhamaṁ muguḷnageverasu nuḍidu geṇṭ’ ādaṁ. mattamond’ eḍeyoḷ paḻavaḻeya
bēṭada tōṭiyaṁ toḍardaṭṭu[ve]tta po[la]vulleyaḷḷeviḷḷeyāda mātaṁ tanna
sūḷeya bēsaṟiṁ keḷeyaṅg’ int’ endaṁ,
endu nuḍidaṁ. mattorvan int’ endaṁ,

lg.l: ṇgaḷa pasavōḍe nōḍalaṇamīyade nīḷda kuruḷ madīya kō
teḷasitaḻal mugil maṟasi bhōṅk ene kaṇḍamr̥tāṁśubimbamaṁ

div.p: antu kaṇḍumiralāṟadintendaṁ,

lg.l: banamaṁ kōgile jakkavakki pagalaṁ pogoñcalaṁ tumbi caṁ
drananambhōnidhi banda dūve maleyaṁ kārgālamaṁ sōge muṁ

div.p:
endu mattond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaṁ virahaparitāpadoḷ sairisalāṟade
madananaṁ baydu beccane suydu tanna keḷeyaṅgintendaṁ,

lg.l: lagavuruḍilla meccavaṇigilla karaṁ muḷisilla kāydu ke

div.p: mattamond’ eḍeyoḷeraḍaṟiyade kūrta nallaḷge,

lg.l: llaḷa moleyottinoḷ taḷardudākeya dūṟisi suyda suyyoḷu
rgaḷa ponalinde karci kaḷedantire pōdudu kōpamōpanā

div.p: mattond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaḷ ātmīyaprāṇanāthanagalkeyaṁ sairisalāṟade,

endu tanna nirbharapraṇayanigaḷadoḷe toḍarci tā[ṁ]gidaḷ.
matt’ orvaḷ nijaprāṇēśvarananentuṁ tannoḷaḷavaḍisalāṟade nijapriyasakhig’ int’ endaḷ,

lg.l: anivaṅgeyduḻiy emba tāya nuḍiyaṁ kaikoṇḍenē naṇṭarī
ḷḷanituṁ kād ene bēḍidondu puruḷaṁ mārkoṇḍenē bēḍi vē

div.p:
endu nuḍiyuttumirdaḷ. mattond’ eḍeyoḷ tōḷapallaṭadoḷ
bedaṟida bageverasu lallegeyvaḷanorvanaticaturaviṭaṁ,

lg.l: ttugeya toḍarpadindu paṟidattu manaṁ baḻikeyde sorkidā

div.p:
endu paṟipaḍe nuḍidu geṇṭādaṁ. mattam ond’ eḍeyoḷ orbanagalda
tanna manōnayanavallabheyaṁ nenedu,

lg.l: misuguva tanna bāydeṟeyoḷālada paṇṇane maiya baṇṇadoḷ
kosagane tanna baḷvaḷikeyoḷ seḷegombane pōltu nōḍa mā

div.p: endumavadharisade,

lg.l: gaḷikuṁ maunade munnamānavaṟa nōntā nōmpiyaṁ nōntenē

div.p:
endu pambalisuttirdaṁ. mattond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaḷ tanna abhinava
virahaparitāpadoḷintendaḷ,

lg.l: oḍaluriguṁ manaṁ maṟuguguṁ kivi giṟṟane vōkumatta ka
nuḍi taḍavakkumiccegeḍuguṁ gaḍa nallaragalkeg emba nā

div.p:
endu pambalisuttirdaḷ, mattond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaḷ nijamanōvallabha
paritāpitatanulatike gaganataḷatiḷakananamr̥takiraṇanaṁ nōḍi,
endu pambalisutirdaḷ. mattamond’ eḍeyoḷ orbaḷ,

lg.l: duvu baralātanāṟadoḍe sāyalumāṟ ene sattu nīgenē

div.p:
endu pambalisuttirdaḷ. matt’ ond’ eḍeyoḷ orvaḷ tanna prāṇavallabhaṁ
bandudarke rāgisi intendaḷ:

lg.l: enagennōpana bandudarkiduve dal tellaṇṭi nīṁ ninna kaṁ
panuguḻ mallige candra ninna poḷepaṁ nīṁ tōṟu nīṁ mellame
llane mandāniḷa tīḍu kōgile sarandōṟendu meyverci ta

div.p: ene, mattond’ eḍeyoḷ,
endu nuḍiyattumirdaḷ. mattamond’ eḍeyoḷ orbaṁ caduraviṭaṁ,

lg.l: llada susilaḻkaṟellada padaṁ nevamillada kāypu bēṭami

div.p:
endu nuḍidanantanēkaprakārada kaṭakada nāgarikanaranārījanaṅgaḷaṁ
gajarāgarañjitavinōdaṅgaḷoḷire,
antu suratāmburāśiyanīsi nidrāṅganāliṅgitanāgirpannegaṁ
emba maṅgaḷapāṭhakaravaṅgaḷoḍane bharatēśvaranunnidranādanannegaṁ,
antu bhēriyaṁ poysidanannegaṁ,

lg.l: ścakram endu bandu munde nilva māḻkeyiṁ prabhā

div.p:
antu surūpataranuṁ surabhiniśvāsanuṁ śaṅkhacakranandyāvartasvastika
dhvajāvartaraktabindūcitanuṁ mr̥dudīrghavistr̥tāṅguḷiyuṁ mānapūrvapīḍavr̥tta
mr̥dutir‍yagvilōla mr̥duśirōruhahastanuṁ susnigdhasamapūrvavr̥ttasamanāhapari
pūrṇasitavr̥ttadantaparivēṣitanuṁ āyatapr̥thupibasthānupadigdhāndapūrvapīna
raktārōmāśliṣṭasamāsama sagadanumutkarṣaparipūrṇamukhanuṁ mānōnnatāvanata
kumbhanuṁ sthiraprasannadr̥ṣṭiraktāpāṅgamadhupiṅgaḷavyaktaśuklakr̥ṣṇabhāgasnigdha mr̥dusūkṣma
nīḷadīrghabāhuḷāñcitapakṣmanētranuṁ mr̥du suvr̥tta bahaḷapraḷambaśivātaramahā
srōtōparibhinnaṁ tanūtkr̥ṣṭāvipuḷacūḷikādundubhinirghōṣakarṇanuṁ snigdhakr̥ṣṇa
bahuḷadīrghakēśanuṁ utpannasamyaksamudgatavyūḍhamastakapiṇḍanuṁ nir‍yāṇōnnatō
vagrāhavibhaktaviduvidhānaśarīranuṁ alpaghāṭanumanunnataśikhanuṁ pīnamāṁsa
kaṭiśliṣṭanuṁ atidīrghasnigdhakr̥ṣṇavadananuṁ anupūrvadīrghavāḷadhiyuṁ mānuṣadugdhā
viḷāsanōpētapēcakanuṁ samasaṅkṣiptapracchannavāyupravēśanu mapiñjōtpannāṇḍa
kōśanuṁ aparibhinnāntaślakṣṇaśliṣṭasanninikāntara susanniviṣṭasusaṁ vr̥ttāntarārdha
candrākāraviṁśatinakhanumapūrvōcitamāṁsasphītanōpadigdha gātrāparanuṁ
pīnōpacitamāṁsavikṣōbhanuṁ nābhikapōḷōrōmaṇiyuṁ pīnāyatāmra
pallavakōśasukōśamēhananuṁ vipuḷāsananuṁ anupūrva dhanurākāravaṁśanuṁ
r̥juparipūrṇahrasvagrīvanuṁ mahāvyūḍhōraskanuṁ vipuḷōpacitāṁsanuṁ
samapārśvanuṁ ajakukṣiyuṁ gōdhōtriṣṭanuṁ mōhajaghanāparanuṁ animna
nābhiyuṁ hrasvacūcukanuṁ suvr̥ttāpaskāranuṁ susañcita prōhapaḷihastagātranuṁ
paripūrṇaśliṣṭapārṣṇiyuṁ aṁsaḷakāḷabhāganuṁ mr̥dusnigdhaprabhūtasūkṣmaikajāta
rōmanuṁ apriṇākabhāviḷaślisthitacaḷanuṁ ślakṣṇasnigdhamr̥dubahaḷacchaviyuṁ bandhujīva
śākapuṣpasapadmamahārajataśaṅkhāsataḷav emba saptadvāsthitanuvum appa vijaya
parvatagajēndraṁ bandu munde nilvuduṁ(?)

antu diggajēndradēvāṁśadoḷ nirmisidantirda vijayaparvata
gajamaṁ nōḍaloḍaṁ,

lg.l: ḷnoreyaṁ pōlvudumurbi kārmugila nīrvōl kōśadindaṁ madaṁ

div.p:
antadharīkr̥tasaptacchadāmōdagajamadagandhāmbukulyāpravāhadoḷaṁ
apahasitaśaradindukundastabakakarṇacāmararājahaṁsasalīlōttaṁsadoḷaṁ
vijayaśrīkēśahastaśaṅkākāriśaṅkhakēḷīmayūraśōbheyoḷaṁ gaganagaṅgātaraṅgāya
māṇakadaḷikākānanakamanīyadoḷaṁ vikramakrīḍāparvatamirpantirda vijaya
parvatagajēndramanēṟi daṇḍacakraratnaṅgaḷ munde naḍevinaṁ anukūlānilāndōḷā
yamānarājakuñjaravijayakadaḷikātaraṅgitagaganāṅgaṇanuṁ udātta hēṣārava
mukharitabahubhaṅgiraṅgattaraṅgitadharaṇītaḷāṅgaṇanuṁ anēkasēvakakṣatriyāta
patramaṇḍalapihitadinakaranuṁ uccaḷitabahaḷadhūḷīpaṭalapihitaripunr̥patinagaranuṁ
atipracuracaḷadavanipāḷasañcaḷaccāmaramarutprēṅkhōḷitābharaṇavicitranētra
vaijayantikāñcaḷanuṁ aticakitārātiśuddhāntakāntātyantacintāśvāsānilāndōḷita
kucasicayāñcaḷanuṁ uddāmapadātipadakṣōbhasañcaḷitadharācakranuṁ akhiḷa
digvijr̥mbhaṇaprayāṇamaṅgaḷānakānēkaravaśravaṇakampitaparacakranum āgi naḍeye,
āgaḷ,

mattaṁ prācyārṇavataṭanikaṭavartigaḷappatipracaṇḍamaṇḍaḷikar
bharatēśvaracakravartiya baravaṁ kēḷdu,

antu tanna balaṁ beraselliyuṁ nillade bandu kālānubhāvadiṁ
yugārambhada varṣārambhadoḷaṁ taguḷdī dvīpadoḷagaṇa nadīnadaṅgaḷa jalaṅgaḷanoḷa
koṇḍalaṅghyatvadoḷaṁ dvīpapar‍yantavēṣṭanadoḷaṁ neṟedu vajravēdikeyiṁ
poṟapoṇmida lavaṇasamudradoḷagane pōltirdupasamadrada taḍiviḍidu adaṁ
nōḍuttante bandu gaṅgādvārada vajravēdikōttuṅgatōraṇadvāradantarvaṇa
tuṅgakujaṅgaḷa neḻalgaḷoḷ nālvatteṇgāvudada nīḷada mūvattāṟu gāvudadagalada
bīḍiṅge vāstuvibhāgakkeḍeyillade kuṟumba[ṁ]gaḷoḷ bīḍaṁ biḍisidāgaḷ,
āgaḷ,

antu gaganataḷamaṁ taṟumbuvante negeda vajravēdikeyumaṁ
ambudapathakkālambamirpantirda lavaṇāmburāśiyaṁ nōḍi,

lg.l: enage posantilī negaḻda vajrada vēdike gōṣpadaṁ dalī
vananidhi pāydu māgadhananīgaḷe kaṭṭuvenilli pūṇdu ni
lvanituvaraṁ suraṁ gahanamē pudidavvaḷipenna kāypu pō

div.p:
endu nijabhujabaḷāvalēpamane mundiṭṭu nuḍida cakravartiyaṁ
purōhitapramukhakulavr̥ddhar,

antu darbhaśayanataḷagatanāgirdu pañcaparamēṣṭhigaḷge pūjeyaṁ
purōhitaṁ māḍi śāntikapauṣṭikakriyeyaṁ nirvartisi maṟudivasaṁ nēsarmūḍe
maṅgaḷāḷaṅkaraṇāḷaṅkr̥tan āgi paḍevaḷḷanaṁ paḍege kāpuvēḻdu divyāstraṅgaḷiṁ tekkane
tīvi jaḷasthaḷāviḷambigaḷ appa giḷiya baṇṇada kuduregaḷoḷ pūḍidajitañjayamemba
rathamanēṟi tanna manadannan appa sārathiyaṁ cōdisalvēḻdu vēdyārōhaṇaṁ tanage
vijayaśrīvivāhavēdyārōhaṇamane pōle,

antu tanage vijayakār‍yasiddhidvāramirpantirda gaṅgādvāradoḷagane
lavaṇajaḷadhiyaṁ pokkāgaḷ,

mattam ambarambaraṁ bagidu nimirva teregaḷ emba girigaḷa mēge kr̥taka
girigaḷirpantirda vīṇādharakinnarapannagāmararumanōḷivaṭṭu barpa śaṅkhada
baḷḷavaḷḷigaḷumanaḷḷeviḷḷeyāgi pōgalīyade taḷtu parambhāgambaḍeda vidruma
lategaḷumaṁ karimakaraṅgaḷa kayyēṟinoḷ bibbaribiridoḍeda muktāpuṭōdaraṁ
gaḷoḷagaṇindamuccaḷisida tārātaraḷamuktāphaḷaṅgaḷumanaḻtivaṭṭu nōḍuttuṁ
pōgevōge,
antu cakravartiya puṇyātiśayamanaṟipi jaḷadhiyoḷ baitraṁ parivante,

antu śūrasārathicōditam appa rathamuṁ puṇyasārathicōditamappa
manōrathamuṁ utsāhamaṁ paḍeye panneraḍuyōjanambaraṁ pōdāgaḷ,

antu biṇguṇḍikkida bahitradante alliṁ taḷarade ninda tanna rathamaṁ
kaṇḍu,
antu muḷidu,

endu vajrakāṇḍam emba nijavijayakārmukakke surakarikarānukāriyappa
nijabhujādaṇḍamaṁ nīḍi nīḍilladēṟisi nīvi jēvoḍedāgaḷ,
ant’ amōghabāṇaṁ bāṇadhiyiṁ bāṇaman urcikoṇḍu,

ā prastāvadoḷ ātana parivārāmarar nānāvidhāyudhavyagrapāṇigaḷu
m udāravīrarasarabhasōgravāṇigaḷum āgi māgadhana munde bandu nindu,

endu nuḍivanitumaṁ nuḍidu māṇda māgadhāmaranaṁ dr̥ṣṭaparamparar appa
kulavr̥ddhar eydevandu,

lg.l: mala bhavaduktigaḷ besasuvar peṟarāridanintu sanda tō

div.p:
ad’ alladeyuṁ pūrvāparavidēhaṅgaḷge dēvanikāyadoḍane
jinēndravandanābhaktiyiṁ pōdalli bharatakṣētradoḷī yugadoḷ tīrthakararuṁ
cakravartigaḷumapparendu sarvajñar besase palavu sūḻāmellaṁ kēḷd’ aṟidevu,
antu nijaśaur‍yamadajvaraṁ mantrivargavaidyavacanauṣadhigaḷiṁ pattuviḍe,

endu māgadhāmaraṁ tanna sadbhāvasarvasvadoḍane sarvasvam ellamumaṁ
mundiṭṭāgaḷ,

antu māgadhanaṁ santasambaḍisi pōgalvēḻdu nijavijayakaṭakābhi
mukhanādanāgaḷ sārathi rathamaṁ cōdisuttuṁ,

embinegaṁ; atta vijayakaṭakajanamambudhitaṭadoḷirdu arasanonde
meyyoḷ pōgi bārade taḍedudarke kaṭṭuka[ḍe]du,
annegaṁ,

lg.l: ba ravaṁ pompuḻivōge vāridhitaṭaṁ celvādudā sainyadiṁ

div.p: antu,

lg.l: maṇi kaikoṇḍājñeyaṁ dāṇṭade naḍevudu nīnendaṇaṁ māṇadēka
kṣaṇadindaṁ tanna līlārathadoḷe lavaṇāmbhōdhiyaṁ dāṇṭi nānā

div.p:
antu samuttīrṇapratijñāpāraṁ pārāvārapāravaneydidāgaḷ
gaṅgādvāradoḷ bandu kāṇba makuṭabaddharuṁ tadvēdītaṭadoḷ band’ eṟagu
vadhikārigaḷuṁ śibirabahirbhāgadoḷ bandu kaikoṇḍa sainyaṅgaḷuṁ berasu,

div.head: trayōdaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
antu bharatēśvaracakravarti dakṣiṇadigaṅganāḷaṅkāran āgi naḍedu
dakṣiṇāmburāśiyaneydi vaijayantīdvāradoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭāgaḷ,

antā vanōpāntadoḷ munninante śibiramaṁ niṟisi vaijayantīdvāra
doḷagaṇindamonde rathadoḷ lavaṇajaladhiyaṁ pokku,

antu varatanuvina kaiyoḷabhēdyakavacamumaṁ cūḍāratnamumaṁ
ratnakaṭakaṁ berasu palavuṁ parārthyaratnaṅgaḷaṁ koṇḍu maguḻdu lavaṇasamudradupa
samudrada naḍuve naḍedu candanapanasanāḷikēratāmbūlavallīpracurapradēśaṅgaḷoḷ
nijavijayakuñjaraṅgaḷaṁ vihārisi bandu sindhudvāradoḷ samudrakallōla
līlāndōḷitavanadēvatāndōḷanānukāritāmbūlalatikālambakramukamumā
kampitamadhukaranikarānukāri latāgr̥hapradīpacampakamuṁ praṅkhōḷitamanasija
vijayapraśastilēkhanōcitacchadaśrītāḷikamum appa vēḷāvanadoḷāvāsitavijaya
kaṭakan āgi pūrvasthitiyoḷe pōgi,

ant’ ā prabhāsāmaranaṁ nijavijayayaśaḥprabhāsamūhadindaṁ pudidu
sindhunadītīrambiḍidu barpalli,

lg.l: jinuguva tumbiyiñcarame gāṇara kākaḷi kūḍe sōrva mā
vina sone gandhasindhuramadaṁ taḷirōḷi taguḷdu taḷta kē

div.p:
mattam atyantadhautakaladhautasthāsakāḷaṅkr̥tanakṣatramāḷāparikalitakarīndraṅgaḷe
vikacakarṇikākāranikīrṇajaṅgamakrīḍāgirīndraṅgaḷāge, sakaladikpracaḷitarājaputra
mayūrātapatranicayame sañcārībhūtacūtabhūjārāmamāge, vijaya
kausumbharaktāṁśukapatākānikāyame pallavitāśōkavanamāge, madāmōda
surabhiyuṁ madaśīkarāsāraśiśiramuṁ madāmōdabharamantharamuṁ appa
karikarṇatāḷāniḷane maḷayaruhanandanāndōḷanōdgandhiyuṁ maḷayagiri
nirjharāsphāḷitaśītaḷamuṁ maḷayaviḷāsinīnirantarāḷastanataṭaskhalanamanda
mandagamanamum appa maḷayāniḷan āge,
antu digvijayayātreye vasantōdyānayātreyananukarise,

ant’ atyantapravardhamānavijayōdyōgadiṁ vijayārdhācaḷō
pāntamanoyyanoyyaneydivarpāgaḷ,
mattam ant’ante barevare,

lg.l: ṭṭige munnaṁ bare sāre sāre tanuvaṁ tatkuñjasañjātabhū

div.p:
ā vijayārdhada kaḍeviḍidu mēge negeda vanavēdikāpradēśa
maneydidāgaḷ,

antu sogayisuva vanavēdikeya nānāmaṇimayūkhamālāvirāji
tōttuṅgatōraṇadvāradindaṁ nuguḷdu vanavīthiviḍidu bandu vijayārdha
madhyamakūṭāsannapradēśanivēśitaśibiran āgi niyamadoḷirda bharatēśvara
cakravartiyiravanaṟidu,
bhadrāsanamanikkavēḻe kuḷḷirdu vijayārdhakumāraṁ
antu vijayābhiṣēkaṅgeydu,

endu vijayārdhakumāraṁ sāravastugaḷanōlagisi tanagājñāvidhēyan āgi
pōdaṁ. annegaṁ bharatēśvaracakravartiyumalli cakraratnamaṁ pūjisi,

antu tanna munne banda vanavīthiyoḷagane maguḻdu pōgi vēdikādvāradiṁ
poṟamaṭṭu vijayārdhavanavēdikāsannaviśālapradēśadoḷ,

antu bīḍaṁ biṭṭirpannegaṁ gaṅgāsindhugaḷeraḍaṟeḍeya bhūpāḷarinde
munna vr̥ṣabhanāthana naḍapidudumaṁ tamma naṇpumaṁ bagedu kururājādi
mūrdhābhiṣiktapārthivar sannaddhabalaparivr̥tar āgi bharatēśvaracakravartiya
nāsthānadoḷ bandu kaṇḍu,
endu tannaṁ munnamaṟipi,

antu koṭṭu tānuṁ cakravartiya mannaṇeyoḷ santasambaṭṭu
vijayārdhaguhādvārapravēśōpāyamanellamaṟiye binnapaṅgeydā vyantarāmaraṁ
pōgaloḍaṁ manuvaṁśadhvajaṁ sēnānāyakaṅge baḻiyanaṭṭidāgaḷātaṁ bandu munname
bandirda kururājādi pārthivaraṁ nōḍi,

embuduṁ taduktisudhāsāravāridhāreyindaṁ konarta rājaputrara
mārgaśramātapākrāntam appa manam emba lateyananēkakuśalālāpapraśneyindaṁ
kusumitamumaṁ svahastatāmbūladānadindaṁ phalitamumaṁ māḍi tamma tamma
bīḍugaḷgavaraṁ pōgalvēḻdu sēnānāyakana mogamaṁ nōḍi kr̥tamāḷāma
rōddiṣṭōpāyamanellamaṁ pēḻdu,

ā vēdikeya mūḍaṇa maṇimayasōpānaṅgaḷindaṁ rajatācaḷa
jagatītaḷamanēṟi tannoḍaneya balamellamaṁ paḍuvaṇa sōpānaṅgaḷindaṁ beṅke
bhōṅkenaḷuradantu bēgaṁ mlēcchakhaṇḍāntarvartiyāge munnaṁ kaḻipi
guhōtsaṅgamaṁ tānorbaneydevandu turagaratnamanēṟi paścimābhimukhan āgi nindu
bharatēśvaracakravarti gelgendu sātirēkaṁ dvādaśayōjanavistārāṣṭayōjanōtsēdha
vajrakavāṭapuṭaṅgaḷaṁ,

ant’ abhēdyavajrakavāṭapuṭaṅgaḷā parvataderdedeṟevante teṟeye
bhōṅkenaḷurva beṅkeyaṁ sōṅkalīyade,

antu turaṅgaratnada javadoḷoḍambaṭṭante sakaḷacamūpatiyu
manaśvaratnamumaṁ daṇḍaratnamumaṁ meymeyyoḷe kāva dēvategaḷ vijayārdhataṭa
vēdikeyiṁ taguḷdu sindhuvina paścimadigbhāgavanavēdikeya tōraṇadvāradindaṁ
mlēcchakhaṇḍadoḷagaṇa vividhākārapuragrāmasīmābhirāmabhūmibhāgamaṁ
pugisidāgaḷ sēnānāyakaṁ mlēcchakhaṇḍamaṁ pradakṣiṇaṅgeydu bāykēḷisi palambar
mlēccharājaranavaravara jīvadhana kuladhanaṅgaḷ verasu mundiṭṭu tōraṇadvāradindaṁ
sindhuvanavēdikeyoḷagane bandu sōpānāntaradoḷī vijayārdhataṭavēdikeyaṁ
kaḻidu jagatītaḷamanēṟi barpannegaṁ,

āgaḷ ā guhādvāramaṁ patākinīpati paḍege naḍeyalimbappantu śōdhisi
kāpaṁ pēḻdu nijavijayaśibiramaṁ pokku cakravallabhanāsthānamaṇṭapadoḷ
dūrāvanatamaṇimakuṭan āgi kaṇḍu vastuvāhanapurassaraṁ mlēccharājaraṁ lalāṭaspr̥ṣṭa
bhūtaḷaraṁ māḍi kāṇisi,

end’ avara dēśanāmakulagōtraṅgaḷaṁ neṟeye tiḷiye binnapaṅgeydu
bhr̥tyabhāvamaṁ pūṇisi sanmānadānaṅgaḷoḷ santasambaḍisi tantamma nelegaḷge
pōgalvēḻdu śubhadinamuhūrtadoḷ uttarabharatavijayōdyōgamaṁ
bharatarājanaṟipalendu vijayabhēriyaṁ poyisidāgaḷ,

ā vijayaprayāṇabhērīninādamambhōbhāragambhīrāmbhōdharastanita
bahuḷasnigdhaṅgaḷ appa madastambēramabr̥ṁhitaṅgaḷindamasakr̥dāsphālitānēkadundubhi
dhvanimadhuragambhīraṅgaḷ appa hayahēṣitaṅgaḷindamudagrakuñjarakumbhajarjaraṇa
janitōtkaṇṭhakaṇṭhīravaravōdbhaṭabhairavaṅgaḷ appa subhaṭapaṭukṣvēḍitaṅgaḷindaṁ sandaṇisi
ghūrṇamānārṇavaghōṣamaṁ gelda harṣadiṁ percuvante perci,

lg.l: sāraṁ kaigaṇme kaṇgoppuva jayagajamaṁ līleyindēṟi vādi
kāraṁ yātrōtsavaprastutam ene taḷardaṁ rāgadiṁ rājarājaṁ

div.p: antu taḷardu rājamandiramaṁ poṟamaḍuvāgaḷ,

antu poṟamaṭṭuttarabharatada vijayaśrīvivāhamahōtsavaprārambhadoḷ
dikpālakara kedaṟuva piṣṭātakacūrṇamenisuva rajaḥpuñjamumaṁ dikkanyakeyara sūsuva
lājāñjaḷinicayamenisuva madakarikaraśīkaranikaramumaṁ ambaradoḷamara
vr̥ndaṅgaḷ bittarisuva patākegaḷenisuva karikadaḷikegaḷumaṁ munde mundaniladēvana
taḷiva kusumaprasaramenisuva turaṅgamukhaphēnapallavastabakamumaṁ nōḍuttuṁ
naḍeye,

āgaḷ sainyādhināthanadhināthana keladoḷ pakṣagajādhirūḍhan āgi dēva
nōḍī tōrpudu davadahanadhūmādhikaśyāmaḷitōttāḷatāḷakāyamati
vicitratrapumayapatrakhacitōccaṇḍatāḷacāpadaṇḍamanēkavarṇākīrṇatrisaravēṇikāgāḍha
grathitatrapuṣakōśaguptagulphāntaraprāptakhaḍgadhēnukamāndhradhānuṣkabaḷaṁ;

mattitta kōmaḷaśyāmaḷacchāyānikāyamuṁ upaniṭilaghaṭitakuṭilajūṭa
bandhamumākūrpararacita kāḷāyasavaḷayabhayaṅkarakaradvayamumabhinava
śumbhatkausumbhavēṇikābandhōllasanmallikāmukuḷākāravitastimātrāsidhēnu
kōśamumanēkarucivicitravētraviśikhātiruciraprāntakuntamanuttarīya
kaṁ[cu]kamatisubhaṭamadōtkaṭamidu karṇāṭabalaṁ;

matt’ ī bhāgadoḷ abhinavapriyaṅguśyāmāṅgamardhacandrabudbuda
vyākīrṇatriśūlakarāḷaviśālavētrakhēṭakamudghr̥ṣṭaraśmipāṇḍurapāḷita
karavāḷāḍḍāyudhamikṣudaṇḍapraṇīta krīḍāvakhaṇḍitōccaṇḍaśuṇḍāḷagātrāparapati
bāḷakadaḷikākāṇḍalīlācchinna sindhuramadhyahastamatyantamr̥dumr̥ṇāḷadaṇḍahēḷādaḷita
dantidaśanamusaḷamutkavāṭalāghavalaṅghitaparapuraparikhāvaḷayamanēkāhavadr̥ṣṭa
dōssāhasamidu varāṭasubhaṭabalaṁ;

matt’ itta sarvāṅgīṇasāndraharidravilēpanavilipta haritāḷapaṅkapiṅgaḷavilaṅghita
śilāstambhavibhramaramānitambaśikharitaraṅgitacaturaṅguḷāgrapallavanivasanamatima
sr̥ṇavarṇavyatikarōdīrṇaśōbhāpuñjarañjita nūpurapaṭṭikānaddhakanakapatrāṅkitā
yōgakhaḍgaputrikōdbhāsamānasuvarṇakōśamanatijaraṭhakarṇikāramukuḷa
sthūḷatricatura suvarṇamaṇibaddhōddhurakandhara mutkaṭahāṭaka padakamaṇi trikhaṇḍa
karṇābharaṇamudbaddhōdbhavamatyantaśauryasaundar‍ya prakāśana parityaktatanucchadamuttaptaraja
tāvadātalōhaputrikānaddhalākṣāhiṅgulikapāṭalaphalakamardhakaravāḷacāḷanaprakaṭita
bhaṭabibhīṣikāḍambaramatisphuṭavīraśr̥ṅgāranāṭakābhinayanaṭavr̥ndamidu mahā
nāṭakabalaṁ;

matt’ ittakārtasvarastambhasañcāraṇabhāsvaramāskandhapralambasubhaṭakarṇābharaṇa
karṇapāśamābhīḷaśārdūlamukharōmakarāḷasr̥kvōpāntaprarūḍhaśmaśru
jāḷamāhava mahāhuṅkārakāḷakūṭaviṭapiprarōhaśaṅkāvaha nābhikūpāvalambi
kūrcakaḷāpaṁ lalāṭanihitakausumbhāṁśukapaṭṭakāprāntanibiḍanibaddhakēśabandha
mācūḷasvastikabaddhavicitravastra dvayōddāmadhānuṣkamudvīcimarumarīcinicaya
cañcaḷōddāmabaḷabahaḷaniṣkavacaprāsapāṇivārāśikamugrapuṅkhaprēkhōḷānēka
nētrapaṭṭikāsaṭāḷasaraḷakuntahastamahāhayārōhaṇamasitabhujagaśiśutaraḷatara
vārikhaḍgakhēṭakavyagrakaradvayōddāmapadātibahaḷamidu lāṭabalaṁ,
end’ anēka dēśādhīśabalaṅgaḷaṁ bēṟevēṟe tōṟuttuṁ barpannegaṁ munde,

antu vijayārdhācaḷakaṭakābhimukhīkr̥tanijavijayakaṭakan āgi
baḍagamogade naḍedu tanmahīdharada jagatītaḷamaṇimayasōpānamanēṟuvalli
paścimābhimukhan āgi pōgi pañcāśadyōjanāyāmadoḷaṁ dvādaśayōjana
vistārāṣṭayōjanōtsēdha vajrakavāṭapuṭamuṁ vicitramaṇimayūkhacitrita
dvārabandhabandhuramumadhassthaḷaprasarpatsindhuvāhapravāhavirājitamuṁ prasavāgāra
dante niṣiddhānyapravēśamuṁ rājabhavanadante kr̥tarakṣāvidhiyuṁ vivāhagēhadante
saṅgatamaṅgaḷaparikaramuṁ jīvitāśayadante atyāyāmamuṁ muktajjaradante
nirmuktōṣmamuṁ mūrchāprāptanante tamōmayamum appa tamisraguheya
neydidāgaḷ,

antu kākiṇīmaṇiratnaṅgaḷoḷ bareda candrādityara beḷagugaḷoḷaṁ
munde naḍeva cakraratnaprabhācakradoḷaṁ ā paḍe kaṇbaḍedante sōpānāntara
doḷ iḻideraḻbagiy āgi sindhuvin’ eraḍuṁ taḍiyoḷameraḍuyōjanadagaladoḷ
sēnānīniyamadoḷ prabhūtāyatasamānam āge naḍedu kelavu payaṇaṅgaḷiṁ
guhābhittigaḷeraḍuṁ deseya kuṇḍaṅgaḷoḷ puṭṭi banderaḍuṁ deseyoḷaṁ
sindhuvinoḷ kūḍida guhāmadhyadoḷunmagnanimagnajalanimnagātaṭadoḷ bīḍaṁ
biḍisi,

ant’ ubhayanadiya vaiṣamyamumanāścaryambaṭṭu nōḍi nadyu
ttaraṇōpāyamāvudendu bagedu bēgaṁ sthapatiratnamaṁ karedu tannipatadudakōbhaya
saritsvarūpamaṁ tōṟidoḍe,

endu binnapaṅgeydu divyaśaktiprabhāvadindamānuṣāraṇyaṅgaḷa mahādru
maṅgaḷaṁ tarisi naḍisi naṭṭa kambhaṅgaḷa mēge sāradārugaḷaneḍegiṟidire pāsi pasarisi
paḍege naḍeyalappante māḍidāgaḷ,

antu bharatēśvaracakravartiyumanēkamadagajaghaṭāparivēṣṭitan āgi
rājamārgadoḷ naḍevantadaṟa mēle naḍedu kelavu payaṇaṅgaḷind’ uttaraguhādvāra
mananāyāsadoḷ teṟedu poṟamaṭṭāgaḷ,
antu tamisraguhādvāradiṁ poṟamaṭṭāgaḷ,
antu vijayārdhamahīdharōpakaṇṭhavananikaṭadoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭāgaḷ,

ant’ alli bīḍaṁ biṭṭu munnin ante paścimakhaṇḍamumaṁ akhaṇḍapratāpa
dhvajanandu tanna dhvajinīpatiyanaṭṭi bāykēḷisi cakraratnamaṁ mundiṭṭu madhyamakhaṇḍa
mumaṁ auṅki pūḻe pokkavaṣṭambhisi nindāgaḷ, [cilātā]vartarembirvaruṁ
mlēccharājar dhanurdharaprāyamuṁ aśvīyabahaḷamuṁ hāstikasādhanamum appa tamma
balamanondumāḍi kūḍikoṇḍu cakravartiyoḷuccavigrahaṅgeyyalettikoṇḍudaṁ
kaṇḍu mantrigaḷ mārkoṇḍu,

lg.l: vrajadoḍḍēṁ mr̥garājanaṁ neṟevudē tāṅgalke nammī br̥ha

div.p:
ad’ alladeyuṁ ī giridurgamaṁ dāṇṭi banda ballāḷ divyaprabhāvanakkum a
mōghanakkuṁ; adaṟiṁ ītanoḷ idirci kāduva maruḷtanaṁ bēḍa; himavadvi
jayārdhagaṅgāsindhutaṭāvadhiyappī namma madhyamakhaṇḍadoḷaṁ agādhanadīnada
dustaram appa jaladurgada mahimeyumaṁ abhraṅkaṣaśikhariśikharadurllaṅghyamappa
giridurgada pempumaṁ udagratarugahanaduṣpravēśam appa vanadurgadunnatiyumaṁ
oḷakoṇḍu, nirantarāṭṭāḷakapratōḷīndrakauśaḷadēvapathasanāthaṅgaḷuṁ gaṇḍa
śaiḷābhīḷaśiḷāyantrabhayaṅkaraṅgaḷuṁ praḷayakāḷānaḷavarṣaśaṅkākārihutava
havarṣāgniyantrabhayānakaṅgaḷuṁ kaṇṭakagulmaviṣavallīsaṅghātabhīṣaṇaṅgaḷuṁ
jānubhañjaniśūlaprakaraparivr̥taṅgaḷuṁ kūpakūṭāvapātalōhakaṇṭakasaṅkaṭaṅgaḷuṁ
tāḷapatraśr̥ṅgāṭakanicitaṅgaḷuṁ śvadaṁṣṭrārgaḷōparimasañchannaṅgaḷuṁ yantrāyudhā
varaṇōpakaraṇapariṇataṅgaḷāgirda durgaṅgaḷoḷ,

lg.l: vanasiṁhanyāyadiṁ durgadoḷe balidu nindalli bandotti cakrē
śana tantraṁ nilkumārtallige neṟedu bharaṅge[ydoḍu]rkuḷḷa sāmaṁ

div.p:
antītana kaṭakakke nityakṣayavyayapratyavāyaṅgaḷaṁ māḍi bēsaṟisi neladiṁ
teraḷcuvamalladoḍaṁ namma kuladēvategaḷ appa mēghamukhar emba nāgarājaremba
nāgarājarindamītanaḷurkeyumanurkumaṁ kiḍisi gelvam endu nuḍida mantrigaḷa
mātaṁ manadegoṇḍu ciḷātāvartar pūjāpurassaraṁ darbhaśayanataḷagatar
tadudyōgapararādāgaḷā nāgarājar bandu nimagāmuḷḷante dandugamendu
mēkappud’ endu,

lg.l: ḍaḷamuṁ kargi kaṟaṅgi tōṟe siḍiliṁ miñciṁ ghanadhvānadiṁ
diḷe kampaṅgoḷe sōneyiṁ sarigaḷiṁ tandalgaḷindandu bhū

div.p: antu viḷayakāḷajaḷadōdīrṇajaḷamumaniḷisi jaḷadharajaḷadhiya naḍuve,

antu kr̥takacaturdvāradantarbhāgadoḷ sēnādhinātharakṣitam appa kaṭakakke
vajraprākārarūpan āgi kurukulāgragaṇyan appa sōmaprabhana magaṁ jayakumāraṁ
sthapatiratnaviracitāmbaragōcararathanikaraṅgaḷuṁ vajrada giḍigegaḷuṁ berasu mēgha
mukhāmararoḷ kāduvāgaḷ,

āgaḷā negaḻda samarakaḷakaḷamaṁ kēḷdidēnendu bharatēśvaracakravarti khaḍgaratnakke
kaiyaṁ nīḍidāgaḷ,

āgaḷ jayana bhujavijayasūcakam āgi mēghanādasamānam āda
siṁhanādakke cakravarti mecci mēghasvaranāmamaṁ vīrāgragaṇyapadaviyaṁ dayeg’ eydu
ciḷātāvartara kuladhanamumaṁ yaśōdhanamumaṁ kaikoṇḍu avaraṁ vaśavidhē
yar‍māḍi sindhunadītīrambiḍidu pōgi himavatparvatada sindhuprapātaman eydi
tanna baravanaṟididirvanda sindhudēviyindaṁ sindhujaḷaṅgaḷoḷabhiṣiktan āgi
bhadrāsanamaṁ paḍedu sindhudēviyanirisi katipayaprayāṇaṅgaḷiṁ himavanmadhyakūṭābhi
mukhapradēśadoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭu niyamasthan āgi himavatkumāranumaṁ vijayārdha
kumāranandadoḷe sādhisuvudumātanandōlagisida gōśīrṣacandanadivyauṣadhi
māḷādi tadgirisamudbhūtasāravastugaḷaṁ kaikoṇḍu ājñāvidhēyar‍māḍi sindhunadī
tīrambiḍidu pōgi himavatparvatamaṁ nōḍi,

lg.l: idu haimādrīndramāṟuṁ kulagirige modal mēruśailēndramaṁ me
idaṟiṁ madhyada padmey emba koḷadindaṁ gaṅgeyuṁ sindhuvuṁ

div.p:
antu tadgirīndramadhyamakūṭadindaṁ saytu teṅkamogade bandu
vr̥ṣabhācaḷamaṁ kaṇḍaṁ. adu yōjanaśatamūlavistr̥tamuṁ tāvatpramāṇō
tsēdhamuṁ tadardhapramitōparimataḷavistāramuṁ pañcaviṁśatiśatayōjanāvagāha
mum āgi sanduttarabharatamadhyamakhaṇḍada naṭṭanaḍuvaṇeḍeyoḷ atikrāntānēka
cakravartigaḷa viśadayaśaḥpuñjamumaṁ vijayalakṣmīmukhaviḷōkanamaṅgaḷamaṇi
darpaṇaśrīyumaṁ tannoḷaḷavaḍisi,

ā vr̥ṣabhādriya mēkhaḷābhittiyoḷ ātmīyaviśvaviśvambharāvijaya
praśastiyanaḻtiyoḷ bareyisuvenendu pōgi nōḍuvannegaṁ,

lg.l: dada caladāyadāyatiya bīrada cāgada mātugaḷ poda

div.p:
antu gaḷitagarvan āgi siggāgi pūrvāvanipāḷapraśastiyoḷoṁ[daṁ]
daṇḍaratnadiṁ sīṇṭi kaḷedu nijapraśastigeḍemāḍi,

lg.l: tī teṟadiṁ negaḻda tanna kīrtiyanī vi

div.p:
ant’ ātmīyavijayapraśastiyanā vr̥ṣabhagiriyoḷā vr̥ṣabhēśvaranandanaṁ
kākiṇīratnadiṁ bareyisi baḻikkadarkīśānadoḷirda gaṅgākūṭakkabhimukhavāgi
tatsamīpadoḷ ātmīyamaṅgaḷajaḷaṅgaḷindabhiṣēkaṅgeydu anēkāśīrvādapurassaraṁ
siṁhāsanamaṁ koṭṭa gaṅgādēviyaṁ visarjisi gaṅgātaṭambiḍidu, caturaṅga
cakrapāṁsupaṭaladindaṁ diṅmukhaṅgaḷuṁ, virōdhinarapāḷapriyasakhīmukhaṅgaḷuṁ
vicchāyaṅgaḷāgeyuṁ, mahāvāhinīvāraṇēndraghaṭānyōnyasaṅghaṭṭaghaṇṭāṭaṅkārā
sphāḷanadindaṁ udagragiriguhāntaraṅgaḷuṁ udīrṇavikramārātikarṇāntaraṅgaḷuṁ
vikīrṇaṅgaḷāgeyuṁ, aparimitastambēramānīkaśīkaranīhāravarṣadindaṁ
uṣṇāṁśumālipratāpamuṁ ūrjitārātirājapratāpamuṁ vidrutōdrēka
māgeyuṁ, sañcāritamēcakācaḷacakravāḷaruciharikaraṭighaṭāprapañcarāgakētana
cañcaḷāñcaḷanicayadindaṁ ambhōdapathamuṁ aticakitavidviṣṭadr̥ṣṭipathamuṁ
niravakāśamāgeyuṁ, udvr̥ttamattavāraṇēndraviṣāṇakuliśadaṇḍahatiyiṁ vanadurga
bhaṅgamuṁ vipakṣapārthivamanōrathabhaṅgamuṁ siddhamāgeyuṁ, dakṣiṇābhimukhan āgi
nityaprayāṇaṅgaḷiṁ bandu,

antu vijayārdhācaḷakāṇḍakaprapātaguhāsamīpadoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭu
munnina māḻkeyoḷe varūthinīpatiyaṁ besasidoḍe ātanā guhādvāramaṁ
pūrvōktakramadoḷe teṟedadaṟa beṅkeyāṟuvannegaṁ mlēcchakhaṇḍamumaṁ mūḍaṇa
deseyoḷirduvumaṁ bāykēḷisalpōge dakṣiṇōttaraśrēṇigaḷa vidyādhara
rājādhirājar namivinamigaḷaṁ mundiṭṭu bandu,

ant’ ā subhadrey emba kanyāratnamaṁ ambaracarōcitakalyāṇaṅgaḷindaṁ
ā puruṣaratnākaranoḷ nerapi tamma maneyoḷuḷḷanarghyaratnaṅgaḷellamaṁ
baḻivaḻigoṭṭu bīḻkoṇḍu pōdar. annegaṁ mlēccharājabalaparivr̥tan āgi
nijabhujavijayamaṁ mundiṭṭu bandu kaṇḍa daṇḍanāyakaṁ tōṟidanēka
kṣatriyaputrakuladhanaṅgaḷaṁ kaikoṇḍu kōśādhyakṣahastanyastaṅgaḷmāḍi besananirme kēḷadantu
pūṇisi kaḻipi munname teṟedaṟudiṅgaḷvaramāṟida kāṇḍakaprapātaguheyoḷagaṇindaṁ
cakraratnaṁ munde naḍeye kākiṇīratnaracitasūr‍yacandramaṇḍalaṅgaḷa beḷaginoḷaṁ
gaṅgānadyubhayataṭamahāvīthigaḷoḷaṁ naḍedu katipayadinaṅgaḷiṁ guhādvāramaṁ
poṟamaḍuvāgaḷ tadguhākūṭanivāsiy appa nāṭyamālāmaraṁ suvarṇapūrṇa
kumbhādi maṅgaḷaṅgaḷinidirgoḷe guhādvāradiṁ poṟamaṭṭāgaḷ,

āgaḷ patākinīpatiya niyamadiṁ pūrvadigbhāgasthitamaṁ mlēccha
khaṇḍamanapratihataśāsanāṅkitaṁ māḍi bare vijayasainyavinirjitabharatamaṇḍaḷaṁ
bharatēśvaracakravarti siddhadigvijayan āgi vijayaparvatagajamanēṟi gaṅgātaṭambiḍidu
payaṇambandu kaiḷāsācaḷanikaṭadoḷ kaṭakamaṁ niṟisi parimitaparijanamberasu
tadgirīndramaneydevandu,

endu kaiḷāsācaḷamanēṟi dhūḷīśāladiṁ taguḷdu pūrvōktavarṇa
nōpētam appa vr̥ṣabhanāthanāsthānamaṇṭapamaṁ nōḍuttuṁ bandu sakaḷa
surāsurēndramunīndrarundrasabheya naḍuve siṁhāsanamastakadoḷirda jagattrayatiḷakana
pādapadmaṅgaḷge bharatēśvaracakravarti mahītaḷanihitamaṇikirīṭaraśmisandōha
sāndrakuṅkumapaṅkadiṁ vihitōpahāranāgi
end’ anēkastavanaṅgaḷiṁ stutisi,

div.head: caturdaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
antu samavasaraṇamaṇḍaḷadiṁ poṟamaṭṭu līlāprasāditasakaḷa
diṅmaṇḍaḷaṁ kailāsaśailakaṭakanikaṭavartiyāgirda nijavijayakaṭakakke vandu,

antu kelavu payaṇaṅgaḷindaṁ nijānvayarājadhāniyanayōdhyāpura
maneydidāgaḷ,

antu cakraratnamayōdhyāpuramaṁ pugade taṟumbi nindudaṁ kaṇḍumadaṁ
rakṣisuva yakṣasahasramberasu gaṇabaddhadēvarellaṁ neredu,

ā prastāvadoḷ cakrēśvaraṅge cakraratnaskhalanamaṁ patākinīcakra
pradhānaprabhugaḷaṟiye binnapaṅgaidoḍaskhalitagatiy appa cakraratnaskhaḷanakke nāḍeyuṁ cakri
manaskhaḷanamāge vismayambaṭṭu purōhitaratnamaṁ barisi,

endu vīrarasōdāragambhīravacanaracanegaḷinanitane besasi māṇda
cakravallabhaṅge purōhitanabhimukhanāgi,

lg.l: sānuṁ bēgadoḷe kaḷedu tōṟ ene raṇadoḷ

div.p:
āgaḷ bharatēśvaracakravartiyaṭṭida dūta[ṁ] puruparamēśvaratanūjarallige
pōgi,

endu nuḍida dūtana nuḍiyumaṁ rājādēśamumanavadhārisi banda
dūtanaṁ mannisi santōṣambaḍisi pōgalvēḻdu,

lg.l: dharegayyaṁ dayegeyye muṁ paḍedudarkintītanoḷ toṭṭa kiṁ

div.p: endu tammoḷanibaruṁ paricchēdisi,
endu parityakta nijarājyaparicchēdarāgi,
antu,
endu paramanirvēgaparāyaṇarāgi,

ant’ ā kumāraranibarumāditīrthaṅkarasamavasaraṇasarōvararāja
haṁsarāda vyatikaramaṁ bharatēśvaraṁ kēḷdu,
endu vismitāntaḥkaraṇan āgi manadoḷe mecci,

endu mantrivargadoḍane nirākuḷitakār‍yapar‍yavasānan āgi bāhubali
kumāraṅge lēkhamanunmayūkharatnābharaṇaprābhr̥tasamētamanaṭṭuvantu mahāsandhi
vigrahige besasidoḍātaṁ janapadasamabhijātanumanvayāgatanumabhirūpanuṁ
pratyutpannapratibhanuṁ vakrōktinipuṇanumādhēyavacananumanuddhatavēṣanuṁ
paricitāśēṣadēśabhāṣanuṁ vayōvr̥ddhanuṁ prasiddhanum appa mahattarana kaiyoḷ
sanmānadānapurassaramāge koṭṭu vijayakār‍yasiddhiyakkendu pōgalvēḻvudumātanuṁ
katipayaprayāṇaṅgaḷindaṁ paudanapuramaneydi puraśrīyanaḻtivaṭṭu nōḍi meccutuṁ
bandu līlōttāritaripunr̥pālasāmantasīmantinīsīmantar appa mahāsāmanta
rindamadharitānēkaripunr̥pānēkaraṇaṅgaḷ appa vāraṇaṅgaḷindaṁ hēlōllaṅghitamahāvā
hinībhūribhairavājigaḷ appa vājigaḷindamapahr̥tavikrāntavidviṣṭavikramasampattigaḷappa
pattigaḷindaṁ virājamānam appa rājamandiramaneydi dauvārikanivēditātmīya
vr̥ttāntanāsthānamaṇḍapamaṁ pokku lalāṭataṭasaṅghaṭṭitasabhākuṭṭiman āgi,

endu manadoḷe bagedu vismayambaṭṭu bharatanāthadūtanātmapārśvacarakara
taḷadinupāyanaratnakaraṇḍakamaṁ koṇḍu dēva bhavadīyāgrajaṁ rājādhirājaṁ
nimagaṭṭida mahāprasādaṁ binnapam endu mundiṭṭu mahattaraṁ mahattarayōgya
mahīnihitāsanadoḷirpuduṁ; adaṁ mahāsandhivigrahi koṇḍu apanītamudreyaṁ
māḍi tadantassthitaṅgaḷ appa ratnābharaṇaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟi kōśādhyakṣahastanyastaṅgaḷ māḍi
dēva lēkham id’ endu,

svasti samastaviṣṭapādhīśvarapuruparamēśvaracaraṇasarasijarajōrañjitamaṇi
kirīṭamakarikācakraṁ cakraratnaprabhāsāditanikhiladikcakraṁ bharatēśvaracakravarti nija
priyānujabāhubalikumāranaṁ paramāśīrvādadiṁ parasi kanakapatrāṅkitakārmuka
latālambanaṅgaḷuṁ vijayōtsavatōraṇastambhaṅgaḷuṁ vīraśrībhujaṅgīsamāśraya
śrīkhaṇḍakāṇḍagaḷum appa dōrdaṇḍaṅgaḷindamatinibiḍāliṅganaṅgeydu kāryamaṁ
besasirkuṁ -

adentendoḍe, munnaṁ trailōkyasāmrājyahētubhūtamenisida puru
paramēśvarana kēvalajñānapūjeyumaṁ prājyasāmrājyaprakāśanakaram appa cakrapūje
yumaṁ nirvartisi,

lg.l: mugilaṁ muṭṭe nijapratāpadaḷavaṁ tōṟalke māṟāmpa je
de gelalsāldire digjayakke poṟamaṭṭā pempu sāmānyamē

div.p:
antu poṟamaṭṭanēkakaraṭikaṭakaṣīkaraṇaniśśēṣitārātivanadurganuṁ
udagramadāndhasindhurapratigajaśaṅkāsphālitagaṇḍaśailavighaṭitagiridurganuṁ
antassphuradatisphārasamarōṣmasantaptajalapratyēkacuḷukapānamātrajānudaghna
jaladurganum āgi naḍedu,

antu pūrvadakṣiṇāparapārāvāratīravartigaḷ appa bhūpāḷaraneṟagisi
gaṅgāvaijayantī sindhudvāraṅgaḷaṁ nijavijayavarūthamondaṟoḷe nuguḷdu
lavaṇajaladhiyaṁ pokku,

antu tamisraguheyoḷagane kākiṇīratnadoḷ bareda candrādityara
beḷagugaḷoḷ nijavijayakaṭakaṁ naḍeye vijayārdhācaḷamaṁ peṟagikki śabara
khaṇḍaṅgaḷaṁ sēnānāyakane bāykēḷisi bare,
mattaṁ sindhuprapātasindhudēviyindamabhiṣiktan āgi pōgi,

antu bandu vr̥ṣabhācaḷanikaṭaṅgaḷo[ḷa]pratihatadigvijayapraśastiyaṁ
ṭaṅkōtkīrṇammāḍi gaṅgādēviyōlagisidanarghyaratnaṅgaḷaṁ kaige māḍi
namivinamigaḷmodalāge dakṣiṇōttaraśrēḍhigaḷa vidyādhararājaranājñāvidhēyar‍māḍi
kāṇḍakaprapātaguheya vajrakavāṭaṅgaḷaṁ teṟedu poṟamaṭṭu siddhadigvijayanādanintu,

embuduṁ bāhubalikumāraṁ dūtavacanākarṇanōdīrṇa krōdhō
dgacchadacchēdasvēdajaḷadhārāsārabhīkarālōhitakapōḷataḷamumuddīpanapiṇḍapradīpta
kapōlōccaḷadatucchamadajaḷacchaṭāṭōpabhīṣaṇāruṇagaṇḍasthalamum appa gandha
sindhurēndramananukarisi kōpagarbhasmitaṁ berasu,

lg.l: bharataṁ ṣaṭkhaṇḍabhūvallabhan ene siriyaṁ geṇṭaṟoḷ kēḷdu rāgaṁ
berasirpī naṇpe sālguṁ karedoḍe besanēn emba jīy emba dēveṁ
purudēvaṁ dēvadēvaṁ kuḍe paḍeda nelakkāroḷaṁ panthamuṇṭē

div.p:
ad’ alladeyum udāravīracaritaniratakadanakarkaśakṣatriyaṅge vipakṣakṣatriya
parākramākarṇanōdīrṇakrōdhadoḷ aḷīkabhrukuṭiyuṁ anarthakalalāṭa
tripatākeyuṁ apārthavilōhitavilōcanaruciyuṁ nirar‍thakaniṣṭhurōṣṭhapuṭa
sandaśamuṁ niṣprayōjanasvēdajaḷōdgamamuṁ niṣpandanāsāsphuritamuṁ
niṣkāraṇakāyakampanamuṁ nirālambanavāgāḍambaramuṁ takkudaltu,

endu manunarēndravr̥ndārakaśikhaṇḍamaṇḍanamaṇiyenisida bāhubali
kumāraṁ bharatēśvaracakravartiya dūtanaṁ pōgalvēḻdāgaḷanēkarājanyakamakuṭa
saṅghaṭṭōccaḷanmaṇimarīcigaḷ viḷayānaḷavisphuliṅgaṅgaḷante desedesege kedaṟe

annegaṁ cakravartiya dūtaṁ sākētapuramaneydevandāsthānamaṇṭapado
ḷirda cakravartiyaṁ kaṇḍu poḍemaṭṭu,

lg.l: dhananāgal ninna tammaṁ ninageṟaganidaṁ nambu rājādhirājā

div.p:
ad’ alladeyuṁ vijigīṣubaḷānakānīkaninadamane nijabhujavikramōtsava
kōḷāhaḷamenduṁ vidviṣṭacamūcakrapāṁśupaṭaḷamane nijavijayalakṣmīpariṇaya
nōtsavaprārambhapiṣṭātakacūrṇamenduṁ virōdhisindhuradhvajapaṭacchāyā
pratānamane nijavīrapaṭṭabandhōtsavasamucchritacchatracchāyāmaṇḍaḷamenduṁ
vipakṣaviśikhamōkṣahūṅkāramane nijavijayalakṣmiyudagravīragrahastōbha
nākṣaramenduṁ bageva bāhubalikumāraṁ vijigīṣuvijayayātrāpaṭahara
vāṭōpanirbharacaritaśravaṇavivaran āgi vikrāntakṣatracaritraṅgaḷaṁ kēḷada śātrava
gaṇaneyoḷaṁ virōdhidhvajinī dhūḷīpaṭalapihitadr̥ṣṭigaḷ āgi vīranarēndramārgamaṁ
kāṇada vidviṣṭara sabhāvaniyoḷaṁ ahitamataṅgajavijayakadaḷi[kā]kānana
bahuḷacchāyācchannar āgi kulakramāyātapratāpōṣmamaṁ pattuviḍuvarātigaḷa
saṅkhyeyoḷaṁ vipakṣaśarāsāra mōkṣa hūṅkārastambhānākṣarastambhitahr̥dayar āgi
rājaprasūtavijayayaśaśśarīramaṁ meṟeva ripugaḷa rēkheyoḷaṁ bageyade nimma
bageva kār‍yamaṁ bageyim endu binnapaṅgeydāgaḷ,
āgaḷ dūtāḷāpaviḷayasamīraprēritapraḷayajaḷanidhipradhvanānukāriy āgi,

ā samarasannāhabhērīninādamambhōbhāragambhīrāmbhōdharastanita
bahusnigdhaṅgaḷ appa madastambēramabr̥ṁhitaṅgaḷindaṁ yugapadāsphālitānēkadundubhidhvani
madhuragītaṅgaḷ appa hayahēṣitaṅgaḷindaṁ sandaṇisi ghūrṇamānaikārṇavaghōṣamaṁ
geldu percuvante perce vijayaparvatagajēndrada beṅge vandu,

lg.l: rarasaṁ kaigaṇmi poṇmuttire nijabalamaṁ nōḍidaṁ sār‍vabhaumaṁ

div.p: antu nōḍi paudanapurābhimukhan āgi naḍevalli,
antu bandu,

lg.l: ge jagakkēnilli pēḻādapud ene dese barpante bandoḍḍi nindaṁ

div.p: annegamitta bāhubalikumārana vijayasainyadoḷ,

āgaḷā bāhubalikumāranu saṅgrāmaraṅgāgrēsaranāgalbagedu vijayakanya
kāsvayaṁvarōtpaḷamālānukārinārācaṅgaḷindaṁ vijayarājamahīṣīmayūrāta
patraśaṅkāvahaśaṅkusaṅkuḷaṅgaḷindaṁ vijayalakṣmīkaravaḷayavibhramakaracakraṅgaḷindaṁ
tīvida bisugeyoḷesedu vijayāṅganācarcanōcitamr̥gamadamuṁ nijabhuja
vijayalakṣmīparirambhaṇaprakaṭanadakṣadakṣiṇaviṣāṇavinyastahastamuṁ dānapramōda
vācāḷaṣaṭcaraṇacāraṇagaṇōccārajhuṅkārajayāśīrghōṣamum appa vijayagajada
beṅge vandu,

lg.l: dharadoḷ keygūḍi gōtrādrigaḷe gajaghaṭārūpadiṁ tāgeyuṁ ma

div.p:
antu kadanalakṣmīkanyakāpradānaprathamaprasaradōṅkāraśaṅkākaravijaya
prasthānanāndīsamayaninadānanditadikpāḷacakranuṁ nijavijayaśrīparivārapariṇaya
nōtsavālōkanakutūhalapracalitasamastasāmantacakranuṁ, niṣkaṇṭakīkr̥tāśēṣajagada
kāṇḍōtthitapracaṇḍavipakṣōtpātapraśamanaśāntyudakadhārākāratatkṣaṇakṣaradajasradāna
pramōdajaḷadhārābhirāmakaraṭighaṭācakranuṁ nijavijayaprayāṇaprārambha
sambhūtōtsavabhūdēvatāścaryavīkīryamāṇapiṣṭātakapāṁśupaṭalavibhramanuṁ
karituragakhuraśikharōtkhātadhūḷīsthaḷīkr̥tagaganacakranuṁ, jagatkampitārātidarpatvarita
vidhvaṁsanōdbhūtabhaṭānīkārātibhūkampaśaṅkāvahamahāpadātipādakṣōbhāṁ
dōḷitamēdinīcakranum āgi cakravartiya balamanidircalendu mēletti barpāgaḷ,
antu yuddhabhūmigabhimukhan āgi barpāgaḷ,

āgaḷ idu vipakṣabalamendaṟidu kṣubhitacittan āgi bāhubalikumāranubhaya
pārśvōnnaddhaśaradhisārikāmadhyōrvībhūta baddhagōdhāṅguḷitrāṇāyōdha
sindhuraghaṭāsaṅghaṭṭamuṁ nibiḍanipīḍitaprāsamuṣṭidurdharāśvārōhakaturaṅga
balāvagāḍhamuṁ vividhāyudhakarārabhaṭīrasōdbhaṭasubhaṭavyākīrṇamumuddhūya
mānaprakīrṇacāpalakṣitakṣatraputranirantaramum appa nijabalamberasu bharatēśvara
cakravartiya sainyakke muṭṭe vare,

ant’ ubhayabalada [seṟekōlga]ḷondondaṁ muṭṭuvinam atta
rājādhirājanum itta yuvarājanuṁ nindāgaḷ.

antu negeda dhūḷīpratānamanyōnyaghaṇṭāṭaṅkāraśravaṇadviguṇitaraṇa
rabhasakṣōbhamahāhavasambhūtabhūrimadāmbhaḥpravāhasahasraṅgaḷindamitarētara
hēṣāravākarṇanōdīrṇarōṣahayahūṅkāraniṣṭhuradaśanagrāhakhaṇakhaṇāyita
khalīnasaṅghaṭṭa syandamānaphēnasalilasrōtaśśataṅgaḷindamāku[ḷavyā]kuḷanayanarāja
tanūjasamājavadanābhimukhacaṭuḷa sañcār‍yamāṇacārucāmaranicayavicaḷa
daviraḷāniḷaṅgaḷindaṁ viraḷaviraḷamādāgaḷ,
ant’ oḍḍida gajaghaṭāṭōpada naḍuve,

annegamittaṁ yuvarājanā bagedabhiniṣādiyumaṁ paścimaniṣādiyumaṁ
nijavijayasindhuramumaṁ tiṇṇaṁ nūṅkalumavuṅkaluṁ besasi vijayalakṣmī
vilāsinībhrūlatāvibhramānukāri yenipudaṁ madhyamaniṣādiya kaiyiṁ koṇḍu,
ā prastāvadoḷ,

lg.l: isalendirda dhanurbalaṁ poḷeva bāḷuḷkaṅgaḷaṁ pōle pā
disalendirda rathaṁ kanalva muḷisiṁ māṟānalendirda kha

div.p:
āgaḷ ubhayabalamantrimukhyarivarirbararasugaḷappoḍe caramadēhadhārigaḷivara
yuddhamembudatikrūragrahayuddhadante sakaḷaprajāvināśakaramallade peṟataltu;
caturaṅgabalayuddhadoḷallade gellasōlamembudilla; samastajanasaṁharaṇakāraṇamappa
raṇadoḷēvandapudendu dhar‍mayuddhamane tammoḷ samakaṭṭi munnaṁ bharatēśvara
cakravartiyallige vandu,

ene bharatēśvaracakravartiyintādoḍemage bāhubaliya samara
saṅghaṭṭadōhaḷamidu daridragēhinīgarbhadōhaḷadantādudendu rājyalakṣmī
līlālambanamenisida bisugeya mattālambanamanavaḷambisi, sindhuraskandhapīṭhadoḷ
sukhāsīnanāgirdāgaḷ, bāhubalikumāranallige mantrigaḷ bandu pūr‍vōkta
kramadoḷe dhar‍mayuddhavyatikaramaṁ binnapaṅgeydāgaḷ,

endu nijabhujadaṇḍōccaṇḍacāpaṭaṅkāramaṁ bharatarājasainyakke kupita
kr̥tāntahūṅkāraśaṅkāvahaṁ māḍalpaḍeyadeyuṁ anyadurdharanijadhanurdaṇḍamaṁ
taddhvajinige kōpakuṭiladakṣiṇadikpālabhrakuṭīvibhramamaṁ māḍalpaḍeyadeyuṁ
anavaratapramucyamānapracuranijanārācarājiyindamaviraḷamadajaḷatailapākadurā
lōkaṅgaḷ appa tadbalakaraṭikaṭakaṭāhaṅgaḷanalpatucchacchidraṅgaḷmāḍalpaḍeyadeyuṁ,
ākarṇākr̥ṣṭōtsr̥ṣṭanijavikīrṇaṭaṅkaṅgaḷindaṁ tatpatākinīkuñjaraśiraśśiḷāpaṭṭakaṅgaḷa
nirbagimāḍalpaḍeyadeyuṁ, nijavijayagajakarōnmuktaṅgaḷ appa muktāmuktavinirdaḷita
vīrayōdharudhiravārāśiśīkaraṅgaḷinudagrakōpānaḷanāṟisalpaḍeyadeyuṁ,
īṣadviṣaṇṇavadanan āgirda bāhubalikumāranaṁ mantripuṅgavar nōḍi,

endu nuḍidoḍambaḍisi dharmayuddhamanubhayabalaṅgaḷoḷamānanda
bhēriyaṁ poysi ghōṣisalvēḻdu bāhubalikumārana bharatēśvarana pakṣada
rājalōkamaneraḍuṁ deseyoḷaṁ madhyasthar āgi miḍukade nōḍuttirpantu
niyamisidāgaḷirbaruṁ nīlaniṣadhagirigaḷondondaṟoḷ bandu poṇardu nilvante
nindorvarorvaremeyikkade nōḍuvalli,

antu bāhubalitējaḥpuñjame kaṇṇoḷuḷkuvante sairisademeyikki
dr̥ṣṭiyuddhayoḷ sōle mattamirvaruṁ bandu,

bharatēśvaraṁ pañcaśataśarāsanōtsēdhanappudaṟiṁ pañcaviṁśatyuttarapañca
śataśarāsanōtsēdhan appa bāhubalikumārana mēge,

antu bāhubaliya surakarikarānukāriy appa bāhugaḷindaṁ tuḷkida
nīrge mogamanoḍḍi mogaṁ sōlvuduṁ, kumāraṅge ghōṣisuva jaya
ghōṣaṇeyaṁ kēḷalāṟade maṇimayakirīṭōdagravisphuritasañcūḷikākanakācaḷamane
pōltu mallayuddhadoḷ bandu poṇardu,

lg.l: ḷire paribhavamantu tanage bare muḷisina da

div.p:
āgaḷ ā puruparamēśvaratanūbhavara yuddhāḍambarōpasargadoḷa
mākuḷavyākuḷar āgi tatpraśamanapratīkāramāge nākalōkasaundariyaroḍane,
ā prastāvadoḷ,
āgaḷ

ad’ alladeyum aśēṣavidyānadīśōṣaṇagrīṣmāṁśumālimayūkha
māleyumupaśamāmbhōrāśipraḷayabāḍabānaḷajvāleyuṁ vinayāmr̥tama
rīcisañchādanāmbhōdasantatiyumubhayalōkavivēkavirōcanāstamayavēḷeyuṁ
dhar‍madrumacchēdaparaśudhāreyuṁ viṣayaviṣadrumakandaḷiyumindriyalubdhakasvacchanda
vihāragahanabhūmiyuṁ duryaśaḥpāṁśuprasaramahāvātyeyumappa
endu bāhubalikumāraṁ tapaścaraṇaniścaḷaniścayamananādāgaḷ,

lg.l: manadoḷ muṁ pudidirda kōpamanituṁ tūḷdāgaḷettetta ge

div.p: endu,

antu bharatēśvaranaṁ bāhubalikumāranentānumoḍambaḍisi mahā
baliy emba nijatanūjananātmīyapadaviyoḷ niṟisi,
antu naḍeye,

antu bhagavadāsthānāravindiniyaṁ rājahaṁsanantaḷaṅkarisuttuṁ bandu
bhagavatpādapīṭhōpakaṇṭhadoḷ sar‍vāṅgōpanatan āgi nindāgaḷ,
antu niṭilataṭaghaṭitakarakuśēśayakuṭmalanāgi,
endu,

antu jainadīkṣeyaṁ kaikoṇḍu guruvinanumatadiṁ dvādaśāṅga
caturdaśapūrvaṅgaḷaṁ kaltu tadanumatadoḷ baḻiyamēkavihāriyāgi
saṁvatsarāvadhivaraṁ pratimāyōgadoḷ nile,

ant’ ugrōgratapadoḷamā bāhubalimunīndraṅge kēvalajñānā
vāptiyāgadudarke bharatēśvaraṁ vismayamuttu pōgi vr̥ṣabhanāthanaṁ besagoḷe
tapadoḷ ninduṁ ninna neladoḷ nindev emba mānakaṣāyamavarginnuṁ
pattuviṭṭudaltadaṟiṁ kēvalajñānōtpattiyāgadirdudu. nīṁ pōgi kālgeṟagaloḍaṁ
kēvalajñānamakkum endu besasidoḍe labdhōpadēśan āgi vividhārcanāsamagraparijana
parivr̥taṁ rājarājaṁ munirājacaraṇāmbhōjadoḷ bandeṟagi vividhārcane
gaḷindamarcisi,

antu bāhubalikēvaḷiyuṁ nānādēśavihāradoḷ viśvajanamaṁ
nijavacōmr̥tadiṁ bhavyajanasārthamaṁ taṇipalendu bandu kailāsaśailadoḷādidēvara
sannidhiyoḷirdaṁ. intu bharatēśvaranumā munīśvaranaṁ pūjisi,

antu nirvartitāśēṣadigvijayasāhasāścaryāvalōkananiratapura
janāśīrvādaśēṣākṣataṅgaḷanāntukoṇḍu,

div.head: pañcadaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
tadanantarame māgadhāmaravaratanuprabhāsāmaravijayārdhakumāra
kr̥tamālānāṭyamālāhimavatkumāradivijarindaṁ gaṅgāsindhudēvīpramukha
dēvīnivahadiṁ lavaṇajaladhigaṅgāsindhunadyāditīrthajalaparipūritavividhauṣadhiratna
garbhamaṅgaḷabhr̥ṅgārajaḷaṅgaḷoḷabhiṣiktanādāgaḷ,
antu cakrābhiṣēkōtsavānantaraṁ,

antu ṣaṭkhaṇḍabharatamaṇḍaḷamanuṇḍigesādhyaṁ māḍi padineṇṭu kōṭi
jātyaśvaṅgaḷumembattanālkulakke gandhasindhuraṅgaḷ appa bhadrahastigaḷumembattanālkulakke
samarasannāhayōgyaṅgaḷ appa rathaṅgaḷumembattu nālkukōṭi vīrabhaṭanikaramuṁ
mūvattirchāsiramakuṭabaddharuṁ mūvattirchāsirvar meygāpina gaṇabaddhadēvaruṁ
mūvattirchāsirbarubhayakulaviśuddhamakuṭabaddhara tanūjeyar appa kulalalaneyaruṁ
mūvattirchāsirbar pratyantarājatanūjeyaruṁ mūvattirchāsirbaravarōdha
vadhūnivahamuṁ antu tombattāṟusāviramantaḥpuramuṁ mūṟukōṭiyuvati
bandhuvargamuṁ mūvattirchāsirasaṅgītakasaṅgatanāṭyaśālegaḷuṁ mattaṁ laukika
śāstranivartanaṁ berasu palavuṁ teṟada paṟegaḷuṁ ṣaṭkarmasādhanadravyaṅgaḷuṁ
divyaśayyāsananānāsadanaṅgaḷuṁ śālivrīhiyavagōdhūmādi dhānyanicaya
doḍananēkadhānyasadanaṅgaḷuṁ kṣaumadukūlādi divyavasana vividhaprāvaraṇa
viśēṣaṅgaḷuṁ nītiśāstraṅgaḷoḍananēkaśāstraṅgaḷuṁ strīpuruṣayōgyamaṇi
muktābharaṇaṅgaḷuṁ cakravartiyājñeyindaṁ nelanellaṁ bandu koḷvoḍaṁ tavada
kanakarāśiyuṁ marakatapadmarāgavajravaiḍūryamuktāphaḷādinavaratnaṅgaḷumanukrama
dindaṁ śrīgr̥hadoḷ puṭṭida kāḷamahākāḷanaisarpapāṇḍukapadmapiṅgaḷa
māṇavakaśaṅkhasarvaratnaṅgaḷ emba navanidhigaḷuṁ āyudhāgāradoḷ puṭṭida
cakrāsidaṇḍacchatraratnaṅgaḷuṁ śrīgr̥hadoḷ puṭṭida nidhimaṇicarmakākiṇī ratnaṅgaḷuṁ,
vijayārdhaparvatadoḷ puṭṭida gajāśvastrīratnaṅgaḷuṁ sākētanagaradoḷ puṭṭida
sēnānāyakapurōhitagr̥hapatitakṣakaratnaṅgaḷuṁ antu padinālkuṁ teṟada jīvājīva
ratnaṅgaḷuṁ kṣitisāram emba prākāradoḷaṁ sarvatōbhadram emba gōpuradoḷaṁ
kūḍida vaijayantiy emba divyaprāsādamuṁ diksvastikam emba sabhābhūmiyuṁ
nandyāvartam emba śibiranivēśamuṁ girikūṭam emba digavalōkanagr̥hamuṁ
vardhamānamembīkṣaṇapriyaprēkṣāgr̥hamuṁ mahāgharmāntam emba dhārāgr̥hamuṁ
gr̥hakūṭam emba varṣāvāsamuṁ puṣkaḷāvatiy emba śayanasadanamuṁ
kubērakāntam emba tavada bhaṇḍāramuṁ vasudhārakam emba kōśāgāramuṁ
jīmūtam emba majjanagr̥hamuṁ avataṁsikey emba ratnamāleyuṁ dēvaramyamemba
paṭakuṭiyuṁ siṁhavidhr̥tam appa siṁhavāhiniy emba mr̥duśayyeyuṁ mēru
kaṇṭhōpamam emba siṁhāsanamuṁ, yakṣakaravidhūyamānamappanupamamaṅgaḷamemba
mūvatteraḍu cāmaraṅgaḷuṁ sūryaprabhamembātapatramuṁ vidyutprabhamemba
maṇikuṇḍalayugaḷaṅgaḷuṁ viṣamōcikegaḷ emba pāvugegaḷuṁ abhēdyamemba
kavacamuṁ ajitañjayam emba ratnarathamuṁ vajrakāṇḍam emba billuṁ amōghamemba
śaranikaramuṁ vajratuṇḍam emba śaktiyuṁ siṁhāṭakam emba kuntamuṁ lōhavāhini
y emba surigeyuṁ manōvēgam emba kaṇayamuṁ saunandakam emba bāḷuṁ
bhūtamukham emba khēṭakamuṁ sudarśanam emba cakraratnamuṁ cūḍāmaṇiyemba
maṇiratnamuṁ cintāmaṇiy emba kākiṇīratnamuṁ ayōdhyan emba daṇḍanāyakanuṁ
buddhisāgaran emba purōhitanuṁ kāmavr̥ṣṭiy emba bhaṇḍāriganuṁ bhadramukhanemba
takṣakapatiyuṁ vijayaparvatam emba yāgahastiyuṁ pavanañjayam emba turaga
ratnamuṁ subhadrey emba strīratnamuṁ dvādaśayōjanasaṁsarpanninādaṅgaḷappānandi
gaḷ emba panneraḍuṁ mahābhērigaḷuṁ vijayaghōṣaṅgaḷ emba panneraḍuṁ paṭahaṅgaḷuṁ
puṇyābdhisambhavaṅgaḷ āgi gambhīrāvartaṅgaḷembirpattanālkuṁ śaṅkhaṅgaḷuṁ nālvatteṇṭu
kōṭi patākegaḷuṁ taṭidvaḷayaviḷasitaṅgaḷ āgi nijaprakōṣṭhaniṣṭhitaṅgaḷ appa vīrāṅgadaṁ
gaḷ emba kaṭakaṅgaḷuṁ mahākalyāṇakārakam emba divyāhāramuṁ amr̥tagarbhaṅgaḷemba
sadyōghr̥tamuṁ amr̥taparimaḷāmōdam emba dadhiyuṁ amr̥tarasāyanamemba
pānamuṁ mattaṁ mūvattirchāsiraviṣayaṅgaḷuṁ eḻpattirchāsirapoḻalgaḷuṁ
tombattāṟu kōṭigrāmaṅgaḷuṁ padināṟusāsira khēḍaṅgaḷuṁ padināṟusāsira
saṁvāhanaṅgaḷuṁ aivattāṟantaradvīpaṅgaḷuṁ ēkakōṭipramāṇasthāligaḷuṁ
śatasahasrakōṭihalaṅgaḷuṁ mūṟukōṭigōmaṇḍaḷamuṁ pratyantavāsigaḷappē
ḻnūṟukukṣinivāsigaḷuṁ eḻpattirchāsiradurgāṭavigaḷuṁ padineṇchāsira mlēccharājaruṁ
ātmīyasāmrājyaparicchēdamāge vajravr̥ṣabhanārācaśarīrasaṁhananasaumyanuṁ
samacaturasrasaṁsthānanuṁ niṣṭaptakanakavarṇanuṁ svastika nandyāvartādi catuṣṣaṣṭilakṣaṇa
dharanuṁ tiḷamasūrikādyanēkavyañjananidhiyuṁ apāravīr‍yanuṁ pañcaśatacāpōtsē
dhanuṁ caturaśītilakṣaṇapūrvānapavartyāyuṣyanuṁ apratihataśāsananumāgi,

antu bharataṁ bharatamaṇḍaḷamanēkacchatracchāyeyindaṁ pratipālisuttu
mireyire,

int’ ayōdhyāsiṁhāsanāsīnanumuditōditasāmrājyasukhānubhavanuṁ
kr̥takr̥tyanum appa sakalacakravarti,
antu māḍi,

lg.l: talapati baḻiyaṭṭi barise peṟat’ ond’ eḍeyoḷ

div.p:
āgaḷ bharatēśvaracakravarti nīminibarumivar banda mārgadoḷ
bārade peṟatondu mārgadoḷēke bandirendu besagoḷe,

adaṟiṁ pravāḷapatrapuṣpāṅkuraṅgaḷindaṁ saṅkīrṇam appa rājāṅgaṇamaṁ
meṭṭade peṟatonde baṭṭeyoḷ bandevembuduṁ nābhinandananandananavara dr̥ḍhavratakke
mecci dānasanmānayōgyarappar endu padmanidhiy emba nidhiyaṁ tarisi tapanīya
sūtradoḷēkādyēkōttaradaśāntambaramavaravara nelegaḷoḷ brahmasūtrābhidhāna
yajñōpavītadiṁ pavitragātrar‍ māḍi,

bharatēśvaraṁ tānuṁ munne bhaṭṭārakara samakṣadoḷ samākarṇi
tōpāsakādhyayananappudaṟindamārēnaṁ bēḻparavargadane koṭṭu cakravartigaḷ
māḻpa kalpavr̥kṣamuṁ mahāmaṇḍaḷikapramukhamakuṭabaddhar māḻpa caturmukhamuṁ
ardhamaṇḍaḷikar māḻpa sarvatōbhadram emba pesaranoḍeya mahāmahamuṁ
indrar māḻpa indradhvajamuṁ samastabhavyajananirvartyamānāṣṭāhnikamuṁ
caityālayanir‍māṇanirmāpaṇaśāsanārōpitagrāmakṣētravitaraṇamuṁ munijana
pūjānnadānādikaraṇajinagr̥hajanasatatōpanīyamāna pādyagandhākṣatakusumacaru
dhūpadīpaphalādyarcanātmakam appa nityamahamuṁ śāntikapauṣṭikādigaḷumaṁ bagedu
māḻpa baliyuṁ ghr̥takṣīradadhināḷikēratōyāmrarasēkṣurasagandhōdakādigaḷiṁ
māḍuva savanamuṁ mūṟuṁ pottumarcanāpurassaraṁ dhūpōddhāraṅgeyva nirantara
trisandhyāsēveyumendeṇṭu teṟada pūjeyumanarkapūjeyumaṁ mannisi asimaṣi
kr̥ṣivaṇigvidyāśilpakar‍maṅgaḷiṁ śuddhavr̥ttiyindarthōpārjanaṅgeyva vārteyuṁ
triśuddhiyinanukampeverasu samastaprāṇigaḷgabhayaṅguḍuva dayādattiyuṁ kriyāmantraṁ
gaḷindamātmasamānaśrāvakāgraṇigaḷge kanyābhūmisuvarṇahastyaśvaratharatnādigaḷaṁ kuḍuva
samadattiyuṁ paramatapaścaraṇaniratayatisamitigellaṁ pratigrahādi purassaraṁ niravadyā
hārādivitaraṇarūpa pātradattiyuṁ nijānvayōddharaṇasamarthanappagratanūbha
vaṅgātmīyadhar‍madhanabandhugaḷaṁ samarpipa sakaḷadattiyuṁ berasu caturvidhamappa
dattiyuṁ upāsakādhyayanādhyāpanānantaraṁ sakaḷaśāstraṅgaḷanōduvōdisuva neneva
bareva paramasvādhyāyamuṁ pañcāṇuvratādipravartanasvabhāvasaṁyamamuṁ anaśana
vr̥ttyādi tapōnuṣṭhānumuṁ berasāryaṣaṭkarmaṅgaḷaṁ nimagivu kulācāraṁ
gaḷendaṟiye pēḻdu kaikoḷisi,

end’ avaranātmīyānvayōcitavrataṅgaḷoḷ dr̥ḍhavrataraṁ māḍi mattaṁ
dvādaśāṅgaṅgaḷoḷ pēḻdādhānaprītisuprītidhr̥timōdapriyōdbhavanāmakar‍ma
bahiryānaniṣadyānnaprāśanavyuṣṭikēśāvāpa lipisaṅkhyāna saṅgrahōpanayanabrata
car‍yāvratāvataraṇa vivāhavarṇalābhakulacaryā gr̥hīśitvapraśāntigr̥hatyāga dīkṣā
dyajinarūpatāmaunādhyayanavr̥ttatva tīrthakr̥dbhāvanāgurusthānābhyupagama
gaṇōpagrahaṇasvagurusthānasaṅkrāntinissaṅgatvātmabhāvanāyōganirvāṇasamprāpti
yōganir‍vāṇasādhanēndrōpapādābhiṣēkavidhidānasukhōdayēndratyā
gāvatārahiraṇyagarbhōtkr̥ṣṭajanmatāmandarādrīndrābhiṣēkagurupūjōpa
lambhanayauvarājya svarājyacakralābhadigvijayacakrābhiṣēkasāmrājya pariniṣkramaṇa
yōgasammahārhantyavihārayōgatyāgāgranirvr̥tiyembayvattumūṟu
garbhādinirvāṇapar‍yantaṅgaḷ appa garbhānvayakriyegaḷaṁ

mattam avatāravr̥tti lōbhasthānalābhagaṇagrahaṇapūjārādhyapuṇyayajña
car‍yōpayōgatvamembeṇṭu berasuṁ pūrvōktōpanayanādicatvāriṁśatkriye
gaḷoḍane nālvatteṇṭudīkṣānvayakriyegaḷumaṁ sajjātisadgr̥hatvapārivrājyapada surēndratva
sāmrājyaparamārhantyaparinir‍vāṇamembēḻuṁ paramasthānanāmakartranvaya
kriyegaḷanatibālavidyākulāvadhivarṇōttamatvapātratvasr̥ṣṭyadhikāra vyavahārēśitvā
vadhyatvādaṇḍyatvamānārhatvaprajāsambandhāntaram emba pattumadhikāraṅgaḷumanaṟipi,
mattaṁ garbhānvayādikriyegaḷananuṣṭhisuvāgaḷ vinēyajanatāsatatārjita jinabhavana
doḷamātmīyagr̥hābhyantarapraśastapradēśagaḷoḷaṁ praśastamr̥ttikāviracitōnnata
vēdītaḷāṣṭamahāpratihār‍yasamanvitajagatpūjyapūjitārhatpratimegaḷaṁ niṟisi
yathāśaktisnapanapūjāpurassaraṁ bahuvidhārcanegaḷindarcisi dharmacakracchatratritayaṅgaḷaṁ
baḷasiyumupāśrayambaḍeye niṟisi tīr‍thakaragaṇadharānagārakēvaḷigaḷa parinirvāṇa
kṣētradoḷ śarīrasaṁskārādigārhapatyadakṣiṇāgnyāhavanīyam emba pesaraṁ paḍedagni
trayaṅgaḷoḷagarhadarcanāśēṣaghr̥tatiḷājyāhutigaḷinupāsakādhyayanagadita samasta
prakāra pipīlikājātyādimantraṅgaḷiṁ kriyānuyuktamāge pēḻdu pūr‍vāpara
vidēhaṅgaḷoḷ avyavacchinnarūpadiṁ bharatairāvataṅgaḷoḷ nijōcitakāla
kālārambhāvasānarūpadiṁ negaḻdī kriyāviśēṣaṅgaḷanillinditteḍeyuḍugade
naḍeyisuvudu; ī kriyegaḷanuṣṭhānamantraśūnyaṅgaḷāgadandu,

antu bharatēśvaraṁ bharatakṣētradoḷ tāne māḍida tanna koṇḍāṭa
dinatiprasiddhamāda viprasantati kelavukālaṁ naḍevannegamondudivasaṁ triyāmā
virāmadoḷ āścar‍yabhūtaṅgaḷuṁ dūrāriṣṭaphalasūcakaṅgaḷum appa svapnaṅgaḷaṁ kaṇḍu
bercidanterdumīgaḷenna kaṇḍa kanasugaḷī yugada kaḍeyoḷ prajegaḷge vividhōpadrava
sūcakaṅgaḷ āgi tōrkumendanumānadinaspaṣṭarūpadinaṟidu bhagavadarhatsamīpakke
pōgi yugapatsakaḷapadārthayathārthāvabhāsiy appa kēvalajñānadiṁ viśēṣaniścayamaṁ
māḍuvanendu sakaḷa prābhātikakriyeyaṁ nirvartisi makuṭabaddhaparivr̥tan āgi bandu
kaiḷāsagirīndrasthitasamavasr̥tiyaṁ saṁsr̥tilatāvicchēdiyaṁ pokku gandhakuṭiyaṁ
mūṟusūḻbalavandu dēvadānavagandharvavidyādharārādhyanaṁ vr̥ṣabhanāthananarthānu
gatāṣṭōttarasahasranāmāṅkitastutigaḷiṁ stutiyisi divyārcanegaḷindarcisi gaṇadharādi
yatisamitigeṟagi nijōcitasthānadoḷ kuḷḷirdāgaḷ,

ant’ utpannāvadhibōdhaṁ dhar‍māmr̥tāsvādanaparan āgi kiṟidu pottan irdu
nijamanōgatakār‍yavijñāpanamukharamukhan āgi,

ad’ alladeyum indina dinaṁ beḷag appa jāvadoḷ padināṟu kanasugaḷaṁ
kaṇḍenā kanasugaḷaniṣṭaphalasūcakaṅgaḷembudaṁ sāmānyadinupalakṣisidenavaṟa
phalamumanenagaṟiye besasimendavadhijñānadiṁ tānā kanasugaḷanaṟivanāgiyuṁ
sabhājanakkamaṟipalendu besagoḷvuduṁ praśnānukramadiṁ trilōkaguruvintendu
besasidaṁ nīnā dvijanmajātiyaṁ oḷḷitaṁ māḍideyādoḍaṁ,

lg.l: dhareyoḷ dhar‍mārthadiṁ nīṁ sr̥jiyisi negaḻdī viprasantānadondā
caraṇaṁ nīnenda pāṅgiṁ kr̥tayugadoḷe dalsalguminnatta naṣṭā

div.p:
ādoḍam īgaḷavar sadācārarappudaṟiṁ avaranā māḻkeyoḷe
naḍeyalīyade māḍi kiḍisidoḍe ninage piriduṁ dūṟakkum endu pēḻdu mattamātana
kaṇḍa ṣōḍaśasvapnasūcitaphalaṅgaḷanint’ endu besasidar -

embuduṁ bharatēśvaraṁ prasannamanan āgi vr̥ṣabhasēnādyanupama paryanta
gaṇadharadēvacaritākarṇanamane tanage karṇapūrammāḍi bhagavatsiṁhāsanaratna
raśmicchaṭātipūtabhūtaḷakke,

antu puruparamēśvaraṅgeṟagi bandayōdhyāpuramaṁ pokku dussvapna
darśanakarṣaṇārtham āgi kalpavr̥kṣamahāmahimāpurassaraṁ bhagavadarhadabhiṣēka
munipūjanasatpātradānapraṇayaprīṇanamāhāravitaraṇagōdōhaplavāvanītaḷa
santarpaṇādi śāntikakriyegaḷaṁ negaḻdu,

ant’ ayōdhyāpurōpāntakāntapradēśaṅgaḷoḷaṁ kaiḷāsōdagra
kūṭaṅgaḷoḷaṁ ṣaṭkhaṇḍamaṇḍaḷaprasiddharājadhānigaḷoḷaṁ,

div.head: ṣōḍaśāśvāsaṁ
div.p:
antu tanna māḍisida caityālayaṅgaḷoḷ ādibhaṭṭārakādiyāge
bhaviṣyattīrthakarapratikr̥tigaḷaṁ pañcaratnamayaṅgaḷaṁ māḍisi māṇikyadēvarendu
koṇḍāḍi tatpūjākaraṇapuṇyavāsaraṅgaḷoḷ upavāsaniratanaparimitājya
kṣīradadhināḷikērasahakārapūgīphalapuṇḍrēkṣurasaṅgaḷindaṁ gōśīrṣacandanakarpūra
parimaḷasurabhigandhōdakaṅgaḷindamabhiṣēkaṅgeydu,

lg.l: gaḷa pūgaḷ dīpadoḷ pannagapatiya phaṇāratnadīpaṁ vitānā

div.p: ant’ arcisi nirbharapraṇāmāñjalipraṇayakr̥tōttamāṅganāgi,

lg.l: ṇamaṇijyōtigaḷekkeyiṁ kuḍe jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ
ttire māṇikyajinēndrabimbame jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ
dharegintorbane dēvanāgire jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ
tikamaṁ sāre vinēyarājige jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ
vapadāmbhōjame bhavyakōṭige jayaṁ bhadraṁ śubhaṁ maṅgaḷaṁ
tyaktaṁ mahāmahārhēṇa sarvaṁ hi mahatāṁ mahat
uddhartā jagatāṁ tyaktvā kā nō hāniriti sthitaḥ

div.p: end’ anēkastavanaṅgaḷiṁ stutiyisi tadanantarasamayadoḷ,

mattaṁ sākētanagaramaṁ baḷasida kanakaprākārada bāgilvāḍaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
rājamandirada gōpuradvāraṅgaḷoḷaṁ tanna purada pōpa barpa rājamārgadoḷaṁ
caturviṁśadarhatpratimāvirājamānahēmadāmavilambitamaṇighaṇṭāsamanvita
vandanamālegaḷaṁ

lg.l: ḍi yathā rājā tathā prajā embavolō

div.p:
matt’ itta vr̥ṣabhanāthanuṁ vr̥ṣabhasēna kumbha dr̥ḍharatha śatrudamana dēvaśarma
yaśōbāhu dēvāgni agnidēva āgnigupta citragupta mitrāgni haḷadhara mahīdhara
mahēndra vasudēva vasundharācaḷa mērudhara mērubhūti sarvayaśa sar‍vayajña
sarvagupta sar‍vapriya sar‍vadēva sar‍vavijaya vijayagupta vijayamitra vijaya aparājita
vasumitra viśvasēna sādhuṣēṇa satyadēva dēvasatya satyagupta satyamitra śarmiḷa
vinīta saṁ[va]ra munigupta munidatta muniyajña munidēva guptayajña mitrayajña
svayambhu bhagadēva bhagadatta bhagaphalgu, mitraphalgu, prajāpati, sarvasaṅgha, varuṇa,
dhanapāla, maghava, tējōrāśi mahāvīra mahāratha [viśālākṣa] mahā[bala]
suviśāla vajra vajra [sāra] candracū[ḍa] mēghēśvara mahāsvara kaccha mahākaccha
namivinami baḷa atibaḷa vajrabaḷa baḷārāti bhadrabaḷa nandabaḷa mahābhō[ga]
nandimitra kāmadēva anupamarembeṇbattu nālvar gaṇadharadēvaruṁ, nālsāsiṟa
dēḻnūṟayvadimbar sakaḷapūrvadhararuṁ, nālsāsiradainūṟayvadimbar śikṣakaruṁ
ombaisāsirvaravadhijñānigaḷuṁ irpattusāsirvarkēvaḷajñānigaḷuṁ irpattu
sāsiradaṟunūrvar vikriyardhiprāptaruṁ pannirchāsiradēḻnūrayvadimbar
manaḥpar‍yayajñānigaḷuṁ anibare vādigaḷuṁ modalāge eṇbattunālsāsiradeṇbatta
nālvar munipatigaḷuṁ mūṟalakkeyumayvattusāsira brahmimukhyāryikāgaṇamuṁ
mūṟulakke dr̥ḍhabratādiśrāvakaruṁ aydulakke suvrate modalāge paramaśrāvakiyaruṁ
aydulakke bhavanāmarādicaturvidhadēvanikāyamuṁ pakṣicatuṣpadasarīsr̥pāditir‍ya
gjātigaḷuṁ berasu dhar‍māmr̥tavarṣadiṁ dharmakṣētraṅgaḷoḷ bhavyasasyaṅgaḷananēkabrata
phalavinataṅgaḷ māḍi caturuttarāśītilakṣapubbaṅgaḷoḷage padinālkudivasadāyuṣya
muṇṭ ene kaiḷāsaparvatada siddhakūṭadoḷ pauṣyamāsada paurṇamī dinadandu
yōgapalyaṅkāsanadindaṁ yōganirōdhadoḷ pūrvābhimukhanāgirdaṁ;
annegamittal,
mattaṁ jayapriyatanūjaṁ
mattaṁ vārāṇasīnagarādhīśvaranakampanatanayaṁ,

antu bharatādigaḷanibaruṁ tantamma kaṇḍa kanasugaḷaṁ prabhāta
samayadoḷ purōhitaṅgaṟipidoḍe, nimma kaṇḍa

embudum ā prastāvadoḷ ādibhaṭṭārakavyatikarasthitiyanānandanembaṁ
dhar‍makār‍yanimittaṁ bandaṟipidoḍe, bharatēśvaracakravartiyuṁ vinēyajanasamētaṁ
bandu bhaṭṭārakaraṁ mūṟusūḻ balavandu kr̥tābhīṣṭastavanaparaṁ mahāmaha
m emba mahāpūjeyaṁ mahāvibhūtiyiṁ padinālkudivasambaraṁ nirantaraṁ māḍe
vr̥ṣabhanāthaṁ svasthanayōgakēvaḷi kēvaḷipradēśanirjareyaṁ māḍuttumanta
rmuhūrtakāladiṁ śarīratriguṇabahuḷateyiṁ caturdaśarajjvāyāmātmatriguṇa
pramāṇātmapradēśavisarpaṇadiṁ daṇḍakriyākaraṇānantarasamayadoḷ pūrvōkta
bāhulyadiṁ lōkākāśavyāpakakavāṭakriyeyaṁ neṟapi tadanantarasamayadoḷ
vātavaḷayamuḻiye jīvapradēśaṅgaḷiṁ lōkapradēśamaṁ parvi nirvartitapratara
kriyāviśēṣaṁ tadanantarakṣaṇadoḷ vyāptasaptaghanarajjupramāṇāśēṣajagatpradēśalōka
pūraṇakriyāparisamāptiyaṁ māḍi mattaṁ pravartitapratarakavāṭadaṇḍakriyā
viśēṣaṅgaḷiṁ khaṇḍitaghāticatuṣkasthityanubhāganupagatamūlaśarīrapramāṇātma
pradēśanāyuṣyasthitisamīkr̥tāśēṣāghātitraya sthitikanantarmuhūrtaniruddhāśēṣa
manōvāgbādarakāya yōgasūkṣmakāyayōgapariṇatanupayōgaparikalpita
sūkṣmakriyāpratipātyabhidhānatr̥tīyaśukladhyānaparāyaṇaṁ niruddhasūkṣmaśarīra
yōgananantarasamayadoḷ pañcahrasvākṣarōccāraṇamātrakālapramitā
yōgaguṇasthānasthitaṁ samucchinnakriyāpratipātidhyānaparipūrṇaviśēṣaśīlaguṇagaṇa
niḷayaṁ nijadvicaramasamayadoḷ anyataravēdanīya dēvagatitatprāyōgyānu
pūrvaśarīrabandhanasaṅghātavarṇarasapañcakasaṁsthānasaṁhananaṣaṭkāṅgōpāṅgadvikaṁ
gandhadvikaṁ sparśāṣṭakaṁ agurulaghutva catuṣkavihāyōgatidvikasthirāsthiraśubhāśubha
susvaradusvarasubhagadurbhagapratyēkaśarīrāyaśaskīrtiranādēyanirmāṇa
par‍yāptanīcairgōtraṅgaḷ emba dvisaptatiprakr̥tigaḷaṁ niravaśēṣaṁ kiḍisi svakīya carama
samayadoḷ anyataravēdanīya manuṣyāyuṣyamanuṣyagati tatprayōgyānu
pūrvipañcēndriyajāti trasanāmaśubhāśubhōdayaparyāpta bādarayaśa
skīrtiruccairgōtra tīrthakaranāmaṅgaḷ emba padimūṟuṁ prakr̥tigaḷumaṁ nir‍mūlaṁ
kiḍisi baḻiyaṁ kṣāyikasamyaktvānantajñānadarśanavīr‍yasūkṣmāvagāhāguru
laghutāvyābādhaṅgaḷemba,

lg.l: guṇameṇṭuṁ bandu tannoḷ peṇedire sukhasōdbhūtanuṁ lōkacūḍā
maṇiyuṁ tān āgi tannoḷ neṟeye paḍedu tannandamaṁ tāne tanna

div.p:
antu vr̥ṣabhēśvaraṁ trilōkaśikhariśikharaśēkharāyamāna[muṁ]
kramōnnata[mu]m āgi madhyapradēśadoḷaṣṭayōjanabāhulyamuṁ dhavaḷacchatrākāramuṁ
nālkaidulakṣayōjanadagalamuṁ samavr̥ttamuṁ enisidī ṣaṭprāgbhārada mēgaṇa
ghanōdadhighanāniḷatanuvātatritayabhāgadoḷ avyābādhanumanantasukhāmbudhi
niḷayanum āgi nelasirdaṁ. itta caturvidhadēvanikāyamuṁ purudēvaparinirvāṇa
mahākalyāṇapūjānirvartanābhilāṣey āgi nirvāṇabhūmiyananēkasurabhi
suratarukusumasugandhākṣataṅgaḷindamarcisi,

antu surabhikusumagandhākṣataṅgaḷindamarcisi bhagavaccharīrahō
makuṇḍadakṣiṇabhāgadoḷ gaṇadharaśarīrasaṁskārakuṇḍamamanirisi tadaparadigbhāgadoḷa
nagārakēvaḷihutāśanakuṇḍamaṁ sthāpanaṅgeydu ā gārhapatya dakṣiṇāgnyāha
vanīyābhidhānakuṇḍaṅgaḷiṁ koṇḍu lalāṭakaṇṭhabhujaśikhara[yu]gaḷahr̥daya
pradēśadoḷaṁ,
antu tripuṇḍraṅgaḷaniṭṭosageyindosagemaruḷgoṇḍu,

āgaḷ ātmīyaguruviyōgaśōkānaḷadahyamānamānasanāgirda
bharatapatiya śōkāvēgamaṁ vr̥ṣabhasēnagaṇāgraṇigaḷintendāṟisidar -

ad’ alladeyuṁ jīvaṅgaḷ śubhāśubhakarmaśailūṣaprēritaṅgaḷ āgi caturgati
saṁsāraṅgaḷoḷanēkarasapariṇataṅgaḷ nānāśarīrōpādānaparityajanapurassaraṁ
paribhramisuguṁ. adu namminibara bhavāvaḷiyinde namaganubhūtapūr‍va
madentendoḍe, bhavadīyajanakaṁ puruparamēśvaraṁ,

lg.l: bhōgakāṅkṣeyoḷ jayavarmaṁ baḻike mahābaḷaṁ lalitāṅgaṁ vajrajaṅghaṁ
y āgi sar‍vārthasiddhiyoḷ puṭṭi bandilli tānādidēvanādaṁ

div.p:
mattaṁ dhanaśrīyuṁ nirnāmikeyuṁ svayamprabhādēviyuṁ śrīmatiyuṁ
ār‍yeyuṁ svayamprabhadēvanuṁ kēśavamahīśanuṁ acyuta pratīndranuṁ dhanadattanuṁ
ahamindranuṁ āgi bandīgaḷādidānatīrthapravartakaśrēyāṁsanādaṁ; atigr̥ddha
mahīśanuṁ nārakanuṁ vyāghranuṁ īśānakalpajanuṁ mativaramantriyuṁ adhōgrai
vēyakadivijanuṁ subāhumahīpatiyuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhīśvaranuṁ ahamindranumāgi
bandu nīnīgaḷ bharatēśvaracakravartiyādai; prītivardhanasēnānāyakanuṁ
bhōgabhūmijanuṁ kanakaprabhāmaranuṁ vajrajaṅghapurōhitanānandanuṁ
adhōgraivēyakāhamindranuṁ pīṭhanuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhīśanum āgi bandu nānīgaḷ
vr̥ṣabhēśvarasutaṁ vr̥ṣabhasēna[ne]n āgi vr̥ṣabhanāthaṅge prathamagaṇadharanādeṁ;
prītivardhanapurōhitanuṁ bhōgabhūmijanuṁ lalitāṅgadēvasāmānikadēva
prabhañjananuṁ vajrajaṅghaśrēṣṭhadhanamitranuṁ adhōgraivēyakāhamindranuṁ
mahāpīṭhanuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhīśvaranum āgi bandīgaḷanantavijayanādaṁ;
śārdūlār‍yanuṁ citrāṅga[da]dēvanuṁ varadattanr̥panuṁ acyutasāmānikadēvanuṁ
vijayanr̥panuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhīśvaranum āgi bandīgaḷanantavīryanādaṁ; varāhār‍yanuṁ
maṇikuṇḍalāmaranuṁ varasēnabhūpanuṁ acyutasāmānika dēvanuṁ
vaijayantabhūpanuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhīśvaranum āgi bandīgaḷ acyutanādaṁ;
vānarār‍yanuṁ manōharāmaranuṁ citrāṅga[da]dēvanr̥panuṁ acyutasāmānikanuṁ
jayantabhūpanuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhiyoḷahamindran āgi bandīgaḷ vīranādaṁ;
nakulāryanuṁ manōrathadivyanuṁ śāntamadananr̥panuṁ acyutasāmānikanuṁ
aparājitanr̥panuṁ sar‍vārthasiddhiyoḷe ahamindran āgi bandīgaḷ suvīranādaṁ,

lg.l: tsavamaltē guruvintu dāṇṭidoḍidaṁ bēḍī viṣādaṁ nira

div.p:
ant’ apagataguruśōkavēgan āgi gaṇadharacaraṇasarasijaṅgaḷg’ eṟagi tanna
bhōgatr̥ṣṇeyaṁ tāne tanna manadoḷ nindisuttuṁ muktyaṅganānuraktacittanāguttuṁ
bandayōdhyāpuramaṁ pokku kelavudivasamird’ ondu divasaṁ,
ant’ adaṁ kaṇḍapagatamōharasanumupagatanir‍vēgarasanumāgi,

antu parityaktasāmrājyaparicchēdan āgi samastadhār‍mikajanaṅgaḷaṁ barisi
sarvatōbhadram emba mahāmahimeyaṁ mahōtsavadindeṇṭudivasambaraṁ māḍi
tatpūjāsamētaṁ kaiḷāsaśailakke pōgi tadagrasthitacaityālayaṅgaḷananēkavidhārcane
gaḷindamarcisi,

lg.l: lakṣārdhaṁ vilasanti ca prathitayōrūrdhvaṁ tataḥ kalpayōḥ
nr̥̄ṇāṁ sīmani mānuṣōttaragirau catvāri catvāri ca

div.p:
endu jagattrayacaityastōtrapavitramukhāravindan āgi bhagavadādibhaṭṭārakara
nirvāṇabhūmisamīpasthitaviśālasphaṭikaśilātaḷārūḍhanuttarābhimukhan āgi
siddhabhaktipūrvakaṁ trijagadguruvē guruvendu tatpadasarasijadhyānaparāyaṇanāgi,

ant’ anantacatuṣṭayavirājamānanuṁ dēvamānavapariṣatparivr̥tanuṁ
saptardhisamanvitayatipatisamētanuṁ amr̥takaradhavaḷaikacchatracāmara catuṣṭayavibhrāji
surēndragiriśikharavirājamānamr̥gēndrāsanavibhāsiyuṁ saritsarōvaravimaḷagagana
taḷaviharaṇapariṇatanum āgi nānāvidhadhar‍makṣētraṅgaḷoḷ ondu lakke pūrvambaraṁ
dhar‍māmr̥tāmbusēkadiṁ vinēyajanasasyasampatparampareyaṁ māḍi kaiḷāsaśailaśikharā
laṅkāraniruddhayōganuṁ apagatayōgaguṇasthānanuṁ caturthadhyānānaḷadagdhaśēṣā
śēṣakarmēndhananumāgi,
